223a7(mdo 'grel): ni ldan pa yi/ /dal bus? dal bus ma la ? rlung ni rgyu bas byar ni byed bcug pa/ /skyed mos tshal gyi ljon shing bu mo 'di rnams kyis ni 'od med snang ba ste/ /mdza' ma rnams la 'khor ba'i bud ba'i tshogs kyi phreng ba'i rtse mor smra sgrogs so/ /de
223b1(mdo 'grel): nas byang chub sems dpas shing rta la? babs te rga ba dang na ba dang 'chi ba la bsams nas kun nas 'khrug pa'i blo gros dang ldan pa/ zug rngu nang na yod pa'i mche gnyis pa'i bdag pa ltar 'di ltar gsungs par gyur te/ blo chung rnams kyi brtan gcod
223b2(mdo 'grel): nyams mi dga' ba'i mdza' ma can/ /zhi ba'i bdag nyid rnams kyi yongs spangs lto 'phye rnams ltar drag/ 'gro ba'i chan chung gzhon pa la yang 'dod rtse gcig pa yi/ /kun nas 'khrug pa'i yid ni yul rnams kyis ni 'phrog pa yin/ /de nas rgyal
223b3(mdo 'grel): po des gar dang glu la mkhas shing gsal ba'i bud med rnams byang chub sems dpa' i thugs 'gugs pa'i phyir skyed mos tshal der btang bar gyur te/ /de rnams kyang byang chub sems dpa' can du mngon par 'ongs nas rgyags pas spobs pa skyed
223b4(mdo 'grel): pa dus kyi bya ba de dang de rnams 'byung bar byas par gyur to/ /de nas la la zhig gis 'di la smras par gyur pa/ gzhon nu gzigs shig ma la ya'i rlung rnams 'di ni dri zhim me tog shing rnams kun nas 'dar byed rgyu ba ste/ /bung bas tsu ta'i shing gi snye
223b5(mdo 'grel): ma rab tu che bar gyur ba la ni bskor bar byed/ /gzhu brdungs ba la bya ba ring bar bde ba ci phyir 'di ni khyed kyi gnas pa ste/ /sgra ni ring ba khu byug me tog gzhon nu can la bskul ba shes bya bdag gi dogs/ /gzhan yang rang gi rdul? gyi yan
223b6(mdo 'grel): lag 'ched byas pa/ /gzhon nu lhan skyes snyam bu mo ni/ /bung ba mchog gis 'khor gis 'khor bar byas ba ni/ /skad cig ma ltar srab pa yongs su dor/ /gzhan dag gis kyang slar 'di la gsol pa/ bud ba ljon shing bud med skye bo longs spyod pa//
223b7(mdo 'grel): me tog rdul gyi 'od med bral ba de mthong nas/ /rlung gis kun nas 'dar ba'i gzhon nu 'dam skyes kyi/ /pad+ma yang dang yang du bsngags mdzub 'dra bar byed/ /la la zhag gis kyang 'di la gsol ba/ ji srid bdag gi khyed kyi phyir me tog
224a1(mdo 'grel): rnams rgyu ba 'di rnams phra ba'i me tog rdul gyis bar rnams med pa ni/ /bdag gi mig la gnod pa zhi min 'gro ba rang mig gnyis/ /gzhon nu ring po nas ni de srid 'di ni rnam par bzlog/ gzhan dag rnams kyis kyang rgong pa dang
224a2(mdo 'grel): bcas par mngon du gnas shing 'di la gsol pa/ sbrang byed kyis ni rnam par 'dar ba'i ze'u 'bru kub la yi gzhu rgyud kyis ni kun nas de? cings/ /me tog gis byas gzhu ni dud chag lta bur dkar ba'i grib ma brang la rnam bkod nas/ /zab pa'i
224a3(mdo 'grel): phyir ni rnyed par byed pa'i bud med rnams ni khyed la kun nas brdeg par 'dod/ /mig cig bcums par byas pa 'dod pa'i lha ni nges par me tog gi mnga' drang por byed/ byang chub sems dpas smras pa/ sring mo rnams dam pa ma yin pa'i smra ba
224a4(mdo 'grel): 'di rnams kyis chog cing chog ste/ bdag gi yid skyo ba sreg blugs zab la chu'i rgyun ltar spegs? ba'i gtam rnams kyi kun nas glags da ltar rnyad pa ma yin te/ /sring mo rnams zhes de de yi/ /tshig ni shes nas bud med rnams/ /bzhin ni thur
224a5(mdo 'grel): du lta zhing gnas/ /ngo tshas rnam par sgeg pa dor/ /gzhon nu ma'i tshogs de ngo mtshar bar gyur shes nas ni/ /bdag po'i blo can rgyal po'i sras po yid byung yang/ /me tog gis ni mnga' rnams nges par dong ba la bzhag nas/ ngo tsha dang bcas yid
224a6(mdo 'grel): byung bas ni gzhu ni phab par byas/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' btsun mo'i 'khor gyi nags de la dga' ba ma thob par gyur te/ /nyi ma nub 'dod pa la shing rta la zhon nas bus med de rnams kyang khyim du song bar gyur te/ /de nas byang chub sems
224a7(mdo 'grel): dpa' sbag? pa'i btam la brnyas par gyur cing mal gyi dbus na rnam par bzhugs te/ rga ba dang na ba dang 'chi ba rnams nyid yid la bzhag nas gnyer sems la rtse gcig par gyur to/ /de nas gcad ma ? rnams kyis bdag nyid chen po de yi
224b1(mdo 'grel): skyo ba'i ma la skyong bar byed ma rnams la 'phral kho nar gnyid pa dang mi smra ba gnyid byas par gyur to/ /der yang la la zhig rnams rgyun mi 'chad pa'i sgra dang dbugs kyi dbang gi so gsal ba dang/ rnam par 'jig pa'i kha chu'i cha yis tham byas pa'i gdong rnams
224b2(mdo 'grel): 'byung bar gyur to/ /gzhan dag rnams la ni 'jam pa'i steng du kun nas gram pa dang rab tu ltod pa'i smad g.yogs ltung ba nyid kyis brla rab tu gsal ba dang/ 'o ma 'dzin pa dag gi steng du mu tig gi har rnam par 'khrugs par gyur ba dang/ rnam par
224b3(mdo 'grel): gtor ba mi mnyam pa'i lag dar gyi ljon shing dang ldan pa shi ba rnams dang 'dra ba'i las rnams gnas par gyur to/ /gzhan dag gis kyang rdza rnga la rnam par zhugs bar byas ba'i nyis 'gyur gyi dbang ba'i rten la rnam par bzhag ba'i gdod can snyan
224b4(mdo 'grel): las rnam par ltung zhing de ltar nyid du nyal bar gyur te/ la la zhig gi gnyid kyis sor me rnams kyi 'bad bas 'phrog ba'i lag pa las ma mchu dang rnam par 'brel pa'i bu ga dang po can du bud med kyi mig gi 'bras bu ltar sngo ba'i gling bu lhung bar
224b5(mdo 'grel): gyur to/ /mche ba gnyis pa rnams kyis rnam par gnon pa'i padmo rnams ltar gnas skabs sna tshogs pa'i de rnams kyi gzugs mthong nas mar med rnams kyis rgod pa dang 'dra ba ste/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' gzhon nu ma de rnams la smad pa
224b6(mdo 'grel): mjang nas mngon par bzhengs te/ phyi rol tu gshegs nas kyang mos pa blangs te gsungs ba/ srid pa'i rgya mtsho 'di ni kun nas rgal 'dod yid/ /dka' thub nags su 'gro phyir brtsod pa ste/ /de phyir bdag gi des pa bsgrub par bya ba'i phyir/ shugs
224b7(mdo 'grel): chen dad pa sngags ldan rta de khrid las shog /mos pas kyang gnas gtsang ma pa rnams kyis bskul bzhin pa rgyal po'i tshad pa la gus pa ma byas par de ltar bgyi zhes bya ba slar mnyan te/ mchan khung g.yon par ral gri bzung nas/ ca'i? mtsho?
225a1(mdo 'grel): dad pa sngags ldan khrid nas 'ongs so/ /byang chub sems dpa' zhon pa'i rta de la phyis rta kha khrid pa'i mos pa dang lhan cig tu/ gnod sbyin rnams lag pa'i mthil du rmig pa rnam par bzhag pa tho rangs kyi dus su nam mkha' nas drang
225a2(mdo 'grel): srong chen po a ra la'i spyil po dang nye bar 'jug cing gnas par gyur ces pa'o/ /de nas rgyan rnams gsal ba'i rin chen gzi brjid kyis/ /gsal ba des ni sku la phog par mdzad nas ni/ /rlabs dang ldan pa khu byug mgrin ba ltar nag pa'i/ /
225a3(mdo 'grel): mgo skyes rnams ni rim gyi ral gris bcad par mdzad/ /dad pa'i chu'i rten ni utpal gsal bar byas pa ltar/ /rgyan ni gsal ba de ni kun nas mthong ste mos pa ni/ /rab tu stobs can mya ngan sreg blugs za? bas kun gdungs ba/ /mu tig dang
225a4(mdo 'grel): mtshungs chu thigs rnams ni btang bar gyur/ /byang chub sems dpas gsungs pa/ chos la mngon du phyogs pa 'am skye bo dka' thub kyi nags su mngon par 'jug pa la skyes bu dam pas sdug bsngal bya bar 'os pa ma yin te/ de bas na
225a5(mdo 'grel): song zhig dang bdag gi bla ma'i skye bo la 'di skad ces smos shig /mi zad dka' thub kyis bdag ni/ /lus 'di yang ni zad 'gyur te/ /bdag gi go 'phang snyed pa 'am/ /de nyid mthong rnams kyis mthong gang/ /mos pas kyang de ltar bgyi zhes
225a6(mdo 'grel): byang chub sems dpa' la mngon par phyag btsal nas rta dang rgyan rnams blangs te/ rim gyi grong khyer du 'ongs nas/ /byang chub sems dpa' i lo rgyus de mi'i bdag po la zhus zhing gnas so/ /zas gtsar mas kyang de'i rnam par ngas pa gsan
225a7(mdo 'grel): nas btsun mo'i 'khor dang lhan cig tu rnam pa mang pos smre sngags 'don bar gyur to/ /byang chub sems dpas kyang rngon pa'i gzugs 'dzin par byed pa'i lha'i bu la rang go ri bong can gyi 'od zer rnams ltar mdzes pa'i na bza' gnyis kyis gos
225b1(mdo 'grel): dmar po dag nyos nas mnabs te/ rim gyis rim gyis a rA la'i spyil por phyin par gyur to/ /a rA las ni byang chub sems dpa' 'ongs pa mthong ste/ legs par 'ongs sam legs par 'ongs sam zhes brjod nas rang gi shing lo'i
225b2(mdo 'grel): khang par khrid nas pa'i gdan la bzhugs su bcug cing bde bar sngon du 'gro bas smra ba byas par gyur to/ /de nas byang chub sems dpas de la dris pa/ khyod rnams kyi chos ci lta bu/ ci ltar yang ni rtogs 'gyur te/ /de nyid mthong 'dod bdag la
225b3(mdo 'grel): ni/ /dam pa bdag gis gsungs par 'os/ /a rA las smras pa/ skal ba chen po mnyan par 'os zhes zer ro/ /rang bzhin dang rnam par 'gyur ba dag gi skye ba dang rga ba dang 'chi ba rnams de kho na nyid ces bya ba brjod pa ste/ rang bzhin yang
225b4(mdo 'grel): 'byung ba chen po lnga dang/ nga rgyal dang gsal ba zhes bya ba'o/ /rnam par 'gyur ba rnams ni dbang po rnams dang/ de'i yul rnams dang lag pa dang/ rkang pa dang/ ngag dang/ bshad sgo dang/ pho rtags dang/ yid ces pa'i zhing 'di rnams rnam par shes
225b5(mdo 'grel): pa zhing shes pa zhes bya bar brjod pa yin te/ zhing shes pa yang de kho na nyid shes pa rnams kyi bdag gsal bar smra ba yin no/ /gang zhig skye ba dang gnod pa dang zhi ba'i chos kyi bdag nyid de ni gsal ba zhes bya bar rtogs par bya'o/ /mi
225b6(mdo 'grel): gsal ba nyid ni de las bzlog pa ste de ltar ming shes pa dang las dang sred pa ni 'khor ba'i rgyur rnam par shes par bya'o/ /gsum po la gnas pa'i shed du? ni snying stobs 'da' bar byed nas 'jug pa ma yin te/ rkyen dang dral ba dang/ nga rgyal dang
225b7(mdo 'grel): the tshom dang/ rnam par kun nas 'chos pa dang/ khyad par med pa dang/ thabs ma yin pa dang/ chags pa 'di/ mngon par lhung ba rnams te/ de la rkyen dang bral ba zhes bya ba ni phyin ci log tu 'jug pa'o/ /bdag ni mngon par smra ba dang/ bdag ni shes
226a1(mdo 'grel): pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni nga rgyal lo/ /gang zhig the tshom med pa'i dngos po rnams kyang 'dag pa'i ri lu ltar gcig pa'i dngos pos mthong ba de ni the tshom zhes bya bar shes par bya'o/ /gang zhig bdag de rnams nyid blo dang las rnams so/ /
226a2(mdo 'grel): gang zhig tshogs 'di de ni bdag ces bya ba mngon par kun nas mchongs pa smra ba yin no/ /khyad par med pa ni slar rab tu sad pa dang ma sad pa dag gi rang bzhin med pa rnams kyi khyad par shes pa nyid de de ni khyad par med pa ste zhes bya bar shes par bya'o/ /
226a3(mdo 'grel): swAhA byed pa dang/ bshad byed pa dang/ bsang gtor mngon par bsang gtor lags pa rnams ni thabs ma yin pa zhes bya bar shes par bya'o/ /dngos po gang la shes rab dang/ yid dang dag dang/ blo dang las rnams kyi chags pa nye bar 'gro ba de ni
226a4(mdo 'grel): chags pa zhes bya bar brjod pa yin no/ /'di ni bdag gi yin no/ /'di bdag ces bya ba gang zhig sdug bsngal rlom sems pa de ni mngon par lhung ba'o/ /srog chags rnams kyi 'khor ba'i le lo zhes bya ba'o/ /mun dang gti mug dang rga ba dang 'chi ba dang
226a5(mdo 'grel): skye ba rnams te/ gti mug chen po ni 'dod pa zhes bya bar min btags pa'o/ /mun pa ni khro ba zhes bya bar shes par gyis shig/ slar ni sdug bsngal dmus long nyid mun par brjod pa yin te/ /ma rig pa 'di chigs pa lnga dang ldan pas rmongs pa bcings
226a6(mdo 'grel): pa yid can skye ba lags pa'i sdug bsngal chen po la yang nas yang du 'jug pa yin te/ der yang bdag ni mthong ba po dang/ nyan pa po dang/ shes pa po dang/ 'bras bu dang rgyu zhes bya ba 'di ltar ma shes nas 'khor par yongs su 'khor ba yin te/ rgyu
226a7(mdo 'grel): 'di rnams kyi ni skye ba'i rgyun gyi 'jug pa mthong ba yin te rgyu med pas skye ba med pa zhes bya ba'o/ /de la thar pa 'dod pas rab tu sad pa dang rab tu /sad pa dag dang gsal ba dang mi gsal ba dag shes par bya'o/ /bzhi po 'di rtogs nas zhing shes pa sdug
226b1(mdo 'grel): bsngal thams cad las rnam par grol te mi bzad pa'i go 'phang thob par 'gyur zhes bya ba ste/ thog mar khyim gyi 'ching ba khod nad sa bon dor nas ni/ /rtags ni bzung nas thar pa'i bde ba nye bar 'dod pa yi/ /chog shes dang ni ldan pa bla med go 'phang thob
226b2(mdo 'grel): 'dod pa/ /tshul khrims rnam par dag pa nyer bzung nags nang gnas par bya/ /phyis ni chags pa chags bral ngag las rab tu byung ba'i 'jigs pa dang bde ba dag shes nas dbang po'i tshogs thams cad tshar bcad nas yid kyis zhi ba la dmigs te/ de
226b3(mdo 'grel): nas 'dod pa rnams dang/ sdang ba la sogs pa rnam par dben pa las skyes pa'i bsam gtan dang po rtog pa dang bcas pa thob pa yin no/ /nges kyang rnam ba 'di lta bu'i 'dod pa la sdang zhing smod pa dang ldan pa tshangs pa'i 'jig rten rtog par 'gyur ro/ /
226b4(mdo 'grel): rnam par rtog la de rnams kyang yid kun nas 'khrug par byed pa shes nas rnam par bral ba'i dga' ba dang bde ba'i bdag nyid tsan? bsam gtan gnyis pa thob pa yin no/ /dga' ba nges kyang yid 'phrog par gyur pa 'od gsal gyi lha rnams su skye ba
226b5(mdo 'grel): yin te/ gang zhig slar dga' ba'i bde ba de las sems 'don par byed pa de ni gsum pa bde ba dang dga' ba dag dang rnam par bral ba'i bsam gtan gsum pa thob pa yin no/ /de tsam gyi bde ba la yid nub pa de dge rgyas kyi lha rnams su skye bso
226b6(mdo 'grel): sor thob pa yin no/ /bde ba de lta bu thob nas gang zhig btang snyoms byed pa de ni zhib bde ba dang sdug bsngal rnam par bral ba'i bsam gtan nye bar thob pa yin te/ de ni tshe ring ba nyid kyi kha cig ni grol ba nyid nges par byed pa yin no/ /ci'i phyir zhe na/ bde
226b7(mdo 'grel): ba dang sdug bsngal rnam par gcad ba'i phyir dang/ sems la bya ba med pa'i phyir ro/ /bsam gtan 'di yis 'bras bu che ba'i lha rnams su thun mong gi 'bras bu mkhas pa rnams smra ba yin te/ ting nge 'dzin de las langs nas lus can rnams kyi skyon rnams
227a1(mdo 'grel): mthong ste/ lus rnam par bzlog pa'i phyir ye shes rtogs par 'gyur ro/ /bsam gtan de yang spangs nas khyad par 'dod pa gzugs las shin tu 'dod chags dang bral ba yin te/ lus 'di la sdug bsngal rnams gang zhig yod
227a2(mdo 'grel): pa de rnams ni dang por blo yis kun nas lta bar byed cing sdug cing mthug pa'i yang rdzas rnams la yang nam mkhar lhag par mos pa skyed par byed de/ nam mkha' la song ba'i bdag nyid mngon par bsdus nas nam mkha' mdza' yas pa mthong zhing khyad par rtog pa'i
227a3(mdo 'grel): phyir dang/ bdag nyid la mkhas pa yin pa'i phyir bdag nyid la bsdus te cung zed med ces bya ba ni ci yang med pa zhes bya ba'i 'du shes su nye bar song ba lus dang bral ba'i grol ba zhes brjod pa yin no/ /byang chub sems dpas smras pa/ gal te sems
227a4(mdo 'grel): pa po yod na/ /grol ba ga las 'byung bar 'gyur/ /dge dang mi dge'i bya ba rnams/ /de yod la ni 'jug pa yin/ /ji ltar yang chu dang sa rnam par bral bas sa bon ni gang gis kyang rab tu btsugs pa mthong ba ma yin te/ de'i rkyen las rnam par bcugs
227a5(mdo 'grel): pa mthang ba ma yin no/ /de bzhin du bdag kyang bzung bar bya'o/ /las dang mi shes pa dang sred pa dor bas thar pa gang gi nges pa yin pa de ni bdag po yod pa la de yongs su dor ba dmigs par 'gyur ba ma yin te/ de yongs su mdor ba ni thar pa gal
227a6(mdo 'grel): yod/ de ltar nga rgyal yongs su dor ba ni bdag yod pa gal 'gyur/ /nga rgyal yod pa la yang skye ba'i rgyun mi gnas ba nyid yin te zhes bya bar gsungs nas/ sbyil po de las a rA la'i/ /blo gros chen po de byung nas/ /dka' thub dka' ba drag rnams
227a7(mdo 'grel): kyis/ /lus ni skam zhing bzhugs par gyur/ /dka' thub 'dis ni de kho na nyid rtogs par 'gyur ba ma yin snyam du dgongs te langs nas/ /kun nas stobs chung ba'i lus can byang chub sems dpas chu bo na rany+dza la khrus mdzad nas/ dga' mdzes kyis phul
227b1(mdo 'grel): ba'i bsod snyoms gsol nas dus kyi lto 'phye'i rgyal pos mngon par bstod pa/ de ni rtsa sha'i phreng bas rgya che sngo ba'i sgros/ /kun nas dmar ser yan lag can gyi sku khyab pa/ /mtsho skyes rnams kyi rab tu g.yo ba'i 'dab ma can/ /utpal sngon po'i mdab ma
227b2(mdo 'grel): sred pa'i 'phreng ba ltar/ /de nas gos pa dal gshegs nas/ /blo ldan gser gyi ri ltar 'ong/ /byang chub shing gi 'og tu ni/ /byang chub phyir ni de bzhugs gyur/ /de nas bu mo rnams lhan cig /me tog gi gzhu blangs nas ni/ /de yi yid ni dkrug pa'i
227b3(mdo 'grel): phyir/ /yid kyi skye gnas kun nas 'ongs/ /shir Sha'i me tog sar pa ni/ /de yi mdun du bsgom byed cing/ /'bras bu kun g.yo lta ba ni/ /la la zhig gis cung zad bzung/ /grogs mo'i rna bar gzhan gyis ni/ /rgod pa sngon 'go ci'ang smras/ blo ldan de la
227b4(mdo 'grel): lta ba ni/ /sgeg dang bcas par gtang cing gnas/ /gzhan dag me tog du ba ni/ /mig ni ngo tsha bar byed cing/ /gos ni mtshan ma las lhung ba/ /ska rag lhod pa bkag par gyur/ /zla ba ltar mjes lang tso 'di ni gang du ste/ /dka' thub 'di ni gang
227b5(mdo 'grel): du e ma 'di ni 'gal/ /yul rnams nyams su myong nas 'di ltar rigs pa ste/ /yongs su smin pa khyed kyis 'bras bu thob pa'i phyir/ /phan par 'dod pa nyid kyi khyed la smra ba ste/ /dus min yongs su ngal du 'jug pa ci phyir lus/ /de ltar la la 'dud
227b6(mdo 'grel): pa'i yan lag can ni smra ba ste/ /yan lag med cing so sor gnod pa'i che de la/ /de ltar la la 'dod pa'i yan lag smras par gyur/ /khyed la ngan 'gror phrad 'dod bud med rnams la ni/ /blo ldan khyed kyi rjes su mthun min ci phyir 'di/ /'di ltar de la
227b7(mdo 'grel): mngon par smras gyur la la zhig /pad+ma'i mdab ma rnams ni sen mos btubs byed cing/ /gang gi tshe de rnams la byang chub sems dpas brnyas pa dang bcas pa'i lta ba sbyin par ma byas pa de'i tshe bdud kyi bka' byed rnam pa du mar 'gyur ba'i
228a1(mdo 'grel): gdong can de rnams la smras pa/ 'jigs su bcug nas 'di bslang bar gyur cig ces bya ba'o/ /de nas seng ge'i gdong la ni/ /hUi? byas pas ni yar? yang du/ /me stog 'od ni 'phro ba yi/ /'bar ba'i gdong las grol bar gyur//
228a2(mdo 'grel): de rnams de yi bka' byed gdong las byung/ /lhung zhing skad cig gis gsungs te/ /rab rgyas mya ngan me tog nyid/ /byang chub sems dpa' i steng du 'phangs/ /me ldan 'khor lo su zhig gis/ /rnam rgyas ze'u 'bru'i tshogs ldan pa/ /utpal
228a3(mdo 'grel): yi mgo phreng gyur/ /so bsdams gzhan dag nyid kyis ni/ /glog bzhin kham pa'i smin ma can/ /kha ba'i rtse mo steng du 'bebs/ /kun da'i phung po nyid du 'gyur/ /gzhan dag gser skya'i mig can ni/ /ral gri dang bcas dpung pa bteg/ lcags kyi
228a4(mdo 'grel): ka ba'i grib ma 'dra/ /skad cig mi g.yo nyid du gyur/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das byang chub shing gi 'og tu bzhugs byas nas/ /'phro ba'i mig gi me can dka' bzhin du ni byed rnams kyis ni tshogs/ /dkar ba min par 'gro ba'i grogs kyis kun nas
228a5(mdo 'grel): rab tu bskul bzhin pa/ /nags kyi me ni kun tu chu dang nye las bzhin du zhig par gyur/ /me teg rgyal mtshan dang ldan pa 'khor gyi skye ba dang bcas par song ba na/ /bcom ldan 'das de bsam gtan bzhi pa las bzhengs te 'di bsams
228a6(mdo 'grel): par gyur te/ gal te skye ba sngon yod na/ /las rnams kyis ni 'jug pa min/ /las las byung ba'i skye ba med/ /las med na yang lus can gyi/ /gzugs dang skal bzang skal ba sogs/ /dbye ba ji? ltar 'dod ni 'dod/ /'on te sngon du las
228a7(mdo 'grel): yod na/ /ma skyes pa la ga las te/ /mkhas pas 'di ltar 'gal mthong nas/ /'khor ba'i 'og ma rtog mi byed/ /gal te rgyu med 'gro ba yin na/ /su zhig las rang nyid smra 'gyur/ /rgyu med par ni thar pa yang/ /rtag tu grub pa nyid du 'gyur/ /rgyu mad
228b1(mdo 'grel): par ni lcags kyang 'di/ /bskyed pa nyid du 'gyur ba min/ /la la dbang phyug rgyu yin pa/ /mi mkhas pa rnams smra bar byed/ /gal te dbang phyug gzhan gyis byas/ /de 'dir dbang phyug nyid ga las/ /'on te ma sprul nyid skyes pa/ /de las gzhan ni cis mi skye/ /de
228b2(mdo 'grel): phyir dbang phyug smra ba 'di/ /bdag gi slad du don med nyid/ /de ltar 'khor ba'i 'khor lo 'di/ /yang dang yang du 'khor bzhin pa'i/ /nam yang mkhas pa rnams kyis ni/ /thog ma dmigs par 'gyur ba min/ /nam mkha' i khams 'di ni rlung dang me dang chu dang
228b3(mdo 'grel): sa rnams kyi kun nas 'brel pa ni lus zhes brjod pa yin no/ /de yang rnam par shes pa'i khams la brten nas 'gro ba dang 'ong ba la sogs pa'i bya ba rnams byed do zhes bya ba ste/ de ltar gnas pa la skyes bu nye bar btags par byas zhes byas/ zhes zer
228b4(mdo 'grel): ro? /de nas bcom ldan 'das mngon par rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob nas du ma rnams kyi mi shes pa'i rab rib bsal bar mdzad de/ grong khyer ser skyar byon nas zas gtsang ma la legs pa'i lam gsal bar mdzad de/ /de ltar bcom ldan 'das de 'gro
228b5(mdo 'grel): ba ma lus pa rnams kyi sdug bsngal nye bar zhi bar bya ba'i don du yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar nus kyang shin tu ring por 'khor ba na kun nas 'khor bar? gyur to/ /zhes bya ba ste/ blo chen de ni byang chub phyir/ /lag tu gtad ltar sbyin byas te/ /yun ring
228b6(mdo 'grel): shes rab pha rol phyin/ /dam pa bde bar gnas pa yin/ /e ma gal te chos ni mun pa 'joms/ /bde gshegs kyis gsungs 'di ni rnam dpyod nas/ /dri mas khyab pa'i lta bas mthong ba'i phyir/ /skye bos 'di ni gzhan 'dod rten mi 'gyur/ /de bzhin
228b7(mdo 'grel): gshegs pa'i dri med gsung yang yod pa zhes bya la/ /rmongs pa lam ngan song ba'i skye bo 'di ni kun nas 'khor/ /ri bong mtshan pa mngon gsher la ni gang zhig mi zum pa/ /dman pa'i blo de song zhing ji ltar ltung bar 'gyur ba min// //yang dag
229a1(mdo 'grel): rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'dod/ /byang chub sems dpa' i spyod pa ni/ /seng ge zhabs 'bring pas byas 'di/ /chos 'dod rnams kyi phreng ba byas pa 'di skyes pa'i rabs kyi phreng ba byas pa yi/ /dge ba cung zad gang zhig bdag gi bsams/ /de yis 'gro ba 'di ni bde gsheD kyi/ /'dod
229a2(mdo 'grel): pa la dmigs thar pa'i phyir gyur cig /rab 'gro gnya' ral can brgya byin/ /khra can don kun grub ldan pa/ /lnga yis lhag pa'i sum cu 'dir/ /thub pa chen po'i skyes rabs rnams/ /rig pa sgra'i bstan bcos cha ni rnams mang po shes nas sangs rgyas kyi
229a3(mdo 'grel): yang gsung/ phyi ma'i snyan dngags mkhan gyi zla bas sa ni snyan ngag 'od rnams kyi ni rab gsal byas/ /kha cher nye bar 'tshe ba'i skyon gyis rnam par gdungs pa shes nas phyi rol 'gro 'dod pas/ /ri dbang kha ba can la seng ge zhabs 'bring las ni
229a4(mdo 'grel): srog rnams dor nas mtho ris bsong/ /rgyal po'i sras slob dpon seng ge zhabs 'bring pas mdzad pa'i skyes pa'i rabs kyi phreng ba rdzogs so// //dge slong dpal ldan blo gros 'byung gnas zhes bya mkhas pa ni/ /sems can rnams
229a5(mdo 'grel): la chos dang zang zing kun nas 'god mdzad cing/ /tshad ma dang ni lung dang rgyud rnams du ma la 'dris pas/ /'gro ba'i mnga' bdag gi ni spyod pa 'di la gnyis po dag /gzhal du med cing dri ma med pa kun nas bsags te de las 'di/ /nyon mongs shes
229a6(mdo 'grel): bya'i sgrib pa'i dri mchog bzhin du myur spangs sngon du 'gro ba ni/ /de dang de'i skyes rabs yongs bzung 'gro ba sdug bsngal rgya mtsho las ni gdon byas te/ /mthar yang thub dbang rnams bzhin mdza' dag bya byas sangs rgyas khams gsum du ni khyed 'byung
229a7(mdo 'grel): shog/ lcang lo can gyi bum pa zhes bya mkhas dang lhan cig 'di nyid du/ /gang zhig tshul khrims 'byung gnas skad gnyis pas ni 'di ltar chog bzhin/ /bdud las rnam par rgyal ba'i spyod pa shin tu rnam dag yangs pa ni/ /skye bo ma lus pa la
229b1(mdo 'grel): phan pa'i don du de yis yang dag bsgyur/ /rgya gar gyi mkhan po paN+Ti tA laM ka de ba'i zhabs dang/ bod kyi lo tsA ba shAkya'i dge slong tshul khrims 'byung gnas sbas pas dpal gyi sgye'u ri'i rtsa chos skor dben sa'i gtsug khang du bsgyur// //
229b2(mdo 'grel): */ (/'jig rten kun tu dga' ba'i zlos gang tsanda? go nas mdzad pa'o//) */ rgya gar skad du /lo kA nanda nA Ta? kanda ma/ bod skad du/ 'jig rten kun tu dga' ba'i zlos gar zhes bya ba/ thams cad mkhyen pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bung ba'i phreng ba mi gsal sgra sgrogs rkang pa mdab
229b3(mdo 'grel): ma rnams bskyod pas/ /ge sar kha 'bus ro bcud dang bcas rdul phran tshogs pas khyab gyur cing/ /sbrang rtsi rgya chen thig les rnam khengs me tog thal mo sbyar ba 'dis/ bdag gis rgyal ba'i zhabs la mchod pas khyed rnams la ni zhi bar mdzod/ /gzhan
229b4(mdo 'grel): yang byams pa'i thugs ni rgya chen dga' bas mgul nas yang dag 'khyud gyur pa/ /khyed kyi snying rjes bdag cag kyang ni de bzhin btang snyoms mchungs mdzad rigs /legs pa'i lha mo grags 'dzin mdzad bzhin bdag cag gis ni rjes mi 'gro/ /bdud
229b5(mdo 'grel): kyi bu mos phrag dog gis smras khyed rnams sangs rgyas rtogs par shog /rdzogs byang chub la bdud ni khro bas skad cig gzhu bkang de yi sde tshan rnams/ /gang gis rnam par bros pas bub cing log 'dren zhabs kyis mnan te mngon skad 'byin/ /lus
229b6(mdo 'grel): med bu mo myos byed ma rnams mchi mdzag? 'chi med rnams kyis mthong nas dga' / /stebs bcu mnga' ba'i sngon 'gro gzhan gyis mi thub mas ni khyad rnams skyong bar shog/ dga' byed kyis mchod pa'i mdza' las mdo 'dzin pa'o/ /snyan? ngag tsan+d+rA dA sha yA/ /zlos
229b7(mdo 'grel): gar 'jig rten kun tu dga' / /sngon med zlos gar rab sbyar bas/ /di ring tshogs la bdag gi ston/ /de ni nges par snyan ngag nyid/ /shar phyogs dza tU ka ra Na'i rigs las ni/ /lha mo rgyal ma yid kyi shing rta las/ /gang 'khrungs khur na 'khur bar mi nus kyang//
230a1(mdo 'grel): de'i bu zhes rab tu grags pa thob/ /gzhan yang rab 'byam rgyan dang bcas shing tshigs bcad rkyang pa mkhas pa'i 'jug dogs rgya chen rnams/ /gang gis dngos po gcig gi brjod byas la yang rgya chen zad par ma gyur dang/ /gang gi byA kA ra Na ni
230a2(mdo 'grel): nyung zhing rab gsal yongs rdzogs gzhan yang mdzad gyur nas/ /'jig rten chags dang 'jig rten mun pa'i tshogs chen rab tu 'joms mdzad gyur/ /de nas dan rol cha dang bcas te rtsom pa na re zhig rang gi 'phags ma la bos te/ kye 'phags ma
230a3(mdo 'grel): re zhig 'dir byon ces so/ /de nas de'i gdung ba'i shugs dang bcas te rab tu zhugs nas/ kye 'phags pa bdag 'ongs so bka' sgos shig ces so/ /mdo 'dzin pa nas kye 'phags pa ci'i phyir khyod sdug bsngal bar byed/ zlos gar man? sa ci'i phyir sdug
230a4(mdo 'grel): bsngal mi 'gyur te/ /ji ltar khyod kyi ming tsam gyis kyang ni/ /gnas rnams yang dag 'dren nus bu gcig po/ /nges bar bdag ni rab tu byung nas ni/ /rang lus 'bras bcas bsgrub par bya zhes smra/ /mdo 'dzin pa nas 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' ma yin
230a5(mdo 'grel): no zlos gar ma nas kye 'phags pa de byang chub sems dpa' ma yin na nam mkha' las kyang ma lhung zhing rnam par 'dzin byed kyi mthil brtol nas kyang ma byung ngo/ /zhes smra zhing gang zhig 'dir snying rje skye bo'i phyir 'tsho bar spro ba de ni byang chub sems
230a6(mdo 'grel): dpa' zhes brjod do/ /mdo 'dzin pa nas/ 'phags ma de de bzhin te/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ni/ /snying rje'i sa bon la skyes pa'i/ /byang chub sems kyi myu gu 'khrungs/ /pha rol phyin pa'i yal 'dab rgyas/ /dpag bsam shing bzhin dgos 'dod
230a7(mdo 'grel): rnams/ /sdug bsngal ba des chog go /'di'i bsod nams kyi stobs las de bzhin du dpal du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /yang dag pa'i rol mo rtsom par mdzod cig dang/ zlos gar mnas/ kye 'phags pa 'dir yang dus gang la brten yang dag pa'i rol
230b1(mdo 'grel): mo brtsam par bgyi/ mdo 'dzin ma nas/ kye 'phags ma 'dir re zhig gsar du mngon par byung blhan cig byed pa'i snying ma'i dris yongs su khyab pa me tog gi phreng ba len pa sprang rtsi byed pa'i rigs kun tu dga' zhing rtse ba me tog gi dus la
230b2(mdo 'grel): brten la glu long zhig/ 'di lta ste/ padmo rnams ni ba mos rigs nyams 'od ldan gang zhig shar nas dbugs rnams 'byin/ /de bzhin mkhas pa'i lho phyogs rlung rnams kyis ni 'jig rten yang dag tshim par byed/ /phyogs rnams pa lA shA yi ljon shing
230b3(mdo 'grel): me tog sha dral bzhin du shin tu dmar/ /bsil mer 'od zer 'gro ba rnams kyi gtsug gi nor bzhin gsal po yang dag gnas/ /yol ba'i nang nas ngo mtshar che/ /ngo mtshar che zhes so/ /ngo mtshar che zhes so/ /mdo 'dzin ba nas/ rna bar thos
230b4(mdo 'grel): nas/ 'di su zhig yin/ nges par brtags pas/ kun nas shes te/ rig 'dzin ma yis gzhon nu gtsug na nor bu 'di mthong nas/ /rab dga' g.yo zhing rang gi lag pa'i pad+ma gar rtse zhing/ /nam mkha' rkang gdub rtse la gos kyi 'od zer reg gyur nas/ /gang/
230b5(mdo 'grel): ldan ri bo'i rtse mo la ni rab tu rgyu bar byed/ /bdag cag rnams kyang ji ltar mngon par 'dod pa phun sum tshogs pa brtsam mo/ zhes zer nas/ gnyis po nges par zhugs te/ mngon du phyogs nas gnas so/ /de nas rig 'dzin ma rab tu zhugs te gar byed
230b6(mdo 'grel): cing ats+tsha rI a ats+tsha rI aM/ gang gis skye bo 'di 'dras chen steng/ lha rnams kyis kyang shin tu mthong bar?  dka' / /rab stu dga' bas gzhan gyi dbang gyur pa/ /dga' ba'i grogs mo pad ma wa tIng la/ /bdag gi khur ni yang dag gtad byas nas/ /nam
230b7(mdo 'grel): zhig yod par gyur te bdag mi shes/ /zhes nas yongs su zhugs so/ /gang gis 'ongs pa dang 'dug pa rang mi dran par dga' ba'i grogs mo'i bsti gnas su phyin te/ bdag nyid ngo mtshar che nas rab tu zhugs so/ /'dir ji ltar sbrang rtsi byed pa'i rkang pa'i khur gyis
231a1(mdo 'grel): me tog rab tu rgyas pa'i rdul gyis tshogs pas khyab pa'i rdo leb kyi steng nA ga gsar gyi srang lam du byas pa la dga' ba'i grogs mo pad+ma ba ti ni sbrang gi bu mo dang ldan cig gnas shing cung zad cung zad smra zhing 'khor de/ drung du
231a2(mdo 'grel): nye bar 'ongs so/ /de nas sprang gi bu mo dang pad+ma can rab tu zhugs te/ pad ma can nas/ kye sbrang rtsi'i bu mo bdag gi snying myos pa snyam byed do/ /zhes dga' ba'i gro rin chen phreng ma la lta bar byed cing/ ci'i phyir na de tsam du yang mi 'ong bar gyur/ rig
231a3(mdo 'grel): 'dzin mas nye bar thos nas kye pad ma can sems gtor bar ma byed ces zer/ 'dir de dag gnyis na re a re dga' / a re dga' zhes smro zhing gnyis bo rtab rtab por langs song nas/ a i ci yin ci yin rig 'dzin ma nas kun gyi lta
231a4(mdo 'grel): byed rnams kyis blta bar 'os pa bdag gis mthong ste/ mig gi 'bras bu thob bo/ /gnyis po nas khyod kyi mi mthong smros shig /rig 'dzin ma ni slar yang de nyid smra bar byed do/ /gnyis pos yang 'dri zhing rig 'dzin ma la pad+ma can rab tu 'khyud do//
231a5(mdo 'grel): bdag ni rab tu dga' ba'i gzhan dbang du gyur te gal te bdag gis dbyangs can ma la bar snyed na ni smra'o/ /gnyis po nas/ khyod kyi dga' ba de shin tu ci mo zhig zhugs pa 'dra'o/ /rig 'dzin ma nas 'di ni gzhan mthong nas kyang de la dga' ba chen po
231a6(mdo 'grel): mthong ngo/ /gnyis po nas bdag nyid gcig po 'gegs pas cho ga gam/ bdag cag la yang cha shas legs par dgos mdzod/ rig 'dzin ma nas/ bdag gis mtho ba dul ba'i mdangs ldan pa/ /'od zer rab tu 'dren pa 'phro ba can/ /phyogs
231a7(mdo 'grel): bzhi chos rnams ma lus sgyu rtsal tshogs /yongs su zhugs rnams mig ni dga' bar byed/ /gnyis po nas/ legs lhan ma zla pa'am ci zhig /rig 'dzin ma khros te/ de bzhin du bdag gis ma smras pa rang mchog go /kye 'di ni ri dags kyis mtshon te de la
231b1(mdo 'grel): mchungs par byed dam/ gnyis po nas/ yang na myos byed dam/ rig 'dzin ma nas/ gang de'i sbyor ba dang bral na hUM zhes byed cing byin za'i rtse mo la phye ma leb dang 'dra ba ni dul ba'i mdangs dang ldan zhing mdzes par rab tu brkyang dam/ gnyis po nas/ gang
231b2(mdo 'grel): ji ltar yin pa smros dang/ rig 'dzin ma nas bdag gi smra bar bya yis legs par de legs par nyon cig /'di nas rig 'dzin ma skye bo'i gtam phan tshun smra ba las gzhon nu gtsug na nor bu 'di 'dra'o/ /zhes thos pas ya mtshan che nas dga' ba dang
231b3(mdo 'grel): lhan cig sA ke ta'i grong khyer du bdag gis phyin no/ /de nas rgyal po tshangs byin gyi lha mo 'od kyi blo gros ma la khye'u zhig yang dag par 'khrungs te/ gzhan gyis bsgrun par mi nus shing gzugs dang phun sum tshogs pas rnam par spras pa mchog gi
231b4(mdo 'grel): snying rje can gang 'dod pa kun sbyin pa gzhon nu gtsug na nor bu zhes pa bdag gi mthong ngo/ /de yang mthong ba na/ kun gyi mngon par 'dod pa'i don phun sum tshogs pa grub pa'o/ /rgyal po gang zhig gis bu mo'i ched du de'i sku gzugs dang dbyibs
231b5(mdo 'grel): kyi bkod pa thad ka la ri mor bris te khyer ba la bar du rig 'dzin ma rnams kyis brkus te 'khyer bar byed do/ /gnyis po mngon par 'dod pa 'phel te/ slar yang de gang na yod/ /rig 'dzin ma nas/ nor 'dzin 'di nyid na'o/ /gnyis po nas khyod ni mkha' 
231b6(mdo 'grel): la 'gro ba 'bras bu dang bcas te 'thob bo/ /gang ji lta ba de bzhin du mngon par 'dod pa yid 'phrog pa rnams/ /khrod kyi gang bar thob bo/ /rig 'dzin ma nas/ kye ma rings dang khyed cag gi yang mngon par 'dod pa yongs su 'gyur gyis/ sbrang rtsi'i bu mo
231b7(mdo 'grel): nas/ gang las bdag cag la 'di'i skal ba sus ster bar byed/ rig 'dzin ma nas /yang skyon cig 'dug zer/ gnyis po nas/ skyon gang yin smros shig /rig 'dzin ma nas/ gang gis na de khyim thab bya ba las phyir phyogs so/ /mA d+ha bi dang bad ma ba ti
232a1(mdo 'grel): dag 'jig rten yid bzhin gyi nor bu ni shin tu dkon no/ /bi d+hA rI nas/ bdag gi de kyi? ngo mtshar che ba gzhan yang dran te/ yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i gtam gyis yid bzhin gyi nor bu ni ji lta ba bzhin du de la lhan cig skyes pa'i gtsug na nor
232a2(mdo 'grel): bu'o/ /mAd+ha bi nas acatshar? aM baryI d+ha ri nas ci'i phyir 'di ngo mtshar tshe/ nam mkha' spyod yul gyis skye bo de mthong dam/ mA d+hashI nas/ bdag cag gis mthong ba'i thas 'ga' zhig yod dam/ bdIryA? d+ha rI nas ma yin te bdag gis khyer 'ongs so/ /gnyid
232a3(mdo 'grel): po ngo tsha zhing rtab rtab por phyogs rnams su blta zhing/ de gang na gang na zhes so/ /rig 'dzin mas bdag gis stod gos kyi seb nas/ thad ka la ri mo bros? po de phyung nas/ bstan ne/ /gnyis pa ngo mtshar nas nges par bltas nye/ gnas tshul ni rin
232a4(mdo 'grel): chen phreng ba ma'i phyogs 'dra bzhig go /mA d+ha bA dang/ pad mA gnyi? dag nas/ khyod kyi don med pa'i dga' ba 'phel bar byas te/ khyod bzhin du legs pa'i nyams dang bcas so/ /grogs mo dga' ba bdag skyon ci mchis smros shig /pad ma can
232a5(mdo 'grel): yun ring du nges par bltas nas/ 'di la skyon cig mchis so/ /rig 'dzin ma khros te/ skyon gang smros dang/ pad+ma can sbrang gi bu mos mthong nas sbrang gi bu mo nas/ smra bar mi nus pa'o zhes zer/ rig 'dzin ma nas/ kyo pad+ma ba ti gdung bar ma
232a6(mdo 'grel): byed cig/ khyod kyi yang bdag gis thang ka gcig ri mor bris te b+ha mo 'od kyi blo gros ma la byin pa dang/ nye bar bltas nas/ de yang mngon bar dga' nas 'di tsam zhig bag ma dang mna' ma'i gdong pa mthong ngo zhes smra'o/ /'dis lhan du
232a7(mdo 'grel): mna' ma byas nas shin tu spro'o/ zhes smra'o/ /pad+ma can khros te/ dga' ba'i grogs mo de bzhin du bco bar rig sam/ sbrang gi bu mo dga' nas de nas de nas zhes zer/ rig 'dzin ma nas/ de nas rgyal po tshangs sbyin gyis mngon du mthong ngo/ /gnyis
232b1(mdo 'grel): gar gyis bltas nas smra ba/ 'di ni gzhon nu la rjes su 'ongs so/ /'on kyang byed po'i dbang las so/ /de nas gnyis pos rim bris la mngon du bltas nas/ gang na spyod ba'i mi gzhon nu la ston du bcug go /de nas des yun ring du bltas nas/ shuD
232b2(mdo 'grel): nar phyung ngo/ /mAd+hA bI nas/ de'i mtshan nyid gang yin rig 'dzin ma nas/ lci ba'i skye bo ni rjes su chags so zhes pa'o/ /pad+ma ba ti ni gang mnyan par bya ba mnyan nas dus so/ /rig 'dzin ma ni nges skrag nas/ /ji ltar bdag gi bdud rtsi'i char
232b3(mdo 'grel): byin pas/ /dug gi rnam par khyab ba gyur/ /de 'dis slar yang ji ltar bcos par bya zhes so/ /yol ba'i nang du'o/ /de bzhin du de rnams gcig tu 'dir su 'od dam snyam mo/ /de nas drang srong dpon slob gnyis rab tu zhugs so/ /gnyis po'o/ khu'i?
232b4(mdo 'grel): rang bzhin mnyes gshin pa/ /yid gdung gang gis mi shes pa/ /de nyid gcig tu skyes bu lta/ /'jig rten na ni bde mchog thob/ /spyod pa'i bu nas/ bu mo pad+ma can ma pA ti me tog thur sod ba las ci ste yun ring du 'ger ro/ /ci'i phyir khyab 'jug gis
232b5(mdo 'grel): ni mtshon byed ma zhes stobs kyis khyer gyur ram/ /che zer byed pas zla ba'i cha zhes mi bzod 'od kyis rang nyid rnams zhugs sam/ /yang na rig 'dzin thabs dang phrad nas rig 'dzin yin zhes phyag byas khyer gyur tam/ /'di las bdag gis
232b6(mdo 'grel): sems 'dir rang dbang med par yang dag rab tu myos par 'gyur/ /slob mas smras pa/ kye mkhan po de ltar sems gdung mi 'tshal/ mkhan po'i mthu stobs ni sa gsum na sus kyang 'da' bar mi nus so/ /zhes zer nas gnyis po yongs su
232b7(mdo 'grel): zhugs so/ /drang srong gis phyogs rnams su bltas te/ mchi ma 'dzag cing /gal te dung ba'i rigs kyi lus ni rnam khebs zla rnams 'bras gyur nas/ /gdung ba'i zhugs shing tshad tshing gis sgribs pa'i khron pa rnams su lhung ba 'am/ /yang na zla
233a1(mdo 'grel): dang 'thabs pas de'i mi bzod brtse zhing rgyug bas lhung/ /yang na byis ba gcig bur du 'am bdag ni shin tu gdung par byed/ /thams cad kyi mnyam du thos shing mthong nas rtab rtab por gyur nas/ rig 'dzin ma nas/ Fyab yin nam ji ltar yin zhes zer ro/ /pad+ma can sprang gi bu mo dag ngo che dang bcas bzhin du bdag cag gis ji ltar smras pa/ yab kyis thos so/ /zhes zer ro/ /pad+ma pA ti nas s+thang shing tshang ching 'di'i nang du zhugs na yab kyis ma mthong
233a2(mdo 'grel): ba phyir log pa srid dam/ snyam nas zhugs so/ /rig 'dzin ma ni rtab rtab po nye bar btud de phyag byas so/ /drang srong nas/ dge bar gyur cig zer/ bris sku de mthong nas/ bu mo rin chen phreng ba ma 'di ci yin zer /rig 'dzin ma ni skrag nas bdag ni
233a3(mdo 'grel): nges par 'jigs pas na smra mi nus so/ /yab nyid kyis ting nge 'dzin gyis de bzhin du mngon du mdzod cig ces zer ro/ /drang srong gis bsam gtan bsgoms so/ /rig 'dzin ma ni shin tu 'jigs par gyur te/ 'dir yab kyis ci smra 'am snyam mo//
233a4(mdo 'grel): drang srong nas bu mo 'jigs des chog go/ kye 'di la ji lta ba de bzhin bdag dbang che'o zhes zer yang thams cad dga' ba dang bcas par gyur to/ /bdag cag rnams kyis 'dis dbugs phyung ngo snyam mo/ /drang srong nas/ sngon nas 'di'i yon
233a5(mdo 'grel): tan phun sum tshogs pa rnams ni nye bar thos te/ mngon par 'dod pa 'di ni mchog yin no/ rig 'dzin ma nas/ legs ldan gyis/ bdag cag rnams rjes su bzung ngo// sbrang gis bu mo nas /kye pad+ma pa ti/ the tshom nges tshog don rnams grub/ /yid
233a6(mdo 'grel): kyi shing rta las byung ba'i/ /nges par dka' thub skye bo yi/ /mngon par 'dod 'bras med mi 'gyur/ /drang srong nas/ bdag nyid chen po 'dir 'ongs pa/ re zhig ri mo las thob pa'ang mchod par 'os par bya'o/ /zhes smras rig 'dzin ma nas me tog blangS
233b1(mdo 'grel): nas phul lo/ /drang srong ges de la phul te nges par bltas te/ e ma mkhas pa zhig gis bris so/ /'di lta ste/ yang dag gnas kyis rab dbye 'dug stangs lta tshul dang/ phra sbom zug dang mtho dman rtsigs pa'i cha rnams dang/ /
233b2(mdo 'grel): zhib chags rnams dag mig ni rab tu g.yo ba 'dra/ /ya mtshan ri mo dag ni nges par smra ba bzhin/ /e ma bdag ni bu mo ni yid kyi shing rta rab tu dga' bar chags so/ /'di lta ste/ bdag nyid chen po de nyid ni/ /yul rnams la ni kha phyir
233b3(mdo 'grel): phyogs/ /gang gis de phyir gus pa yis/ /'di ni ji ltar 'byung bar 'gyur/ /bu mo rin chen phreng ba ma yang khyod kyi grogs mo dga' ma dag gang na yod shes sam rig 'dzin ma nas/ legs ldan khyod nyid mthong nas tshang tshing gis khang pa
233b4(mdo 'grel): 'dir zhugs so/ /drang srong nas/ pad+ma bA ti khyod kyis ji ltar ngo tsha yang bslabs sam/ bu pad ma can 'dir shog /pad+ma can ni ngo tsha bas 'dar zhing/ nye bar phyin te/ /drang srong gis pad+ma can mthong ste/ 'tsher ngo nges chog go /yid ches sems
233b5(mdo 'grel): ni the tshom med bar lta byed cing/ /lus ni rnam par ? g.yo med brtan zhing bkur 'dod med/ /byis pa'i blo gros ji bzhin khyod kyis rab dgar 'gyur/ /rang bzhin gyis mdzes ldan ma ci'i phyir 'di ngo tsha/ /pad+ma bA ti ni phyag 'tshal lo/ /drang srong ni spyi
233b6(mdo 'grel): po la nye bar gtugs te/ mngon par 'dod slar thob par gyur cig ces zer/ rig 'dzin ma gang gi skye bar gnas bas kye dga' ba'i grogs mo byed pa po yin no/ /gzhan du na lags ldan gyis dbyangs ci'i phyir 'jug par 'gyur/ /bdag kyang
233b7(mdo 'grel): don 'di la de bzhin du mngon par chags so/ /drang srong slob ma bram ze nas kye mkhan po myur du mdzod/ /rig byed kyi dus tshong la song ngo/ /drang srong nas/ ji ltar nyi ma gung gi dus la nye bar 'ong dam /'di lta ste/ di na? rab? shing gi grib ma rnams la rig
234a1(mdo 'grel): 'dzin rnams kyang bsnyel bso'i mdza' / /ljon pa'i bsil grib 'og tu ri dgas rnams ni skyug ldad? byed cing gnas pa dang/ /gtsugs shing yu ? chu rnams nyal zhing gnas ba dang/ btsugs yu 'gro med rtse mo rnams la lha'i sred
234a2(mdo 'grel): rdzas rnams kyi du ba yang dag 'khrigs/ /dpal ldan tshags bral bsod nams mchog gi mngon brjod pa/ /ma lus sa stengs grags pas 'gro ba gcig nyid rgyal/ /gang zhig zlos gar rang dbang nor gyis rab dga' i gar/ /dpal ldan tsan+t+ra go mi'i snyan
234a3(mdo 'grel): dag len zhing gnas/ /'dir thams cad nges par zhugs so/ /yan lag dang po rdzogs so// ? //de nas snga? 'jug ma rab tu zhugs te/ 'dir ni rgyal rigs lha'i 'jig rten 'dra bar mthong/ /ri mo'i bag ma'ang bag ma'i ltad mo 'di bzhin
234a4(mdo 'grel): no/ /gal te 'di ni bden pa yin na ji ltar 'gyur/ /de ci gzhan du sngon med mthong bar 'gyur zhes zer nas yongs su blta zhing zhugs so/ /rgyal phran grong mdza' i shin tu mdzes ma rnams/ /'di rnams 'dir ni de bzhin rnam par spras/ /rgyan gyi 'od zer 'di
234a5(mdo 'grel): bzhin 'phro ba yis/ /grong bar rnams khengs gos dmar byed bzhin no/ /de nas ji ltar dga' ba'i grogs mo lo ma can gyis mthong nas nges par bltas shing 'dir lo ma can dang/ de bzhin du gar byed cing 'ongs so/ /de nas lo ma can rab tu zhugs
234a6(mdo 'grel): te/ kye kun ta khyod nyon cig gsungs so/ 'di bzhin du bog ma'i ltad mo la btang snyoms su byed ba ci yin/ kun ta li ka nas/ k+te? ta ? lo ma can lha mos ni bag ma ltad mor byas mod kyis/ 'on kyang gzhon nu 'dir slar 'jug gam/ de nas bdag gis yid phyir
234a7(mdo 'grel): mi ldog bar byed ngo/ /lo ma can nas/ gang gi skye bo lci ba'i dka' / /nam zhig gzhon nus 'da' byed dam/ /rin chen 'byung gnas dus bslabs gyis/ /ci ste mchams las 'da' 'gyur ram/ /kun nyams 'dir lha mo nyid tshad ma'o/ /lo ma can nas/ gzhon nu
234b1(mdo 'grel): gnyan gyi spyod yul du 'dug pa 'di rnams song ngam/ /kun tas/ ma song ste 'di bzhin 'jug pa gzhon nu la smra ba ni lha mo 'od gyi blo gros ma nas/ bdag la 'phags pa gau ta ma'i nye 'khor ltos la 'phags pa gau ta ma la smros shig /de yang 'di bzhin du
234b2(mdo 'grel): grogs pas byas pa la chags pa yin gyis zhes zer ro/ /lo ma can nas/ ji ltar mngon par 'dod pa'i don phun sum tshogs te/ thams cad kyang rang gi gar rtse bar byed cing gnyis po yang gar byed do/ /lo ma can nges par bltas nas/ kye de bzhin yin
234b3(mdo 'grel): na 'dir 'phags pa gau tams legs ldan ma'i spyod pa'i rjes su 'gro zhing de bzhin du 'dir slar 'ong ngam zer nas/ de nas lha mo 'di bdag cag gis smrar 'deng ngo/ /zhes de dag song ste rab tu zhugs so/ /de nas rtse grogs bzhad gad pa rab tu zhugs so//
234b4(mdo 'grel): na mnyam dga' ba thub pa'i skye bo'i rjes su 'jug cing yang dag par spyod pa la lha mo 'od kyis blo gros ma'i skyes 'di'o/ /bdag cag gis snying la zug rdur gnas te/ de'i ri mor bris pa la yang bag ma'i ltad mo 'di smra zhing/ bag ma'i mtshan nyid
234b5(mdo 'grel): ngo/ /'dir bltas nas slar yang ji ltar 'jug par 'gyur bar 'gyur ba de lta de ltar 'dir yang de'i blo rnam par 'byed par bya ste/ gal te 'jig rten pha rol tu/ /bdag cag 'das par gyur na yang/ /rigs rgyud rnam bar chad gyur nas/ /mchan?
234b6(mdo 'grel): la chu bzhin rnam par 'chang/ /yang ji ltar smra na/ nyams dga' ba'i bya ba 'grub par 'gyur snyam nas nges par bltas ba nas/ der na mnyam dga' ba'i snga 'jug many+dzu rab tu dga' ba'i skyed mos tshal nas mthon byung ngo/ /re zhig 'di la 'dra'i
234b7(mdo 'grel): snyam ste/ kye mnyam dzul?/ na mnyam dga' ba gang na yod/ /nam mkha' la khyod ci zhig smra/ /de 'di na rab tu dga' ba'o/ /tshal na bzhugs so/ /der nye bar 'gro bar bya'o/ zhes rab tu zhugs nas bltas pa ba na gang zhig sbrang rtsi byed ba'i bshog
235a1(mdo 'grel): pa'i rlung gis rab tu bskyed nas me tog rnams ni kha bya ze 'bru'i rdul du 'khrigs shing gdong na bung ba rnams ni dzhi sgrogs shing 'khor bas 'khrigs so/ /na mnyam dga' ba ma mthong nas/ many+dzu las 'di na bzhugs zer te/
235a2(mdo 'grel): gal te gdug pa can gyi rig 'dzin mas 'di nas brkus te khyer ba ma yin nam/ zhes smras pa na/ rig 'dzin ma rab tu zhugs te/ mya ngan dang bcas nas/ ji srid bdag gis dga' ba'i grogs mo la/ /gzhon nu'i tshul 'di nye bar smras gyur
235a3(mdo 'grel): pa/ /de nas dga' grags pad+ma bA ti la/ /mgo la zur rdu yang dag skyes par gyur/ /lus ni nyal ba tsam thob pha ma yin pa shin tu gdung ba 'phel bar 'gyur te/ grogs mo'i skye bo yang shin tu gdung bar byed do/ /skabs dga' ba'i
235a4(mdo 'grel): grogs mo spangs te 'ongs? kyang ma 'ongs pa ji lta ba bzhin no/ /gzhon nu'i thugs kyang shin tu gdung bar byas so snyam?  nas/ lta zhing gzhon nu'i na mnyam mthun pa de bltas nas re zhig bar du 'di gang 'gro blta bar bya'o snyam mo/ /bzhad gang
235a5(mdo 'grel): pas bltas te 'di na re zhig rtsed mo'i ri'i steng na chu'i 'khrul 'khor steng du 'bab cing rab tu dga' ba dpa' rlabs dz+nya ri'i sgra 'byin pa'i ster na nam nyam mthun pa blta bar bya'o/ /zhes steng du phyin te gar byed cing hI hI b+ho zhes so/ /de nas mya ngan
235a6(mdo 'grel): med pa'i tshal gyi rin chen rdo leb yangs pa'i steng na cung zad smra bar byed cing bzhugs nas mchis so/ /nye logs su phyin no/ /rig 'dzin ma ni 'di re zhig gzhon nu dag yid ches ba'i gtam gad yin pa mnyan par bya'o snyam mo/ /de nas rab
235a7(mdo 'grel): tu zhugs pa na 'dren pa ji lta ba bzhin du mthong ngo/ /shug nar byung ste/ kye ma 'jig rten rnams ni yul mngon par zhen par 'gyur te/ gad nges phyin cing 'gro ba gang zhig la brgyar skyes gyur pa/ /bde ba gang de lan cig ma yin mngon su ma
235b1(mdo 'grel): gyur med/ /dpal mo gang de mdzes pa'i rnga ma g.yo zhing rgod pa ltar/ /gang zhig ma thob med cing slar yang de bzhin chags/ /gzhad gang nye bar gnyen te? khyod kyi bde legs 'phel bar gyur cig/ 'dren pa ni de bzhin du sho lo ka de nyid klog par byed
235b2(mdo 'grel): do? /rig? ma ni rnga brdung zhing grogs dga' ma la mtshun pa'i chu 'byin no zhes so/ /bzhad gad pa nas/ kye bram ze shis pa brjod pa'i lan snang bar mdzod zer/ 'dren pa ni ji ltar gau tam 'am/ na mnyam bde bar 'gyur tam/ 'dir bzhugs shig/
235b3(mdo 'grel): bzhad gang pas rang nyid bsems te/ ji ltar du yang na mnyam mthun pa ci zer nyan zhing brtags pa na shin tu lci zhing de yang dag par mi dga' o/ /de nas re zhig /'di ltar lha mo'i skyes smra ba'i skabs ma rnyed do/ /'di bzhin re zhig smra'o/ /snyam nas
235b4(mdo 'grel): gsal bar/ kye na mnyam dga' ba gzigs gzigs/ /'di ltar thang shing ljon ba'i dra ba'i/ /bu ga las byung pad+ma'i 'dab mar ni/ /sbrang rtsis myos pa'i bu ba glu len cing/ /pad ma'i steng na chu rgyun rab tu 'bab/ /rig 'dzin ma ni legs so/ /
235b5(mdo 'grel): gau ta ma lags so/ /bdag cag la rjes su brtse bar mdzad do snyam mo/ /'dren pa nas/ na mnyam 'dir ci zhig lta/ /kun kyang bye zhing rgyas ldan ba/ /ke sar nges par ltung ba yis/ /'gro rnams gnas shing mi rtag pa/ /ji ltar 'di gsal po smas/ /rig
235b6(mdo 'grel): 'dzin ma ni ji ltar gsung ba thos nas bdag nyid shin tu gdung bar byed do/ /bzhad gad pas rang nyid bsams te gzhan gang yin smra'o snyam ste/ rab tu gsal bar kye gzhan yang 'di lta ste/ sbrang rtsi bstan zhing chu'i 'khrul 'khor rab g.yo
235b7(mdo 'grel): las/ /chu 'dzin lho nas chu rgyun dbus su rnam 'bab pa/ /mthong nas rma bya mdongs rnams rab brkyang gar byed ba/ /na mnyam dga' ba chu rgyun do shal rnams la gzigs/ 'dren pa nas/ na mnyam chu rgyun khang pa 'di nyid gcig pu 'am/ mngon 'dzin
236a1(mdo 'grel): dngos bo'i rgyun rnams ni/ /skad cig skad cig mngon par 'jig /blu byed rgyun gyi khad pa bzhin/ /'gro ba thams cad de bzhin 'jug /rig 'dzin ma ni snying brten bar bya'o/ /gzhan yang mnyan par bya'o snyam mo/ /bzhad gang pa bdag
236a2(mdo 'grel): gi gnas la rnam par bsams te/ gdung bas sreg pa'i mya ngan grol nus rnams/ /blangs te gang dang gang ni 'dir smras kyang/ /sbyin sreg mar rgyun 'bab bzhin de dang de/ /lhag par shin tu yongs su 'bar bar byed/ /de bas 'dir dgon pa stong
236a3(mdo 'grel): par du bar bya'o snyam mo/ /de nas mdag 'jug ma rab tu zhugs nas/ lha mo 'od kyi blo gros mas/ bdag la bka' bsgros te bag ma'i bkra shis kyi dra ba 'di gzhon nu la khyer te 'ongs so/ /gzhon nu ni de nas yongs su 'chag cing mchis so/ /drung du phyin
236a4(mdo 'grel): te nye bar btung nas phyag byas te gzhon nu rgyal bar gyur cig rgyal bar gyur cig /lha mo'i bkas bkra shis kyi dra ba 'di blo dang ldan pa khyod kyis nges par byin cig ces so/ /rig 'dzin ma ni mi bzod par gyur te/ a e 'dir gang bag mar byas
236a5(mdo 'grel): sam snyam mo/ /de bzhang gang bas bzung ste/ yongs su g.yogs so/ /mngag 'jug ma shin tu dga' ste/ e ma lha mo mdon par 'dod pa yid kyi shing rta shin tu yang/ /des so zer nas/ /yongs su zhugs nas song so/ /'dren pa nas/ na
236a6(mdo 'grel): mnyam skabs med 'di bzhin bkra shis kyi dra ba bskur bci zhig /bzhad gang pa na de sems mo/ /'dren bas yang dris pa na/ bzhang gad pa nas/ bdag gi tshig gang zhig yal bar mi 'dor na smra'o/ /'dren pa nas/ na mnyam smros dang /bzhad
236a7(mdo 'grel): gang ba nas/ khyod yongs su len ba'o/ /rigs 'dzin min sdug bsngal te/ e ma dga' ba'i grogs mo'i lus rdzogs pa ni/ ji ltar mthong snyam mo/ /'dren pas/ de dag gis sems la bltas nas/ ci ste bdag yongs su len pa yin nam/ bzhang
236b1(mdo 'grel): god pas/ shin tu'o/ /'dres ba nas/ 'di bzhin byed ba ji ltar/ bzhad gad pa nas/ 'di bkra shis dra ba la dris/ 'dren pa nas/ na mnyam yongs su len pa zhes bya ba ni smin med pa'i nang yin no/ /'di lta ste/ gti mug skye mched 'dzin ba zhi ba 'thor
236b2(mdo 'grel): zhing phyir log sgrub bar byed/ /rnam g.yo'i yid 'ong myos pa'i gnas dang bsam gtan gyi ni gdug ba'i dgra /sdug bsngal 'byung gnas bde ba 'joms byed sdig pa'i rang bzhin gnas yin te/ /yongs 'dzin gdon bzhin blo ldan rnams kyang nyon
236b3(mdo 'grel): mongs dang ni nyams par byed/ /rigs 'dzin ma ni du zhing gzhan ci zhig lta snyam mo/ /'dren pa nas gzhan yang na mnyam/ /yongs su 'dzin pa byas gyur kyang/ /bdag ni nags su 'gro bar byed/ /de na skye bo gzhan rnams kyang/ /yongs su sdug bsngal
236b4(mdo 'grel): ci zhig bya/ /rig 'dzin ni dga' ba'i grogs mo gzhon nu'i rjes su 'di bzhin 'jug na /legs so snyam mo/ /bzhang gang ba nas/ kye ji ltar 'di bzhin der ni 'jigs bcas 'bab/ /mi dbang gtsug ni 'od zer rab tu 'phro ba yis/ /zhabs la btung
236b5(mdo 'grel): dang rgyal bo'i phun tshogs yongs spangs nas/ /khyod ni nags dang gnas pa ci'i phyir/ /rab tu bsngags/ 'dren pa nas rab tu bsngags pa'i gnas las gzhan gang zhig kyang mchis sam/ gzigs mdzod /ji ltar der ni dga' 'gyur rab dga' i sa gzhi
236b6(mdo 'grel): rnams dang ni/ /mtho ris gang+ga rnams kyi bskyed bas byang sa gor ma'i steng/ /gang zhig dga' zhing dga' ba'i ri dags tshogs rnams bsnyen bkur cing/ /grogs des nags kyi nang du gnas gyur pa ni skal ba bzang/ /gzhan yang na mnyam/ spong ba'i brang?
236b7(mdo 'grel): ri skye bos dben zhing phun sum tshogs ba'i gnas bzang na/ /phug yang ri dags rnams kyi spyod yul nags kyi ri mos yongs su bskor/ /sa ga'i dus na bung ba rnams ni rnga sgra snyan par rab sgrogs shing/ /lam zhugs nyon mongs me yang bdag
237a1(mdo 'grel): cag rnams la 'byung mi 'gyur zhes sgrogs/ /rig 'dzin min kye ma shin tu lci mo zhig smras so mnyam mo/ /bzhad gad pa nas/ kye snying rje med pa ji lta bu gnyen mthun gyi skye bo rnams la mnyes gshin pa'ang khyod la
237a2(mdo 'grel): mi 'dug go/ 'dren ba nas/ 'jig rten gyi gnyen la de bzhin du mnyes gshin ba ni/ 'di lta ste/ 'jig rten thams cad mar me bzhin du skad cig skad cig gis skye zhing/ /snum chags dbang gi 'jig cing 'khor/ /skye ba med dag
237a3(mdo 'grel): mya ngan 'da' / /gzhan yang na mnyam mnyes gshin pa'i rtsa bar mi shes pa las te/ mi shes rdul gyis g.yogs gyur ba'i/ /sngon las sa bon ma zad las/ /sred ba'i chu yis dbang sgyur nas/ /skye ba'i myu gu skye bar 'gyur/ /rig
237a4(mdo 'grel): 'dzin ma ni/ nye bar dul ba 'di 'dra ba ni/ thub ba'i skye bo la yang ga la snyam mo/ /bzhad gang pa nas/ gang yang 'dir re zhig 'jig rten ba'i chos kyi rjes su yang 'jug par yang mdzod cig 'dren ba nas/ 'jig rten gyi chos yang gang yang
237a5(mdo 'grel): yin/ bzhad gang pa nas/ yul gyi rjes su mngon par dga' o/ /'dren ba nas/ yul gyis chog chog gzigs mdzod/ yul ni dug bzhin zos tsam nyid mngar ldan zhing/ /rnam bar smin pa rab tu tsha ba dug bzhin yul/ /yul ni dug bzhin bsrung
237a6(mdo 'grel): bar ma nus rab g.yo'i shugs/ /shin tu rmongs byed mun pa stug po dug bzhin yul/ /yang na 'dod pa'i dug dang dug ni gzhal zhing du rtags gyur na/ /rang bzhin mi mtshungs yul las dug ni mchog yin te/ /dug gis skye ba gcig nyid du ni rab
237a7(mdo 'grel): 'gro zhing/ /skye ba dpag med du yang yul dug rab tu 'gro /bzhang gang ba nas/ kye re zhig bu'i gdong mthong bar mdzod dang de nas nags su lhan cig tu 'gro bar bya'o/ /'dren pa nas/ 'di ni mi rnyed do/ /dper na bya ba 'di ni spang du di ring phyen pas
237b1(mdo 'grel): shol byed pa/ /de 'dir skad cig yun tsam 'das gyur skye bo rtog byed de/ /mi bzang gshin rje khros pa rgod cing yongs su rtog ba'i/ /zur gyis bltabs be con mdangs kyang rab tu dmar bar byed/ /rig 'dzin ma ni/ du zhing kye ma grogs mo dga' ma/
237b2(mdo 'grel): bdag gis 'di bzhin du 'jig rten pha rol tu yang khyod kyi sngon du 'gro zhing lam bstan par bya'o/ /zhes rang nyid smra'o/ /bzhad gad pa du zhing/ kye 'khor gyi skye bo thams cad spong ba ni snying rje ba yang med dam/ 'dren pa nas /bdag gi rang gi
237b3(mdo 'grel): lus kyang yongs su gtong bar byed do/ /bzhad gad pa nas ci'i phyir stong/ /'dren pa nas/ gzhan gyi don du'o/ /bzhad gad pa nas/ de khyod bdag gis bya ba btang nas/ ci ste gzhan gyi bya ba la bdag nyid la sdug bsngal byed/ /'dren pa nas/
237b4(mdo 'grel): dman pa bdag nyid ma shes pa dud 'gro rnams kyang gnas dang zas skom rang 'byung spyod cing rnyed par sla/ /gang zhig 'dod rnyed shin tu skom tsha chu rnams kyang ni 'thung bar byed/ /gang zhig gzhan phan don du brtson byed skyes bu da yi ni/ /rang gi gzi
237b5(mdo 'grel): brjid kyis ni bde byed 'di ni skyes bu chen po'o/ /rig 'dzin ma ni snying gi dbugs phyung ngo/ /snyam nas skad bas rnyed de sred thag ran gyi bcings pa'i mching grol la snyam mo/ /bzhad gad pa nas/ kye ci'i phyir du khyod gzhan don sgrub par byed//
237b6(mdo 'grel): 'dren pa nas/ gzhan don gyi ri mo mngon par mi shes pa gzigs mdzod/ /gang zhig ngal med rta mgyogs? kyis bgrod nyi mas snang bar byed/ /gang zhig /bur grangs med par nor ldan rtag tu 'jig rten 'dzin/ /de ni nam yang rang don ma
237b7(mdo 'grel): yin de'i rang bzhin nyid/ /tshan po gang rnams 'jig rten phan dang bde ba'i ro gcig ro dang ldan/ /bzhad gang ba nas/ kye de bzhin du khyod ni bdag gi ma yin pa bram ze'i don dam gzhan gyi don lhag pa zhig yod do snyam mo/ /bden pa nas snying
238a1(mdo 'grel): rje yun ring du ma reg pa yin no/ /bdag mtshon skye bo'i nang du gdud bas bsreg ldan pa/ /gnyen ba shes 'jig rten sdug bsngal gnas pa ci'i phyir bde/ /'jig rten kun gyi sdug bsngal bdag gi lus kyi khur/ /dam pa
238a2(mdo 'grel): mnar med gnas pa yang ni spro bar byed/ /rig 'dzin min mngon 'dod kyi skabs rnyed do snyam mo/ /bzhad gang pa nas/ kye 'jig rten thams cad de bzhin du khyod kyi gnyen yin nam/ 'dren pa nas/ na mnyam de bzhin te gang gis mngal du dang po
238a3(mdo 'grel): bcings shing gnas/ /gang gi phang? du bag ma'i tsha zhing brtses/ /gang zhig rnam bral mtshan rings mya ngan byas/ /'jig rten 'di rnams sngon nas gnyen ba shes tshogs/ /rig 'dzin ma ni /kye ma 'di'i thugs shin tu rgya che'o snyam mo/ /bzhad
238a4(mdo 'grel): gad pa nas/ gnyen 'dun 'jig rten rnams kyi don mdzad pa la de las ci'i phyir ring du sdod par byed ces zer ro/ /rig 'dzin ma ni da legs par smras so snyam mo/ /'dren pa ni shugs nar zhes phyung nas don 'dod ba'i skye bo shin tu rnyed
238a5(mdo 'grel): par dka' o/ /bzhad gang pa nas/ don bya bar smra ba ni rkang/ 'dren pa nas/ lus la sogs ba cung zad slong ba'o/ /bzhad gad ba nas/ don bya ba'i skye bo rnams kyi nang nas lhag par che ba gang yin/ rig 'dzin ma ni/ legs par dri so snyam mo//
238a6(mdo 'grel): 'dren ba nas/ gang zhig sdug bsngal gyis mnar ba'i/ /skyabs gnas so/ /rig 'dzin ma ni shin tu dga' nas 'dir mngon bar 'dod pa'i skabs rnyed ngo snyam nas/ 'tsher bzhin du nye bar btud de/ phyag 'tshal nas/ du bzhin du bdag ni
238a7(mdo 'grel): shin tu mnar bar gyur pas/ skyabs gnas so/ /mthu chen po bdag ni skal ba dman te rjes su brtse bar mdzod cig /'dren pa ni shin tu mnyes te gzigs nas/ bzang mo ma 'jigs shig/ bdag ni 'jig rten kun gyi gnyen du gnas/
238b1(mdo 'grel): 'gro rnams don grub mtshan du nye bar bcings/ /ma 'jigs ma 'jigs mi dkar mig can ma/ /de ring ci sgrubs bdag la myur du smros/ /bzhad gad pa ni ya mtshan du gyur nas/ e ma gzugs bzangs rab tu mdzes pa brkyang ba 'di ga las yin snyam
238b2(mdo 'grel): mo/ /'dren pa nas/ ngon gang bya ba smros shig/ rig 'dzin ma ni mgo stong de chags pas bstan nas mthu chen po khyod kyi lus so/ /bzhad gang pa ni mi bzod cing dga' nas/ /'di ni ji ltar gdug pa can gyi rig 'dzin ma lta bu'o/ /de re zhig smrar chug
238b3(mdo 'grel): snyam mo/ /gsal por smras pa/ kyon mnyam phar zur phar zur/ /'di ni gdug pa can gyi srid mo te/ /'dis na mnyam dga' ba lus slong bar byed do/ /snyam mo/ /cig? ma 'jigs nas/ bdag nyid bsams pa /ji ltar 'dis bdag gzhan du shes
238b4(mdo 'grel): te/ /bdag gi grogs mo dga' ma'i don shin tu 'grub pa lham 'ga' zhig gi gzhan du bcos so snyam mo/ /'dren pa mnyes nas lus rab tu slong ba sring mo de srid nas spobs pa can gyi skye bo slongs mo pa bdag gis mthong ngo snyam mo//
238b5(mdo 'grel): bzhad gad pa ni/ dbyug pa'i shing phyar te/ phar song phar song srid mo gdug pa can gyi skye bo slongs mo pa bdag gis mthong ngo snyam mo na mnyam dga' bas chen po'i dkyil 'khor thams cad las lhag nga'i rgyal srid kyi 'khur bar nus
238b6(mdo 'grel): pa'i lus slong byed dam zhes smra/ 'dren pa nas/ ji ltar slong ba'i skye bo sun 'byin par byed ces bzhad gad ba rgyab tu byas nas shin tu dga' nas bzang mo bdag gi lus slong bar byed pa de de bzhin bden nam/ rig 'dzin ma nas/ mthu chen
238b7(mdo 'grel): po gzhan du nus shing smra ba ma yin no/ /khyed kyi lus mthong ba tsam gyis kyang gang gi gdung ba thams cad nye bar zhi bar mdzad na /de yis bdag la gnas par mdzod cig/ 'dren pa ni mi dga' bar 'gyur te/ spobs chen gang las gnod byed
239a1(mdo 'grel): 'dir// re zhig bdag gi skal ba min/ /mngon 'dod bdag gis bsgrub bya ba/ /de lta na yang ci zhig smros/ /rig 'dzin ma du zhing/ bdag gi yid bcugs grogs mo ni/ /mgo bo zug rngu dang ldan ste/ de'i mthu chen po khyod kyi mthong ba las
239a2(mdo 'grel): gtong ste/ nye bar zhi ba gzhan med do/ /bzhad gang pa shin tu 'jigs nas/ kye 'di ni sgyu ma sprul nas gzhan du smra bar byed de/ gzhan du de bzhin 'di yis 'chos shing ston bar byed do/ /'dren ba ni/ de'i gtam yang ma nyin par
239a3(mdo 'grel): khyod kyi yid bcugs grogs mo gang na gnas/ rig 'dzin ma nas/ 'di ni de bzhin du ri bo gangs ldan gyi rtse mo la gnas /'dren pa nas/ rol pa'i ri bo'i zhol srid du/ bos nas der bdag re zhig 'gro'o/ /rig 'dzin ma nas/ ci ste mthu chen
239a4(mdo 'grel): po 'khor dang bcas bas? nam mkha' la 'gro zhing 'dren bsted byar dka' ba ci yang ma mchis so zhes gnyis po gar byed cing nam mkha' la song ngo/ /bzhang gad ba nas/ khyed cag rab tu zhugs te/ bdag bram ze ni slar yang dri ma lhag ma
239a5(mdo 'grel): bsnyil ba bzhin du yongs su spangs so zhes smra/ 'dren ba nas /na mnyam khyod rang yang long mdzod/ bzhang gang ba bdag nyid 'jigs par mthong nas rig 'dzin ma 'dzum zhing bzhad gang pa'i lag pa nas bzung nas yongs su zhugs so//
239a6(mdo 'grel): 'dren pa ni ya mtshan che nas grogs po ltos ltos/ /nyi ma'i gzugs ni des lhung rnam par 'jug ba bzhin/ /sa chen ri bo dang bcas 'og tu 'gro ba ltar/ /tam la'i nags tshal sngon bo'i 'gram rnams ni/ /chu 'dzin rab tu bsal gyur ri
239a7(mdo 'grel): mos mdza' rnams skor/ bzhad gad pa nas/ kye khyod kyi ya mtshan che yang bdag ni bram ze te/ /'di nyid du ni gang zhig la brten nas chu snod bzung nas bsod snyoms la brten nas/ khang kyis 'gro'o zhes zer/ 'dren pa nas mi 'jigs
239b1(mdo 'grel): par re zhig ya mtshan che ba ltos shig dang/ ri bo khang bzangs 'dra zhing chu 'dzin g.yo ba'i bla re la brten pa/ /chu klung dur pa'i sgrog gis 'gram bcings lam chen rdul rnams 'thul ba ltar/ /chu gtor yongs su bskor ba'i 'obs chen bzhin du rab
239b2(mdo 'grel): mtho'i 'gram ldan pa/ /sa chen dkyil 'khor gnas gcig bzhin du yang dag gsal por kun nas mtshon/ /rig 'dzin ma nas a ho gzhon nus nye bar gzigs so/ /bzhad gad pa nas/ gting zab mo 'jigs pa'i 'og gis chen bo'i mthil mthong
239b3(mdo 'grel): nas/ bdag nyid nges par 'jigs par snang nas gzugs gzhan la steng du bltas pa dang/ shin tu 'jigs te/ kye gangs ri'i rtse mo tshogs pa bzhin du nam mkha' i mthil khengs nas 'jug pa 'di ci zhig yin/ rig 'dzin ma rnam par rgod cing/
239b4(mdo 'grel): a ho bram ze 'di ni mtshan nyid yin no/ /'dren pas gzigs nas 'di ni nges par skar ma rnams so/ /bzhad gad pa nas/ skar ma la 'di 'dra ba'i tshad ga la yin/ 'dren pa nas/ de ni 'di bzhin rgya chen po'i tshang dang ldan no/ /bzhad gad pa nas/ sa'i
239b5(mdo 'grel): ba bzhin no/ /bzhad gad pa nas/ yang 'di nyin par mi mthong ba ji ltar yin/ /'dren pa nas/ nye bar btung na nyin par kyang 'di bzhin mthong ngo/ /rig 'dzin ma nas/ gzhan nas 'di rnams thams cad sngon gzigs pa snyam byed do/ /bzhad gad
239b6(mdo 'grel): pa nas/ kye na mnyam dga' ba chu gter gyi rlabs rnams las rlung drag bas rab tu bskyod pa bzhin du ka la'i sgra sgrogs pa'ang 'di ji lags/ 'dren ba nas/ 'dren ba nas/ brtags nas 'di ni nam mkha' chu klung gang+gA'i sgra ste/ 'di lta ste/ lhag ma nyal ba bzhin
240a1(mdo 'grel): du chu klung rnam spangs lha lam mthong ba'i phung po las/ /phyogs kyi glang chen rnams ni rtse zhing sna yis chu 'thor thigs pa zer ma rnams/ /yang dag tshim ba skye 'gyur chu thigs mu tig 'bras bu'i 'od zer mdzes pa ltar/ /drang
240a2(mdo 'grel): srong bdun po rnams ni gsar gyi pad+ma 'dzin cing khrus la rab tu 'jug /drang srong bdun po 'di rnams ni phyag bya ba'i 'os so zhes thams cad kyis phyag byas so/ /yol ba'i nang du'o/ /'jig rten kun gyi phan mdzad phyir/ /gzhan yang gtsug gi rin
240a3(mdo 'grel): chen ltar/ /bud med rin chen rin chen bu/ /mtshungs pa yang dag thob gyur cig/ rig 'dzin ma shin tu dga' ste/ 'di rnams ma rmongs pa'i tshig gis ji lta ba bzhin du mchog sbyin no snyam mo/ /bzhad gang pa nas/ kye na mnyam 'di yis mkha' 
240a4(mdo 'grel): la 'gro ba'i stobs kyis bdag cag yongs su phyin te/ de nas 'dir nam mkha' i gang gA la yud tsam cig ngal so zhig ces zer ro/ /snyan dag tshogs rnams glu yis snyan par rab sgrogs bskyed pa'i gnas/ /chags bral kun gyis sgrogs shing
240a5(mdo 'grel): brjod ba de ni rgyal bar byed/ /gang gis rang nyid rnam byung rnam gshegs gzings kyi yal ga yi/ /lugs las nye bar blangs nas tsandan go mis rab tu sbyar/ zhes pas rab tu zhugs so/ /thams cad kyi yan lag gnyis ba rdzogs so// //
240a6(mdo 'grel): de nas sbrang ga bu mo rab tu zhugs te/ du zhing rin chen phreng ba ma/ 'di nas song nas nyi ma 'di tsam gyi bar du ji ltar bdag gis yang ma go ta dbugs phyung ngo/ /de ring ni na lhag par yang mgo bo'i zugs yang dag skyes so// //rin chen
240a7(mdo 'grel): phreng ba ma ni gang dang gang yun ring po de dad de nas bzod par dka' zhing rgyal ba'i bde bas mig ldongs zhing mchi ma 'bab cing 'jug ba ni chu thogs so bzhin du grogs mo'i snying ni shin tu gdung bar byed do/ /bdag gi don grub pa de rnams dgos pa
240b1(mdo 'grel): yang mi shes te/ rin chen phreng ba ma 'ongs na yang 'bras bu med do snyam mo/ /bdag gis rab tu gdung ba'i phyir spang ba'i thabs su gyur pa bzung nas/ de nas grogs mo dga' ma'i drung du 'gro'o snyam mo/ /yongs su zhugs nas bltas pa na de'i grogs mo
240b2(mdo 'grel): dga' ba pad ma bA ti ni yongs su sa brtol rkang 'thung gi 'og zla ba nor bu rdo ba'i steng na thig le blo gros ma'i lus kyi steng du nye bar brten nas gnas so/ /'di ni stong pa'i mthar gcig pu gnas zhes nye bar zhugs te/ de nas pad+ma bA ti dang/ thig le'i
240b3(mdo 'grel): blo gros ma'ang ji ltar lta zhing rab tu zhugs pa na rang nyid bsams te shugs nas zhes phyung ngo/ /legs ldan me tog mtshon can gyis kyang rang lus sreg pa'i tshor ba ji ltar shes par ma gyur te/ shes na gzhan rnams ji ltar sreg par byed/
240b4(mdo 'grel): sbrang gi bu mo nye bar btud de/ grogs mo dga' ma di ring mnyil bar ma gyur tam/ pad+ma bA ti ni slar yang de bzhin du smra bar byed do/ /thig le blo gros ma nas/ kye pad ma bA ti ci'i phyir gus par mi byed/ 'di ni khyod kyis dga' ba'i grags
240b5(mdo 'grel): mo'o// pad+ma bA ti rtab rtab par gang gang na bdag gi grogs mo dga' ma rin chen phreng ba ma/ thig le blo gros ma nas/ si yon te/ 'di ni sbrang gi bu mo'o/ /pad+ma bA ti bdag do tsha nas bdag ni yang dag pa'i yul chos las shin tu 'das so snyam
240b6(mdo 'grel): nas/ gsal bar smras pa/ grogs mo sbrang gi bu mo bdag ni shin tu gdung bas gzir bas shin tu 'khrugs par gyur to/ /sbrang gi bu mo nas/ grogs mo dga' ma dbug phyung zhig /skyes bu dam pa'i gtam bsil ba bzhin du pad+ma'i 'dab ma 'di
240b7(mdo 'grel): rnams khyod la brlan no/ /pad+ma bA ti nas 'di sol cig /nor bu chu shel gyi rdo ba'i steng na yang srog ba snyam byed do/ /pad+ma'i mdab mkhyer la shog /gnyis po nas/ 'dir ji ltar can don gyi khu bas gter zhing/ grogs dga' ma khyod kyis nu ma? 
241a1(mdo 'grel): dag gi bar? na byin nas bzhag kyang de yang lhag par shin tu gdung bas gzir nas yongs su skam par byed do/ /pad+ma bA ti sdug bsngal nas ha la 'di rnams sol la bdag nor bu chu shel gyi rngo ba'i steng du khyer cig ces smra/ gnyis
241a2(mdo 'grel): bo rang la bsams te du zhing/ kye ma 'di'i sems gzhan du gyur to snyam nas gsal por smras pa/ grogs mo 'di ni ji ltar nor bu chu shel gyis rngo ba'i steng na thigs pa'i rgyun mi 'chang par rnam par 'bab ba'i zer ma 'thor zhing chags so/ /pad+ma
241a3(mdo 'grel): bA ti nas/ 'di ni chog go /bdag gi ni rin chen phreng ba las 'ongs pa'i bris sku blta'o/ /zhes smra'o/ /gnyis pa phan bltas te/ shin tu mi dga' bar gyur te/ ji ltar 'di la zug rngu yang med dam zhes gsal bar smras la/ grogs mo 'di
241a4(mdo 'grel): ni ji lta ba 'di ni 'di'o/ /pad+ma bA ti nas/ yang ri mo bres pa'i gzugs brnyan de gang na zhes smra/ gnyis po nas 'di na med pa ma yin te/ khyed kyis mdun na mchis so// pad+ma can gyis yun ring du bltas nas du zhing bdag nyid bsams pa/ gang zhig bris
241a5(mdo 'grel): sku'i gzugs brnyan 'di 'dra ba de ni kye ma brtse ba med pa'i tshig tsam la 'ga' zhig gis yang skye bo 'di rjes su brtse ba can no zhes sgrags so snyam nas nam mkha' la bltas te/ legs ldan mda' lnga khyod kyis 'dir/ /mnga' ni ma skyes 'gyur
241a6(mdo 'grel): ba 'am/ 'di ni yon tan rjes chags pas/ /yang na 'dis bsreg mthu med dam/ /stobs med rnams dang 'drar skyes nas/ /dpa' mthong mngon ba'i nga rgyal lo/ /phyogs rnams su blta bar byas nas /gzhan ci zhig lta bar byed 'dir yang
241a7(mdo 'grel): 'phags pa'i bu'i bris sku la 'khyung nas/ bdag nyid nyams bar byed do zhes smra/ sbrang gi bu mo langs/ nas /phyogs rnams la bltas pas ji ltar 'dis dri ma med pa'i nam mkha' i mthil du bya rnam bar rgyu ba yang ma mtshon no/ /slar yang bltas
241b1(mdo 'grel): pas/ ya mtshan che nas/ grogs dga' ma ltos/ ltos 'dir grog gis ri mo rab tu 'gyed pa bzhin du dri ma med pa'i nam mkha' i khams na rnam par 'phro ba'i mtshan nyid do/ /ha la khyed gnyis kyis ci zhig ltos shig/ bdag ni gdung bas non no/ /sbrang
241b2(mdo 'grel): gi bu mo nas/ ri'i rtse mos mngon par g.yog ba bzhin no/ /de nas thig le blo gros mas nges par bltas nas/ re zhig 'di ci zhig ces thig le blo gros ma grogs dga' ma la smra bar bya'o snyam nas nges par zhugs so/ /yang gzhon nu dang bcas
241b3(mdo 'grel): te rin chen phreng ba ma de bzhin du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /de nas rin chen phreng ba ma dang gzhon nu dang/ bzhad gad pa rnams kyang rab tu zhugs so/ /bzhad gad pa nas/ b+ho na mnyam gzigs gzigs/ /drang srong gi gnas kyi mtshan nyid 'dir yang
241b4(mdo 'grel): dag par 'thul ba du ba'i rang bzhin sbyin sreg gi du ba'i phreng bar snang khebs shing phan tshun dgra yongs su 'jug pa'i dud 'gro'i tshogs rnams kyang gnyen gyi 'jug ba khyad par can shin tu mnyes gshin pa phun sum tshogs pa drang spong gi gnas
241b5(mdo 'grel): so/ /'dren pa nas/ grogs po ngo mtshar che ba 'di lta ste/ stag mo yang ni khong nas dul zhing mig ni rab btsums ri dags phrug gu rnams ni lhag par byed/ /mnyes gshin rab dga' gtsug phud can ni mdongs rnams rab brkyang lteng ka
241b6(mdo 'grel): rnams ni 'tshe ba skyabs phyir skyong/ /seng ge yang ni glang mo gang zhig song ba'i phrug gu rnams ni rang gi bu bzhin bsrung bar byed/ /gang rnams kyi ni byams pa'i gnas bcas nags dang ri bo'i phug na rnam par gnas ba de rnams rgyal/ /rig 'dzin ma
241b7(mdo 'grel): nges bar bltas nas/ bdag gi grogs mo dga' ma'i nye 'khor du phyin no/ /'dir ni grogs mo dga' ma tsan dan rnon bo shin tu chags pa zla ba bzhin du zla ba'i 'od zer gyi dkyil 'khor dang 'dra bar rnam bar mdzes so snyam mo/ /bzhad
242a1(mdo 'grel): gad pa ngo mtshar che nas/ b+ho na mnyam gzigs gzigs/ /bud med 'di ni rin po che ltar 'di'i 'jam mdangs 'od zer rab tu 'bab pa skye zhing bskyang bas mnyel nas gzigs pa lta bu'o/ /'dren pas nges par gzigs
242a2(mdo 'grel): nas na mnyam pa rnams kyi khyad par can rnams ring du gyur pas khyod kyis mngon par ma shes te khyod rin po che snyom mam/ 'di'i lus la reg pa tsam/ rin po che gzhan rnams mngon par 'dod/ de ni rin chen lta mi byed/ /rang lus de
242a3(mdo 'grel): bzhin rnam brgyan pas/ /bzhad gad pa nas yid kyi shing rta'i me tog ni mthong ngo zhes so/ /pad ma can dang sbrang gi bu mo zur gyis blta zhing rin chen phreng ba ni shin tu ring du thogs so/ /zhes smra/ bzhad gad pa nas/ kye na mnyam snyan par
242a4(mdo 'grel): smra ba ni 'di lta bu'o/ /'dren pa nas/ snyan pa 'di ci zhig brjod ce na/ kye gang zhig zur gyis bltas pas rnam par 'phangs gyur pa/ /yid 'od spyan las snyan par smra ba phyogs pa ni/ /g.yo med de 'dir sa chen steng gnas myos pa'i le lo
242a5(mdo 'grel): yis/ /lus la me tog la gnas pa de ltar 'di na sbrang rtsi'i/ /rig 'dzin ma ni byed pa po rjes 'jug par mthong ngo/ /bzhad gad pa ni/ shin tu dga' nas rang nyid bsams te/ 'di ni mngon par 'dod pa'i 'bras bu ste/ 'di ni ji ltar thang
242a6(mdo 'grel): kha la ri mo bris pa bdag gis mthong ba de'i snyam mo/ /rig 'dzin ma nas/ mthu chen po re zhig ji srid de la smra ba'i bar du mnyel so bar mdzod cig /'dren pa nas/ khyod ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin bya'o/ /rig 'dzin ? shin tu dga' nas
242a7(mdo 'grel): nye bar song ngo/ /sbrang gi bu mo nas/ grogs mo dga' ma ltos ltos/ /'di ni rin chen phreng ba ma'o/ /pad+ma can nas/ de gang na gang na zhes zer te/ sbrang rtsi'i bu mo dang pad+ma can dag gis gcig pu nyid du mthong nas brgyal nas gar byed do ? /rig 'dzin
242b1(mdo 'grel): ma shin tu dngangs nas/ dga' ma khyod kyi yid kyi shing rta grub bo/ /sbrang gi bu mo nas/ grogs med dga' ma dbugs phyung zhig/ rig 'dzin ma nges par bltas te/ kye ma bdag skal pa dman pa da shi zin/ ha d+hi ha d+hi 'dir su 'jug par byed ces
242b2(mdo 'grel): yongs su 'khyud nas bltas so/ /kye ma skal ba dman pa yid kyi shing rta lag tu 'ong nas yang slar 'dor bar byed dam zhes smra zhing rig 'dzin ma nas/ gzhon nu yongs su skyob par mjed cig /'dir ni bdag gi grogs mo dga' ma mthar byed
242b3(mdo 'grel): kyis gsar cing 'phrog par byed do/ /'dren ba ni rtab rtab por kye ma rab tu myos so/ /bzhad gad pa nas/ na mnyam dga' ba myur du mdzod cig /gnyis po yang nye bar drung du phyin to/ /rig 'dzin ma gzhon nu'i zhabs la phyag 'tshal te/ mthu tshan
242b4(mdo 'grel): po grogs ma dga' ma rjes su brtse bar mdzad du gsol/ /'dren pa ni ngo tsha zhing 'jigs pa dang bcas nas bdag gi bsgrub par bya gang/ khyod kyis nye bar bsgo bar mdzod/ /rig 'dzin ma nas rig pa kun gyis pha rol tu phyin par gyur pa la/ bdag gis
242b5(mdo 'grel): ci zhig nye bar ston/ /de ltar na'ang re zhig mthu chen po'i phyag las bdud rtsi'i rgyun bsil ba rab tu 'bab pa las grogs mo dga' ma yongs su reg par mdzod cig /'dren pa nas/ pad ma can gyi mgo la lag pas reg nas/ zla ba bzhin 'dra
242b6(mdo 'grel): 'di yis ni/ /'dir ni rnam pa nyams pa bzhin/ /dga' ba thob las rnam nyams sam/ /khyod kyi rnam nyams sdug bsngal 'phel/ /pad+ma can ni mig cung zad phye nas 'dren ba nas/ /ma la ya skyes khur ba sor mos bzhin la byugs/ /ri dags
242b7(mdo 'grel): mig can 'di ni dkyus ring mig phye ba/ /chu 'dzin rab tu dkar bas cha rnams phyed g.yogs pa/ /mkha' la chu 'dzin dal gyis 'gro ba zla ba'i dbyibs/ /rig 'dzin ma ni grogs mo dpa' ma 'tsho bar mthong ste/ shin tu dga' o/ /sbrang gi bu mo
243a1(mdo 'grel): nas/ a ho gzhon nu mthu bo bzhad gad pa nas grogs mo dga' ma yid kyi shing rta mthong ngo/ /rig 'dzin ma nas/ mthu chen pos 'di re shig /mgo bo'i zug nye bar bzhi'o/ /'di'i lus kyang phyag gi mthil gyis reg par mdzod
243a2(mdo 'grel): cig/ 'dren bas lus rnams kyang byu la nas shin tu mnyes te/ mi dga' ba da chog go /'di ni khur gyis? dub pa 'jam pa'i lus ni rab g.yo bzhin/ /yid 'ong dri yis 'gro zhing bung ba'i gshog pas rnam bskyed pa/ /mtshan mo ma la ti'i me tog
243a3(mdo 'grel): phreng ba bya ba bzhin/ /'dri'i lus rnams rim gyis gsal bor yang dag g.yo bar byed/ /grogs mo dag nas/ grogs mo dga' ma dbugs shig dbugs shig /mthu chen pos khyod 'dri rjes su bzung ngo/ /de yis gzigs nas 'dir yid kyi shing
243a4(mdo 'grel): rta rang gi lus bzhin du brjod/ /pad+ma can ni 'jigs shing nges par bltas te/ ngo tsha bas 'dar zhing langs nas 'bros 'dong pas ma nus te rings nas gar byed do/ /rig 'dzin ma nas grogs mo dga' ? ma de tsam ma rings shig /re zhig gsar du 'ongs
243a5(mdo 'grel): pa la stan gcig la gnas nas bsnyen bkur bar gyis shig /'dren ba nas/ dkar min mig can 'jigs bcas khyod ni sdug bsngal ba/ /chog chog lus ni gdung bas cung zad g.yo ba can/ /me tog phreng ba cung zhig kha 'bus 'dab ma rnams/
243a6(mdo 'grel): bung ba rnams kyi rkang pa yang ni bzos mi nus/ /pad+ma can rang nyid bsams te/ ci ste 'di ni nags nas 'ongs sam/ yang na 'di bzhan du snang ba 'am/ yang na rmi lam du snang ba 'am snyam mo/ /sbrang gi bu mo nas/ grogs mo dga' ma 'di ni de yin te
243a7(mdo 'grel): khyod kyis gzhon nu'i sku gzugs thang sku ni ri mor bris pa la mchod ba'i phyir ba ku la'i me tog phreng ba gang zhig nyid kyi brgyus ? zhes bstod do/ /pad+ma can ni 'dren pa la zur gyis blta zhing ci? mo'i sku'i gzugs la de phu lo/ /'dran pas ri mo ltas
243b1(mdo 'grel): nas/ 'di ni kho bo bzhin du ri mor bris pa zhig go /ha ma ho bdag la gus pa tsher mchis so/ /bzhad gang pa nas/ khyod kyi lha rnams gus pas bsnyen bkur bas da ltar de khyod la 'di bzhin da'o/ /'dren pa nas/ ji ltar 'di bzhin du'o/ /bzha'
243b2(mdo 'grel): gang pa nas/ lha rnams kyang gus pas bsnyen bkur nas mchog gsol bar byed do/ /khyod ni dka' thub ma'i mngon par 'dod ba'i mchog gang yang sbyin par mi byed do/ /grogs mo dga' mas lags par smras/ /'dren pa ni 'dzum zhing khyod
243b3(mdo 'grel): kyis de bzhin du mchog ster shes sam/ bzhad gang ba nas/ gal te khyod bdag gi rjes su 'jug na bdag bram ze yin pas sbyin par bya'o/ /'dren pa nas/ bdag gis rjes su 'jug par bya'o/ /bzhad gang ba nas khyod de bzhin du 'di'i mchog tu
243b4(mdo 'grel): bdag gis sbyin/ 'dren pa nas khyod ni tha shal rmongs ba rab tu shes pa'o/ /bzhad gad pa nas/ khyod ni shin tu mi bzod do/ /'dren pa nas/ na mnyam rab tu gsal ba'i dgongs pa la/ /yang 'dis shin tu sbyin par byed de gzigs mdzod//
243b5(mdo 'grel): bdag ni rab tu brkyang la tshul 'chos lus ni ngo tshas sdus byed ci/ /yid 'ong mig ni gsal bor 'phangs shing skad cig nyid la slong par byed/ /bdag ni mi bzod lta bas blta zhing slar yang mngon 'dod 'dren par byed/ /byis pa'i blo'i dgongs
243b6(mdo 'grel): ba rab tu spro zhing g.yo yang 'dir mi byed ces gsungs so/ /yol ba'i nad du'o/ /ca cho chen po zhig grag go /thams cad 'thigs nas nye bar langs so/ /bzhad gang pas nye bar bltas nas/ 'di ni gang nas glang chen myos pa yang dag rgyug byed cing//
243b7(mdo 'grel): 'dir ni ji ltar shugs kyi mi bzang sna'i 'khyil byas nas/ /chu rnams 'phen pa char 'bab bzhin du stobs kyis rab tu 'jug /gdong la myos 'bab dril sbrang rtsi byed rnams rjes su 'jug/ yol ba la ca chos smra'o/ /bzhang gang ba ni shin tu 'jigs
244a1(mdo 'grel): te/ kye na mnyam yongs su skyob par mdzod ces smra'o/ /pad+ma can ni shin tu 'jigs te/ gzhon nu la kun nas ? khyud do/ /grogs mo dag nas/ mthu chen po grogs mos dga' ma srung bar mdzod cig zer/ 'dren pa nas/ ma
244a2(mdo 'grel): 'jigs zhig 'jigs ldan ma du la glang chen myos/ /so ldan gnam lcags mche ba can/ /bdag gi brang gis de mtshungs par/ /rtag tu rab gsal 'di bzung ngo/ /rig 'dzin ma nas/ de ni 'jigs pas 'di ga la byung/ yol ba'i nas /'jigs
244a3(mdo 'grel): pa rnams kyi mi 'jigs rab sbyin sa gsum rab tu tshim byed khyod ni gnyen/ /sdug bsngal chu gter dang klong 'khrugs las 'gro rnams yang dag sgrol ba'i gzings nyid do/ /khyod kyi phyag ni rab tu gsal ba'i rgyan gyis rol zhing kun 'khril so ldan
244a4(mdo 'grel): so/ /brtun shing g.yo bas 'jig rten ma lus 'dir ni skrag pa'i gnas skabs gal 'gyur/ /gzhon nu nas/ kye dga' ma bdag thong zhig /glang po gsum bo ni song/ rig 'dzin ba rgod cing di ring yang khyod gang du yang mi gtong dam/ gzhon
244a5(mdo 'grel): nu rang nyid bsams te/ gal te bdag 'di lta bu'i gnas skabs su 'ga' zhig mthong bar mi 'gyur ram/ bdag gi ni tshul dang 'dra ba ma yin no snyam nas/ de nas drang srong gi slob ma rab tu zhugs so/ /rtab rtab por kye ma ji ltar ri dags kyi rigs
244a6(mdo 'grel): kyang 'di da der shin tu skrag pas rab tu 'jug cing sems ni drangs par gyur/ glang chen rab tu 'jigs pas thub pa'i gzhon nu rnams kyang gsal bar du bar gyur/ /pad+ma bA ti ni gang du song ngam snyam nas yongs su zhugs so/ /mthong nas shin tu
244a7(mdo 'grel): mi bzod pas/ /a tshangs pa kye/ a tshangs pa kye/ ji lta dka' thub kyi tshal na 'gal bar 'jug go zhes smra/ thams cad shin tu 'jigs te/ grogs mo dag nas/ ji ltar 'phags pa'i spyod pa'i bu'o/ /pad+ma can ni gzhon nu btang ste/ ngo tsha nas
244b1(mdo 'grel): kha 'og tu phyogs nas gnas so yol ba'i nang du'o/ /'di lag ldan gyi 'jigs pas bdag gi pad+ma bA ti nas 'byung zhes drang srong dus so/ /slob ma ni du zhing mkhan po yongs su skyob par mdzod cig /yongs su skyob par mdzod cig /pad ma bA ti ni na
244b2(mdo 'grel): yongs su sun 'byin par byed cing mchis so/ /grogs mo dag shin tu 'jigs shing shin tu mi phan par gyur to snyam mo/ /gzhon nu ni mi mthun pa'i mtshan nyid sdug bsngal bar bdag ltung ngo snyam mo/ /bzhad gad pa ni mi bzod pas a re a
244b3(mdo 'grel): re bram ze gdug pa can mi bden pa smra zhing ci'i phyir khyod du zhes dbyug ba'i shing gyen du phyir te nye bar btud do/ /bram ze ni a tshangs ba kye mkhan po yongs su skyob bar mdzod ces smra/ de nas thub ba ni khros te/ rab tu zhugs nas a 'di su
244b4(mdo 'grel): zhig ces nges par bltas nas/ lag pa dang rkang par bcas pa rdzobs shing/ /lha rnams thams cad stobs sam gyi/ /dmod pa rnams ni yal gyur tam?/ /gang zhig thub pa'i rigs rnams kyang/ /kun nas gnod cing yongs su 'jig ces smra/ /kye/ khu?
244b5(mdo 'grel): pad+ma bA ti e ma gzhon nu gtsug na nor bu la pad+ma can bdag gis yid kyi sbyin par byas te gdung bar byed do/ /gzhon nu nas/ legs pa'i drang srong chen po gang/ /bdag phyir de bzhin rjes gdung ba/ /kun spyod khrims las 'das gyur na/ /skyes bu
244b6(mdo 'grel): rtag tu de bzhin gdung/ /bdag las kun spyod rnam 'gal na/ /'di ni lha rnams kyi mkhyen 'gyur ro/ /bzhad gad pa shin tu 'jigs nas gnas skabs 'dir ci zhig smra/ lha rnams kyi drang srong nas/ thub pa'i skye bo'i lha rnams ni/ /gang dang gang bzhad
244b7(mdo 'grel): gad pa nas/ bram ze g.yo ba can pher? song phar song?/ mkhan po las mthu che ba'i lta gang zhig yod dam/ drang srong nas /lha rnams da lta nyid du sa stengs ltung bar bya'am ci/ /chu gter rab tu rgyu ba skad cig nyid la skam mal ci?/ /bskal po'i? mi ni 'od zer
245a1(mdo 'grel): 'bar bas rtsa rnams ma lus pa/ /speg pa bzhin du 'jig rten rnams ni thal bar bya 'am ci/ /rig 'dzin ma rang nyid bsams te/ ji srid 'di ni mthong dug bzhin/ /'di yis dmod dug ma grol ba/ /de srid 'dir ni bdag
245a2(mdo 'grel): gis ni/ nyes rnams rab tu gsal bar bya/ /snyam mo/ /nye bar btud? de phyag 'tshal nas/ /yab gcig gnang bar mdzod gnad bar mdzod/ /'di la pad+ma bA ti dgon pa'i glang po chi myos bas gsod pa las/ mthu chen po 'dis bskyabs pa'o/ /drang
245a3(mdo 'grel): srong nas/ 'di yang su zhig yin/ bzhad gad pa 'jigs bzhin du/ lha tshangs pas byin gyis gzhon nu gtsug na nor bu'o/ /drang srong nas 'di ni gzhon nu gtsug na nor bu yin ba de bden nam/ zhes nges par bltas nas dus so/ /the tshom ni
245a4(mdo 'grel): chog go/ 'di ni mtshungs med dpal dang ldan/ /rtags kyang nor bus rnam par spras/ /ji ltar dpag bsam ljon pa ni/ bdag gis dug gi sdong por shes/ thams cad du /bdag dman ni mi bzod mi shes pa/ /bdag dman shin tu mngon 'dod
245a5(mdo 'grel): la/ /gang zhig mi shes dbang gi ni/ /bdag gi sdig pa mngon bar byas/ /thal mo sbyar nas kye mag pa skye bo las thos bas /nyes bar byas pa 'di rnams bzod par mdzod cig /mi shes pa'i dbang gis nyes par byas so/ /bzhad gad pa ni bram
245a6(mdo 'grel): ze 'tsho'o snyam mo/ /gzhon nus nas gong ma rnams la nyes ba ma mchis so/ /bram ze dga' nas/ bzhad gad pa la 'khyud de/ /phan tshun khyod kyang bzod par mdzod cig ces so/ /drang srong nas/ a ho gzhon nu ni bstan ba'o/ /bu mo pad+ma bA ti
245a7(mdo 'grel): kye/ di ring ngo tsha yang chog bar mdzod/ /srog chags dbang phyug bdag por gyur/ /yang dag pas ni spro bar gyis/ /gzhon nu rang nyid bsam pa/ 'dir blo bur du byung ngo snyam nas/ gsal por smras pa/ kye legs ldan rjes su bsgo bar mdzod
245b1(mdo 'grel): cig /bdag ci bdag gis/ zhes sa'i dus 'das 'gro bas 'gro bar byed do/ /drang srong nas/ lag pa'i chu 'dzin gang bar gyis la khyod dang btsun mo gnyis kar gshegs shig/ gzhon nus rnam par bsams te legs ldan bdag ni rgyal rigs so/ /drang
245b2(mdo 'grel): srong nas/ 'di yang yid kyi mtsho yi ni/ /chu skyes spubs las yang dag byung/ /bzhad gad pa nas/ de bzhin bdag cag gis kyang thos so/ /'dren pa nas /legs ldan bdag la ci ba bdag gis rjes su gnas ba med do/ /bzhad gad ba nas/ 'od 'ba'
