245b3(mdo 'grel): zhig ma yin pa rjes su gnang ba ni ri mo 'ongs nas bag mar byas ba ni 'di'o/ /drang srong nas/ gzhan yang 'ga' zhig med dam/ 'dren pa ni/ 'dren pa nas/ ngo cha dang bcas so/ /drang srong nas/ 'di ci zhig /'dren pa nas de ltar ro/ /drang srong nas /de
245b4(mdo 'grel): ltar 'gyur ba ci yin/ 'dren ba nas/ kye 'di nyid do/ /bzhad gad ba du zhing/ kye khyod la chags par gyur pa'i srog ma bsrung nang ni ji ltar drang srong gi rigs thams cad de bzhin du stongs par 'gyur ro/ /rig 'dzin ma du zhing da ni thams cad 'dis
245b5(mdo 'grel): phyir spong bar byed do/ /drang srong ni ngu zhing khyod kyis lus dang 'dra bar 'dis ji ltar tshangs par spyod kyang 'dzoms bar byed dam/ gal te khyod kyis de bzhin du bdag cag rnams la dga' ba mthong ba las/ slar yang gzhan du byed par 'gyur zhing/
245b6(mdo 'grel): bdag la 'dir chen pos yongs su sun 'byin cing de yis bdag 'ding chen bar yongs su bslu zhing bsreg nas/ bdag cig 'khor dang bcas pa'i skye bo rnams dang ni me'i nang du rang nyid sbyin sreg tu bya'o/ /kye 'di na su su/ mi khyer la
245b7(mdo 'grel): shog cig /bram ze nas /bdag ni lha ba mi bzod bas/ sngon du me'i nang du rab tu 'jug par byed do/ /bzhad gang pa rang nyid kyi bsams pa/ khyod kyi de nyid legs so/ /'dren pa nas/ rang nyid bsams te/ thams cad kyis yang dag bar brtun par byed 
246a1(mdo 'grel): do/ /snyam na/ /gsal por smras pa/ legs ldan bdag ni gnas gang zhig /cung zad mi sbyin zhes bya med/ /ci'i phyir shin tu snying rje bas/ /de'i phyir bdag ni yongs su sbyong/ /pad+ma can ni 'dis bdag de bzhin
246a2(mdo 'grel): du byas na mchog tu yang dga' o snyam nas/ drang srong nas/ khyod dang bu mo pad+ma can lhan cig tu chos spyod cing dug ni mi spyod/ bzhad gad ba nas/ khyod kyi slar yang bdag kyang mi grol ba ma yin nam/ 'dren pa nas/
246a3(mdo 'grel): khyod ji lta ba bzhin du gsungs shig /bzhad gang pa dang bram ze dag gar byed do/ /rig 'dzin ma ni bdag gi brtsams ba don grub snyam mo/ /pad+ma can ni byed pa pos bdag rjes su bzung ngo snyam mo/ /drang srong nas/ chos mkhyen pa
246a4(mdo 'grel): dang brtse ba yis/ /gtsug na nor bus bdag bzhin du/ /ri dbang bag mar byas kyang mi/ ri bo dran gyur de bzhin min/ /de nas sbyin sreg gi khang par zhugs te cho ga rnams ji lta ba bzhin du bsams te/ byin gyis brlabs nas thams cad
246a5(mdo 'grel): yongs su zhugs so/ /drang srong ni phyogs rnams su nyi ma'i dus tshong du song ngam/ bltas nas 'di lta ste/ dus su song zhing bi rtsu la'i nags tshal tshogs rnams sngo zhing chu klung 'gram gyi ri mo las/ /gang chen rigs rnams gnyid kyis
246a6(mdo 'grel): myos shing mig ni zlum byed ri sul gnas rnams su ni 'gro bar byed/ /shal ma kI rnams kyi ni yal ga sgra bcas sdud cing bcag nas khur ba rnams ni skyos pa yis/ /thub pa rnams kyi sems ni tshim byed yid 'phrog gu gul phye ma'i
246a7(mdo 'grel): dri bzangs phyogs rnams khyab par gyur/ /'di ni skye bo dang pa rnams kyi zla ba btsun ba zla ba yis/ /mchog tu gsal bar rab sbyar gar gyis gzhir gar mdzad gar tshogs kyis/ /gang gi legs par 'dren byed chags pa dang bral rgyal ba
246b1(mdo 'grel): rnams kya na/ /yum gyur rtogs pa mchog gi rin chen bla med de ni thob par 'gyur/ /zhes pa ni thams cad nges par zhugs so/ /yan lag gsum pa rdzogs so// //de nas sbrang gi bu mor rab tu zhugs te/ du zhing grogs mo dga' ma pad+ma can gyis
246b2(mdo 'grel): ni lo gcig lhag song ste/ bdag skal pa dman pas grogs mo dga' ma slar mthong bar 'gyur mi 'gyur ni mi shes so/ /dka' thub kyi nags tshal 'di na thub pa'i skye bos rab tu gang yang bdag ni stong pa snyam du sems? so/ /de la ji ltar bdag gis
246b3(mdo 'grel): gdung ba bsal bar bya/ /yang nas phyogs stong par zhugs nas drag por du bar bya 'am snyam ste/ 'di ni nges pa'i don du slar bya'o snyam nas yongs su zhugs so/ /skyed mos tshal 'di nas na tA na'i ljon pa 'di ni grogs mo dga' ma byis pa'i dus su yang dag
246b4(mdo 'grel): par bskrun pa gang yin pa de ni 'di'o/ /mA ta bI 'khri shing kyang 'di'o/ /bdag ni skal ba dman te lhan cig tu byas nas grogs mo dga' ma pad+ma can gyis khyad par du nye bar bskyed pa'o zhes yang dag bar 'khyud nas du zhing grogs mo dga' ma ni gang
246b5(mdo 'grel): du song khyed rnams kyang me tog kha 'bus par rigs sam/ yang na de bzhin grogs mo dga' ma yang nges par 'khrungs par gyur tam/ zhes rtogs par byed do/ /ji ltar 'di bzhin du thos te shing rnams kyang mtshungs bar mdzes par smra'o snyam
246b6(mdo 'grel): mo/ /yol ba'i nang du'o/ /a ho rmad du byung ba chen po 'khrungs snyam nas sbrang gi bu mos bltas ba na/ ji ltar bram ze mu ny+dza'i bu de nas rab tu zhugs nas a ho chen pa 'khrungs so/ /sbrang gi bu mo nye bar btung nas/ 'phags ba muny+dza'i bu la phyag byas so/ /
246b7(mdo 'grel): muny+dza shin tu dga' nas mthong ba'i bde lags 'phel bor? gyur cig /khyod kyi grogs mo dga' ma pad+ma can la khye'u zhig btsas so /sbrang gi bu mo shin tu dga' nas/ muny+dza'i bu khyod kyis bdud rtsi'i char phab bo/ /yang de'i ming cir brjod cing/ byin
247a1(mdo 'grel): gyis brlabs/ muny+dza? nas/ pad+ma skyas zhes so/ /sbrang gi bu mo nas/ dga' o dga' o/ mony+dza nas/ 'di 'ba' zhig las yang gzhan med dam/ sbrang gi bu mo nas/ 'di yang yin mod/ yang gzhan dga' ba ci zhig /mony+dza nas/ de nas
247a2(mdo 'grel): rgyal po tshangs pas byin gyis khye'u yi bzhin mthong nas mnyes te/ lha gtsug na nor bu rgyal srid lA dbang bskur ro/ /sbrang gi bu mo nas/ ho dga' o dga' o/ /monya dza nas /de nas 'od kyi blo gros ma dang/ rgyal bo tshangs pas byin gnyis dka' thub kyi
247a3(mdo 'grel): tshal du gshegs shing bskyod do/ /de nas gzhon nu gtsug na nor buAng yab kyi rjes su 'jug cing gshegs so/ /sbrang gi bu mo mi du zhing monya dza'i bu bdag gi dga' ma'ang de bzhin nam zhes smra/ mony+dza nas/ gtam lhag ma ma lus pa smra ba rna ba la
247a4(mdo 'grel): zhog cig dang/ de nas rgyal po changs byin gyis gzhon nu'i skye ba yongs su bsal ba'i phyir pho brang gi skyed mos tshal du dka' thub kyi nags kyi bya ba byed cing nags na gnas so/ /de nas yab kyi bkas rjes su gnas nas gzhon nu gtsug na nor
247a5(mdo 'grel): bu ni srungs ma med pa'i mchod sbyin bsham nas mchis so/ /bdag kyang der 'gro bar byed do/ /khyod kyi grog mo dga' ? ma la bdag gis ci zhig smra bar bya/ sbrang gi bu mo nas sngar yang drang srong gi gnas kyi rgyan du gyis shig/ mo nyadze nas dman de
247a6(mdo 'grel): slar yang bkra shis 'dzoms pa'o/ /sbrang gi bu mo shin tu 'jigs te/ bdag gis ci zhig smras snyam mo/ /de nas 'dir nad du rab tu zhugs shig/ skyes gzhan bskur bar bya'o/ /de ci'i phyir rab tu zhugs nas sod ngo/ /de nas bran po rab tu
247a7(mdo 'grel): zhugs nas phar song phar song/ ci'i phyir lhag par 'tshang zhing 'phul par byed /bram ze'i khang ba der rgyu yang ci byed/ nges par bltas nas ji ltar bsrung kyang mi sdod par yongs su 'jug cing 'di rnams ni 'dzin cing/ 'di rnams ni 'jog
247b1(mdo 'grel): cing/ yang len cing/ gzhan rnams ni sbyin sreg byed cing bram ze 'drang bar dka' ba rnams thams cad za 'dod nas 'dir ji ltar bram ze 'khyam po rnams seng ge'i gdan gyi steng du sdod/ phar song phar song/ le bram ze rnams phar zur par
247b2(mdo 'grel): zur/ dmod pa'i rma rnams na nas gar byed do/ /ran pa rnams ngal ci ste steg par byed ces smra'o/ /de'i blon po sna chen po lag bzangs nges par 'ong bar mthong nas 'di rnams de la smra'o snyam mo/ /de nas lag bzangs rab tu zhugs nas
247b3(mdo 'grel): a re ri lus ngan po phar zur par zur/ 'dir spro bas don gang ji ltar 'dod pas ster ba la ci'i phyir slongs mo pa rnams yongs sun 'byed par byed/ 'di rnams kyi don du de bzhin du yang dag par btsam pa ste/ gzhon nu gtsug na nor bus
247b4(mdo 'grel): 'gog pa med pa'i mchod sbyin thams cad rang len gyi/ yon 'di ni lha yis 'gro ba ma lus pa ni mngon 'dod yongs su 'gengs pa mchan du bcings pa yin no/ /cho ga 'di la slongs mo pa rnams la de bzhin du cung zad ni las kyang ster/
247b5(mdo 'grel): sngon yang 'dis de bzhin du mdzad nas ji ltar 'dod pa 'dzin par byed do/ /de rnams kyi 'di blo bur du byung ba ma yin no/ /'di la rab tu zhugs nas de ring gi lo la song ngo/ /bran pho ni ji ltar 'di yang rnam par khros na de bzhin du 'dir gzhan yang
247b6(mdo 'grel): mi rnyed do/ /snyam nas/ de nas bros nas song ngo/ /lag bzangs yongs su zhugs te/ lha gtsug na nor bus sbyin pa rnams rnam par lta ba la bdag bskos pa yin pas de rnams ji srid blta'o snyam nas/ /nges par bltas ba na shin tu dga' 
247b7(mdo 'grel): ste/ a to di 'di lha'i phun sum tshogs pa chen po ni gang gis ji lta ba de bzhin du ji ltar 'dod pa len bas kyang zang par ma gyur te/ /'di lta sto/ gser gyi phung po rnams ni 'di ni rab tu mtho zhing ri rab dang ni 'gran pa ltar/ /rin chen rnams
248a1(mdo 'grel): kyi phung po 'od zer rab tu 'phro ba nyi ma'i 'od kyang zil gyi non/ /mu tig mchog zlum do shal tshogs rnams bkod pa 'od zer 'tsher ba skar ma'i phreng ba bzhin/ /skye bo rnams ni gang zhig rang dbang blangs nas rang khyim bzhin
248a2(mdo 'grel): du dal bus 'gro bar byed/ /yongs su zhugs nas gzhan yang bltas pa na/ /glang chen dbang po rnams kyis myos pa'i char ni sal bar med rab tu 'bab ba len byed pas/ /myur 'gro'i lus ni rnam par ring rnams rmig pa'i rwa rnams nges par 'dred
248a3(mdo 'grel): pas ngo mtshar rab tu bcas /shing rta rnams ni rgya nag ba dan mdangs ldan rnams ni rgyug cing bskyod pa g.yer ka'i sgra bcas la/ /bram ze rnams kyis rab bskyod 'khor lo'i mu khyud sgra yis sa chen nor ldan rab tu g.yo ba ltar/ /brgya byin gyis
248a4(mdo 'grel): mchod sbyin brgya rab tu byin pa de 'dir sa'i mthil du lha la bdag gis smra bar bya'o/ /snyam nas gzhan yang bltas pa/ ji ltar mtshan nyid 'di lta bu ni ku ru'i rgyal po bzod par dka' ba gang zhig gis mi bzod par mi 'gyur ram /'on kyang
248a5(mdo 'grel): des cung zad kyang mi 'gyur snyam mo/ /yongs su zhugs pa na der sbyin sreg gi khang par lta nyid rab tu zhugs so/ /rang 'od dpal dang byams pa yis/ /tshangs pa'i zhi ba las kyang rgyal/ /bden pas sa chen lsa rgyal nas/ /chos ni mngon sum bzhin
248a6(mdo 'grel): du gnas/ /ji srid bdag nyid nye bar btud do/ /de nas rgyal po dang/ pad+ma can dang/ bzhad gad ba dang/ mkhan po rnams rab tu zhugs so/ /rgyal po dang/ mkhan po dang/ mchod sbyin rnams lag bzangs nye bar btung nas phyag 'tshal te/ rgyal po chen
248a7(mdo 'grel): po rgyal bar gyur cag /rgyal bar gyur cig /lha nyid kyi bka' yis rjes su bsgo nas sbyin pa'i sa gzhi rnams bdag gis bltas so/ /rgyal po nas de na yang ni slong ba rnams/ /rang gi khyim bzhin rab zhugs nas/ /ji ltar mngon 'dod yongs
248b1(mdo 'grel): blangs shing/ /yid kyi shing rta gang 'gro'am/ lag bzangs nas/ lha mngon par 'dod pa phun sum tshogs te/ dpal ni gang zhig sa bdag rnams kyis sa stengs nas/ /dab 'bad rnyed rnams kun la bde bar nyer bsnyen gyur/ /skye bo rnams kyis rab
248b2(mdo 'grel): tu zhugs pas khyim khyim rnams da ni khyod pas kyang ni rnams shin tu lhag/ rgyal po nas 'di ni cung zad kyang ma yin te/ 'dir phyi rol gyi dngos po rnams ni thams cad kyi thun mong ste/ 'dir bdag gi ci zhig byin/ de bzhin du 'jig rten rnams ni mthuD?
248b3(mdo 'grel): che ste rang dbang ba'i dngos po yang de bzhin du bdag gis sbyin pa'i gnas so/ zhes sgrog bar byed do/ /gzigs mdzod/ 'jig rten kun gyi sbyi yi ni/ /phyi rol dngos rnams de dag gis/ /'jig rten sred pas rnam bsrus nas/ /bdag ces 'dir ni/ /
248b4(mdo 'grel): 'dzin par byed/ /bdag gis ni/ snying po med cing mi ngan? pa'i lus 'di yang/ /'gro ba'i don grub phyir ni drag tu yongs su gtong/ /gang gA 'di ni ji lta ji ltar mngon 'dod pa/ /de dang de yi de lta de ltar rab tu sbyar ces so/ /yol ba'i nang du kA la
248b5(mdo 'grel): kA la'i sgra'o/ /thams cad shin tu 'jigs nas phyogs rnams su blta'o/ /rgyal po ni skabs ma yin par de bzhin du gnyid rnam par yur ro/ /'jig rten rnams ni yongs su g.yo'o/ /mkhan po ni gus shing 'bad pas sbyin sreg byed/ a she
248b6(mdo 'grel): a shau Sha Ta ces so/ /bzhad gad pa nas/ kye na mnyam ya mtshan che/ /ya mtshan che/ rlung ni drang pos rnam par bskyod pa yis/ /chu gter skya bo dang bcas chu rnams ni/ /dpa' rlabs phreng bas yongs su bskyod pa'i/ /gru bzhin nor ldan shin tu
248b7(mdo 'grel): g.yo bar gyur/ /rgyal po nas/ na mnyam khyod kyis legs par rtegs te/ brag chung chu'i phung po rlung gis yongs su bskyong pa'i/ /dpa' rlabs rab tu 'khrugs ltar sa chen yang dag rnam par g.yo/ /gang las de ring 'di rnams mtho dang dpa' gyur
249a1(mdo 'grel): gru bzhin byed/ /'jig rten rnams ni chang gis myos bzhin lus ni rnam par g.yo/ /pad+ma can ni ha bu pad+ma skyes gang du song ngam zhes smra/ de nas g.yog mas pad+ma skyes lag ba nas bzung nas rab tu zhugs nas gzhon nu pad+ma
249a2(mdo 'grel): skyes ni 'di'o zhes so/ /pad+ma skyes nas/ 'phags pa 'di ci zhig /lha mo ni bu'i lag pa nas bzung nas/ rgyal po'i drung du nye bar btud nas/ rje'i sras 'di bzhin du 'khrugs pa 'di bzhin du 'khrug pa 'di bzin du 'khrug pa 'di ci zhig/ 'dren pa ni pad+ma can gyi lag
249a3(mdo 'grel): pa nas bzung nas/ dbugs 'byin ste/ a yi 'jigs can re zhig ltos dang/ sngon ma mthong ba'i rmad du byung ba dga' ba'i gnas skabs kyi mthar thug pa 'di lta ste/ sa gzhi'i dpa' rlabs rim pa mtho dang dma' ba rnam pa rab tu mang
249a4(mdo 'grel): pa rnams/ /khang bzangs gdugs dang rgyal mtshan ba dan cod gan rnams ni bskyod pa'i rim pa ltar/ /sgra chen rab tu 'jug pa sprin rnams kyis ni 'brug sgra drag tu sgrog ba ltar/ /'di rnams chu gter 'dra zhing mi mtshungs khyad par glar yang
249a5(mdo 'grel): 'jig rten mi ltung cam/ /gzhan yang lha mo khang pa'i phreng ba rnams ni 'phreng la 'gyed cing slar yang langs/ /chu bo rnams ni gyen du 'phar zhing gzhan duAng 'gro mi byed/ /sa chen mtho dang dma' ba rnam pa sna tshogs byed ba ni/ /me long nang
249a6(mdo 'grel): gis zugs brnyan rnam par g.yo ba rtogs pa ltar/ /lag bzangs nas/ lha mthong lags so/ /shar gyi phyogs rnams ri'i 'gram bcas 'og tu 'gro phyed? nub phyogs nam mkha' la ni rab tu 'gro/ rnam par g.yo bas lho phyogs dma' bar ltu?
249a7(mdo 'grel): zhing byang phyogs 'di rnams shin tu rab tu mthon bor 'gro/ chu gter g.yo bas dbus ni 'og tu rab tu 'gro zhing mdza' i phyogs rnams steng du rab tu 'gro/ 'di rnams kyang ni steng dang 'og tu rab tu reg ste chu 'dzin mthar thug phyogs kyi mthar thug pa/ /
249b1(mdo 'grel): rgyal po ni ngo mtshar nas phyi rol tu nye bar byung ste 'jig rten pa rnams la dbugs 'byin pa mdzad do/ /lag bcangs ni lha'i bka' yis ji ltar bsgo nas nges par zhugs/ /rgyal po ni legs ldan nor 'dzin ma la mchod yon phul nas/ skye dgu rnams la
249b2(mdo 'grel): ltas ngan gang yin de 'bras bdag smin nas/ /bdag gi sbyin gnas rjes bzung skye bo rnams la 'byung ma gyur/ /'dir ni skye bo'i mngon par 'dod rnams rab tu rdzogs bya'i phyir/ /gal te skye bo 'di rnams nyes na'ang bdag gi mngon 'dod cha/ /mkhan
249b3(mdo 'grel): po ni gus pa dang bcas nas sbyin sreg byed/ in+d+ra A gats+tsha ha re ats+tsha me me d+ha ti tha mi She bri Sha Na ma ba Sh+ya me zhes so/ /me'i thab khung la bltas nas 'jigs pas phyir 'phar ro/ /bzhad gad pa shin tu 'jigs nas kye na mnyam ltos ltes/ 'di ni
249b4(mdo 'grel): 'jigs shing kha'i sgo nas mche ba rab tu gtsigs/ /mig ni nyin byed gsal ba'i dkyil 'khor 'dra zhing rab tu dmar/ /shin tu 'jigs chen gad rgyangs nges par rab tu sgrogs/ /'dir ni sbyin sreg thab khung byed nas yang dag byung bar gyur/ /de nas
249b5(mdo 'grel): srin po rab tu zhugs so/ /a ho hu ta ma ho da ta hUM/ zhes gar? byed cing/ 'byung bzhi 'di rnams goms pa'i stobs kis rab 'jig cing/ /bar snang 'di rnams 'od zer mngon par 'bar ba bya/ /phyogs kyi 'khor lo lag pa rab rkyang bsdud byed cing//'gro
249b6(mdo 'grel): ba ma lus bdag gis rnam par g.yo bar bya zhes so/ /rgyal po nas dag ba byed pa la bgegs med do zhes brjod pa 'di bdon par 'dug go zhes bsrung ngo/ /pad+ma can ni shin tu 'jigs nas byis pa'i gdong la gos kyi bkab ste rgyal po'i rgyab tu
249b7(mdo 'grel): 'ongs so/ /rgyal po nas/ kye sems can dgongs ci'i ched du 'dir /phyogs kyi 'khor lo lag pa rab rkyang bsdud byed cing//'gro khang chen po byas nas dgos pa ci'i ched du 'ongs kyang 'dri bar byed dam/ rgyal pa ni shin tu mnyes nas gal te
250a1(mdo 'grel): khyod kyis slong du 'ongs sam/ ci slang ba smros shig /srin po nas/ /zas so/ /bzhad gang ba 'dren pa'i rgyab tu shin tu 'jigs nas 'ongs te tshul gyi khang par zas la song zhes smra/ srin po nas/ bdag gi zas ni gzhan yin
250a2(mdo 'grel): nam/ rgyal po nas smros shig /srin po nas /sha ni mdangs ldan slar yang ral gri'i lo mas sngon nyid du/ /rnam bcad rab tu shin tu mang po dron mo mdog ni dmar po rnams/ /mi'i dbang po srin po rnams kyi bza' ba de rnams yin/ /mi yis
250a3(mdo 'grel): bza' ba'i rig rnams bdag la ces par ci zhig bya/ /rgyal po shin tu mnyes nas/ tshur shog ma phas pa yid kyi sing rta rdzogs par bya/ /tshur shog bza' ba ji ltar 'dod bzhin lus 'di ni/ /pha rol don phyir bdag gis 'di ni nye bar bsrungs//
250a4(mdo 'grel): sha rnams bcad bas bdag ni yun ring 'bras bcas 'gyur/ /pad+ma can du zhing rje'i sras sbyor? kyi di ring tshul lugs 'di ci zhig /rgyal po nas lha mo skyes pa de'i 'bras bu dang bcas so/ /bzhad gad pa nas kye na mnyam ji ltar gcig gi don gyi
250a5(mdo 'grel): phyir 'jig rten 'di rnams yongs su gtong ngam/ rgyal po nas/ bdag ni de bzhin gang du yang/ /'gro ba 'ga' yang 'dor mi byed/ /de'i phyir na skye bo 'di/ /zug rdu zhiphyir bdag nyid gtong/ /mkhan po nas/ bdag ni de lta bu'i mchod sbyin
250a6(mdo 'grel): gyi cho ga 'di mi byed do/ /'dir ni phyugs gsod lan pa'i phyir/ /bgems? ni nges par rnam par zhugs/ /'di yi cho ga rig byed las/ /'di la phyugs ni sbyin par bshad/ /rgyal po nas/ gang zhig dgos 'dod bgegs yin na/ /bdag ni?
250a7(mdo 'grel): bsregs kyang mchog tu mos/ /gang la yid kyi shing rta 'grub/ /cho ga de bzhin dag tu shog /slar yang/ kye'i? bram ze mchod sbyin la/ /srin po phyugs rnams ci phyir rung/ /yang na bdud rtsi spangs nas ni/ /snying po med bas ci zhig bya/ /srin
250b1(mdo 'grel): po nas/ b+ho khyod 'dir ci'i phyir gtam skam pos dus 'phrog par byed/ rgyal po nas/ b+ho 'dir mchog gi ches grangs la/ /lus la ji ltar 'dod pa nye bar spyod cig /pad+ma can ni du zhing skal ba dman pa bdag gi/ lus 'di yang re zhig dang por nye bar bza' bar gyis
250b2(mdo 'grel): shig/ rgyal po nas/ 'di ni bdag 'dod yin no/ /pad+ma can nam/ lus 'di yang lha'i yin mod/ srin po nas/ i mya ngan gyis 'jigs pa'i bag chags can 'dis ci zhig bya/ shums med do/ /ltos shig dang mya ngan byas pa'i sha ni bska dang
250b3(mdo 'grel): kha zhing tsha ba'i ro rnams yang dag bro bar byed/ chags pa can ni sla zhing/ khu? bar byas bzhin rab tu skrag bcas de ni bskams pa 'dra/ /khros pa'i skyur zhing rab tu cha dang rtsub cing brod med zos nas brang ni tsha bar byed/ /mchog tu byams pa'i ngo bo
250b4(mdo 'grel): nyid kyi lus ni mngar zhing dbang po thams cad mchog tu tshim/ /rgyal po shin tu mnyes nas/ ring mo nas slong ba'i skye bo mngon shes can re zhig bdag gis mthong ngo/ zhes nas mtshon thogs te/ sha gcod par byas pa na/ pad+ma? can ni lag ba nas
250b5(mdo 'grel): bzung na/ /rje'i sras ma bsams par ma byed cig ces smra zhing/ kye ? sems can chen po 'phags pa'i bu? yangs su thong la bdag long cig zer/ pad+ma skyes nas/ b+ho la k+Sha sa 'phags pa thang la bdag long cig zer/ /bzhad gad pa nas/ g+ho sems can
250b6(mdo 'grel): chen po grogs dga' ba thong la bdag zo cig zer/ rgyal po nas/ ma 'brel ba smra ba des chog chog /lha mo bdag gi chos kyi bgegs ma byed cig ces gsung/ pad+ma can ni rmongs nas gar byed/ bzhad gad pa ni gzhon nu'o? gdong gos kyi g.yags
250b7(mdo 'grel): par byed do/ /rgyal po nas/ b+ho sems can chen po gnas skabs 'drir bdag gi sha la nye bar sbyor bar gyis shig /srin po ni bdag nyid bsams te/ 'di ltar khyod ni sems can chen po ste/ bdag ni ma yin no snyam nas/ nye bar za zhing gar byed do/
251a1(mdo 'grel): rab tu gsal bar smras pa/ a ha ha 'dis shin tu ring por tshim par byas so/ /bzhad gdab nas/ legs ldan 'jig rten skyong ba rnams yongs su skyob par mjad/ yongs su skyob par mdzod/ bdag gi na mnyam
251a2(mdo 'grel): dga' ba'i srog 'dor bar byed do/ /mkhan po ni/ 'dir bsdad nas ci zhig bya zhes nas nges par song ngo/ /srin po ni da? nas re zhig tshom mo/ /rgyal po nas/ kye dge ba'i bshes gnyen 'di ni ji ltar 'dad pa bzhin du nya bar spyod cig ces
251a3(mdo 'grel): lus gtad nas brgyal te gar byed do/ /srin po nas rang nyid bsams pa/ a ho mdzad spyod che'o/ /sems can chen po yun ring por nyon mongs par mi rigs snyam nas nges par song ngo/ /mi mngon tsam na zhugs nas/ brgya byin gyis
251a4(mdo 'grel): gzugs su bstan nas/ /kye rgyal po chen po nye bar bzhengs shig nye bar bzhengs shig /rgyal ba nas/ bdag ni rjes su bzung zhing rab tu dga' bas lus la ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin nye bar longs spyod cig/ brgya byin nas bdag ni srin po
251a5(mdo 'grel): ma lags te/ bdag ni brgya byin no/ /slar yang legs par 'ongs ba 'di gang zhig/ bzhad gad pa nas/ dbugs phyung zhig/ dbugs phyung zhig/ kye na mnyam dga' ba 'di na nges par lha'i rgyal po bdag nyid byon no/ /lha bzhengs par mdzod
251a6(mdo 'grel): cig/ kye/ 'phags pa'i bu'i mdzad spyod 'di ni lhag par lha rnams la sgrogs par byed do/ /pad+ma can ni rgyal po la bltas nas du zhing 'phags pa'i bu 'di lta bu mthong nas/ bdag gi lus mnyams par gnas so snyam mo/ /rgyal
251a7(mdo 'grel): po nas/ kye/ lha'i rgyal po rab tu dgos ba ci'i phyir 'dir byon/ brgya byin nas/ khyod kyi bsam pa'i mthu mi g.yo ba la nor 'dzin dang/ ri rab dag kyang g.yos te gang gi 'dir mi dbang khyod kyi bsam pa skye bo kun la gsal bar bya ba'i
251b1(mdo 'grel): phyir 'ongs te/ rnam par spyod pa 'di ni bdag gi mig 'khrul ba yin no/ /bzhags pa phyi nas/ ? zan mnyam gzigs gzigs/ gzhan yang ya mtshan che ba 'dir ni sprin gyi dkyil 'khor la rlung drag pos bskyod pa ltar 'ur 'ur zhes rnam par
251b2(mdo 'grel): zlog par rtsom par byed do/ /rgyal po nas/ kye ma 'jig rten rnams sdug bsngal gyi ltung bar byed dam zhes gsungs/ pad+ma can nam/ 'dir gzhan 'ga' zhig kyang 'byung ngam zer/ bzhad gad pa nas gzigs gzigs/ ston ka'i zla ba gang
251b3(mdo 'grel): pa'i 'od ltar dkar zhing skar ma'i phreng ba'i do shal gyis nye bar brgyan cing gsal ba ltar/ /rin po che'i 'od zer khyad par du rab tu gsal bnar rgyas kyi gdengs ka'i dkyil 'khor ltar dkar po yang dag par mthon nas byung ngo/ /rgyal po
251b4(mdo 'grel): ni shin tu ya mtshan cho nas/ rnam par bltas te/ 'dir gzhan 'ga' zhig kyang 'byung bar 'gyur zhes so/ /bzhad gang pa nas/ kye bud med rin po che lha mo pad+ma can gyi dbyibs lta bu zhig sa gzhi'i mthil nas yang legs par langs nas byung ngo//
251b5(mdo 'grel): kyen mnyam dga' ba gzigs mdzod/ /rgyal po ni ya mtshan che nas/ rnam par bltas te/ ri ldan mthil nas mngon sum du/ /'dir ni dpal mo bzhengs sam ci/ /yang na 'di ni rnam gsal ba/ /sa chen lhag pa'i ska rags sam/ /de nas sa'i
251b6(mdo 'grel): lha mo rab tu zhugs nas mchod yon phul te skyes ba/ chen po tshur? gshegs/ /mchod yon bzhos shog? zer /rgyal po nas/ kye khyod ni 'dir gsar du 'ongs pa ste/ legs ldan grong 'jig dang gnyis po bdag gis mchod par bgyi'o/ /brgya byin nas
251b7(mdo 'grel): ji? ltar bas sa rnam dag pas/ /de'i chen por gyur pa bzhin/ /de bzhin mchod pas tshim byas kyang/ /mchog tu dga' ba thob ma yin/ /rgyal po nas khyod 'di ring de tsam sngar yang rnam par g.yo ba ci'i phyir lags/ sa nas/ khyod kyis sems
252a1(mdo 'grel): pa rgya chen mthong bas rab dga' nas/ /chu gter ri bo nags tshal mthar thug mngon par bskyod/ /khyod kyi ltad mo ya mtshan ngo mtshar lta ba yis/ /rab dga' i khur gyis lus non dbang gis yongs su 'dar/ /de nas da ni bdud
252a2(mdo 'grel): rtsi'i khu ba 'dis lus slar yang gsar par bya'o zhes/ 'dren pa'i lus yongs su byug pa byas so/ /bzhad gad pa shin tu dga' sten mnyam dga' ba ji lta bu de bzhin du mthong bar gyur to/ /pad+ma can nas/ legs ldan gyi chos kyi mthu'o/ /brgya
252a3(mdo 'grel): byin nas/ shin tu dka' ba sbyad ba 'di yis las kyi tshul 'di ni cung zad las med do/ /sa nas/ lha'i dbang po 'di la dga' ba med do/ /gzigs mdzod/ kau shi ka 'di yis sngon dus nas/ /'de bzhin lus ni stong phrag smin par byas/ /sngon yang
252a4(mdo 'grel): dri ma bsil bzhin spangs pa ni/ /bdag gis phyogs 'ga' yang ni de yod min/ /slar yang rgyal po mthong bas 'dir rmad du byung ngo/ /bdag ni 'gro bar byed do zhes nas song ngo/ /brgya byin nas rgyal po rang gi bsod nams bsags pa des mtho
252a5(mdo 'grel): ris su yang dag par gshegs par mdzod cig /rgyal po nas de na slongs mo pa yod dam ci byed/ brgya byin nas/ de med do/ /rgyal po nas/ gal te de bzhin yin na 'gro bar mi byed do/ /brgya byin nas der pha ma dag 'gro bar mes sam/ lci
252a6(mdo 'grel): ba bdag ji ltar 'dod par ro/ /brgya byin nas de bzhin 'dir 'gro bar bya'o/ zhes nas yongs su song ngo/ /de nas ji ltar bud med pa'i legs ldan 'od zer zhes pa'i drang srong rab tu bzhugs nas/ a ho rgyal po chen po'i bsam pa rab tu rgya tsho'o?
252a7(mdo 'grel): zhes rab tu zhugs te/ kyi rgyal po chen po bde legs su gyur cig/ rgyal pos phyag byas nas/ legs ldan ci'i phyir phyin/ drang srong nas 'dir khyod kyi btsun mo dang bu'i ched du 'ongs so/ /pad+ma can ni 'di ci zhig snyam mo/ /rgyal po shin tu dga' nas
252b1(mdo 'grel): legs ldan bdag gi lus la sogs pa 'di slong ba kun gyi rang dbang ngo/ /de nas yol ba las ca co'i sgra'o/ /kyo re zhig mchod sbyin gyi cho ga'i btsun mo gtong ba med/ rgyal po nas/ slong na sbyin par mi bya zhes/ /'di ni chos kyi cho gar med/
252b2(mdo 'grel): bzhad gad pa nas/ phar zur bram ze gdugs pa phar zur bar zur/ rgyal po'i btsun mos khyod la ci zhig bya/ /gzhan slongs/ rgyal po nas de skad ma zer gyi/ drang srong chen po bdag snying yang/ /ji ltar 'dod bzhin legs ldan lang/ /
252b3(mdo 'grel): drang srong nas/ bu mo pad+ma bA ti dang/ bu pad+ma ut+tar tshur shog cig/ khyed gnyis rgyal pos byin no/ /pad+ma can du zhing rgyal po chen po bdag ni yin mod kyi/ /'on kyang rgyal po'i gdung rgyud chad par 'gyur ro/ /rgyal po nas/ bdag ni mi sprin zhes pa
252b4(mdo 'grel): cung zad kyang med do/ zhes bshad zin to/ /pad+ma can nas longs shig /de bzhin du du nas ci zhig bya/ bu pad+ma skyes tshur shog /'phags pa'i bus bdag cag yongs su btang zin gyis/ yab le legs su ltos shig/ phyi nas ni mthong bar mi
252b5(mdo 'grel): 'gyur ro/ /pad+ma skyes nas ci ste phyi nas bdag gi yab mthong bar mi byed/ pad+ma can nas/ pad+ma skyes gang gi phyir na/ 'dis bdag cig yongs su btang nas gzhan du 'gro'o/ /pad+ma skyes nas yum ni ci byed pad+ma can nas/ bdag cag byin nas
252b6(mdo 'grel): 'gro'o/ /pad+ma skyes nas/ yab kyang de bzhin du 'gro bar byed dam/ pad+ma can ni pad+ma skyes kyi don ni mi shes bar shes nas bu yang la/ phyag 'tshol cig zer/ pad+ma skyes ni thal mo sbyar nas/ yab bdag gi yum 'di tsam bshums ci ste/ bzhad gad
252b7(mdo 'grel): pa nas/ kye ma khyod ni snying rje med ka gang zhig 'di bzhin tsho de yis/ /bshums shing byis pa yongs su btang/ /hA zhes pad+ma bA ti dang/ /hA bu pad+ma ut+ta ra/ /khyed cag gnyis po dag yin no/ /bram ze'i bu bdag cag kyang khyad cag gi rjes su 'gro bar bya'o
253a1(mdo 'grel): zhes rmongs nas gar byed do/ /drang srong nas shog shog/ bu mo bdag cag rnams 'gro bar bya ba ring por 'gro dgos so/ /rgyal po ni pad+ma skyes kyi spyi bo la bsnoms nas/ bshum shing/ nags sam yang na grong khyer ram/ /ri
253a2(mdo 'grel): bo dang ni rgya mtsho ? rung/ /khyed cag nyal zhing gnyid log kyang/ /lha rnams kyis ni slung bar shog/ lha mo khyod ni gar gnas der/ /gzhon nu 'di la rdeg ma byed/ /lha mo ni bsting tshig gis 'phags pa'i bu de bzhin duAng mkhyen nam/ rgyal po
253a3(mdo 'grel): nas/ khyed ci srog ni yongs 'dor kyang/ /drang srong chen po'i bka' ma 'da' / /me'i? gzugs dang 'dra ba yi/ /mchog gi thub ba tshig byas pa'i/ /bsod nams yongs su bsgrub byas pas/ /'jig rten kun gyi mngon 'dod tshim/ /drang srong nas
253a4(mdo 'grel): bu mo long shig/ bdag cag 'gro bar bya'o/ /rgyal bo nas/ lha mo gshegs par mdzod cig/ pad+ma can ni phyag 'tshal te/ /rgyal rigs skye pa'i mthar thug par/ /bdag kyang de bzhin 'jug par shog ces so/ /pad+ma skyes nas/ yab kyis nga
253a5(mdo 'grel): la sngon ni rta sbyin zer nas ma byin pas da khyod ngal nam ster/ rgyal po ni bshums shing pad+ma can la 'khyud nas bu de thub pa 'dis khyod la ster bar 'gyur gyis/ pad+ma skyes nas/ yab ba/ 'di na da'i rta dang glang bo che dang/ glang po'i khri dang
253a6(mdo 'grel): rta'i sga 'di rnams tshags gyis shig zed/ rgyal po rang nyid bsam sman?/ skabs 'di ni bdag gi zug rdu ni/ /srog la bab kyang de bzhin min/ /ji ltar pa'i mnyes? shin pa'i/ /pad+ma mchog ni ring du 'gro/ drang srong nas/ /bu mo shog/ bdag cag
253a7(mdo 'grel): 'gro bar bya'o/ /pad+ma can ni rgyal po la blta zhing/ bu'i lag pa nas bzung nas song ngo/ /rgyal po nas/ brtse ba'i zhags pas legs bsnams bzhin/ /gang gi bdag kyang shin tu gdung/ /na mnyam dbugs phyung shig/ dbugs phyung shig /
253b1(mdo 'grel): bzhad gad pa rtabs bzhin du langs nas/ kye/ mi ster ci zhig zer/ rgyal po rtab rtab po mdzad nas rnam par bsams pa/ da ni bdag gi pham dag blta bar bya'o snyam ba na/ pho brang 'khor gyi mi rnams rab tu zhugs nas ngo mtshar che/ ngo mtshar che/ lha'i
253b2(mdo 'grel): yab yum dag nam mkha' la bya ba mdzad pa gcig gzigs mdzod/ dang ba'i gshog pa'i cha yis bskyod bzhin rgyal mtshan phreng ba can/ /gzhal yas khang 'dras ri rab lhun po'i rtse mor rnam par gnas/ /lha'i drang srong rnams kyang mngon dga' 
253b3(mdo 'grel): brgya phrag rnams kyis bstod dang 'di dag lha'i gnas su da ni rab tu zhugs bar gyur/ /rgyal bo shin tu mnyes te gzigs nas phyag 'tshal zhing de bzhin du tshigs su bcad pa 'di nyid klog go/ slar yang gzigs nas bshums shing/ yab ni rnam
253b4(mdo 'grel): sad lam du ring du gshegs shing/ yum kyang rjes su gshegs so// //pad+ma skyes dang lha mo grong khyer spangs shing gnyis skyes khyim du song/ /da ni 'di ni stongs gyur ri bo shin tu dben pa'i nags tshal gyi/ /gnas la bdag kyang rten byed
253b5(mdo 'grel): blo ni 'gro bar shin tu rings par gyur/ /zhes gsungs nas yongs su zhugs pa na/ bzhad gang pa nas/ kye na mnyam khyod kyang gshegs par mdzad na/ nam bdag bram ze yongs su 'dom par byed dam/ 'dren pa nas/ khyod ni ji ltar 'dod
253b6(mdo 'grel): pa bzhin no/ /bzhad gang pa nas/ bdag bram ze yang gal te khyod kyis 'ga' zhig gi bran la mi ster na rjes su 'gro'o/ /rgyal po nas/ khyod bram ze yin mod/ de bzhin du bdag ster ba'i bdag po yang khyod nyid do/ /pho brang 'khor gyi mi rnams nas/
253b7(mdo 'grel): kye gzhon nu gtsug na nor bu khyod kyang bdag cag rnams yongs su 'dor ram/ nor ldan ri phug khyod nyid ni/ /bsam gtan gyi spyan 'byed mi byed/ /g.yo ba med pa mtsho bzhin nags kyi lha rnams kyis ni lta/ /rgyas pa'i rnams bsdus nas gang gi
254a1(mdo 'grel): zlos gar rab sbyar la/ /nye bar yongs su rtsom mdzad tsan+d+ra go mis rab sbyor dang/ /gal te 'ga' zhig chags pa dang bral mtshungs gyur 'gro rnams la/ /yang dag skyes sam sa? chen yun ring gnas pas bden par smras/ /
254a2(mdo 'grel): 'dir ni thams cad nges par zhugs so// //yan lag bzhi pa rdzogs so// //de nas rig 'dzin pa rab tu zhugs so/ /rtsed mos rol cing mkha' la rgyub? na a ho lha gtsug na nor bu'i grags pa rgyun mi 'chad pas phyogs
254a3(mdo 'grel): ma lus pa khyab cing gang ba 'di lta ste/ gtsug na nor bu'i snyan pa'i grags pa chen pos phyogs rnams thams cad rab tu mdzes bar brgyan/ /de yis rna ba'i rgyan bzhin gos dang bcas bzhin mnyam bzhin kun nas rgod bcas bzhin/ /tsan
254a4(mdo 'grel): dan tshogs rnams bdud rtsis gang dang zla pa'i 'od zer 'cher bas rnam par byug ba ltar/ /ngo shal rnam par 'phyad ba 'od zer 'gro ba'i tshogs kyis khyab cing rnam par g.yo ba ltar/ /ltos ltos/ de'i grags pa nges par 'phel ba ni/ /
254a5(mdo 'grel): phyogs phyogs mi 'am ci'i bu mo rnams kyi glu len cing/ /ri bo'i rtsi la grub pa rig 'dzin rnams ni bstod cing sgrogs/ /sa 'og mthil na gtsug gi nor bu'i 'od zer rab 'bar ba/ /klu rgyal rnams kyis gdong ka'i dkyil 'khor zhi nas nyan par
254a6(mdo 'grel): 'dod/ /rig 'dzin mnas pad+ma pA ti ni yug sa mo ma yin bzhin du bu chung dang bcas 'khor thams cad yongs su spang ste/ bdag po'i bkas drang srong chen po'i rjes su 'brang zhing da lta ji ltar gyur ta ma rig pa 'dzin ba nas/ de bzhin
254a7(mdo 'grel): legs ldan 'od zer can gyi gnas brten nas/ /ri bo gangs ldan mi ring ri sul dag na slar yang gnas/ /drang srong chen por yang yab ni srid 'byung yid bcugs so/ /de'i phyir 'di ni gzhan gyi log tu 'gro bar mi bya'i phyir/ /drang srong chen
254b1(mdo 'grel): pos de nyid slong bar mdzad cing zhugs par nges so/ /rig 'dzin ma dga' nas/ pad+ma can ni sngon gyi rigs su rab tu zhugs te/ de ni sdug bsngal gyi khur bkur dka' ba ni med do/ /de nas da lta lha gtsug na nor bu ji ltar thos sam/ rig pa 'dzin pa nas
254b2(mdo 'grel): de yang pad+ma can gyi gang du khyer dang gnas pa mi shes shing/ de dang nye ba ni de bzhin ri'i phug tu rab tu zhugs nas so sor gnas par gyur/ de yi rnam par spangs pa'i grong khyer sA ke ta ni mchod sbyin phun sum tshogs pa rnams/ /shin tu mi bzad bzod
254b3(mdo 'grel): par rab tu dga' ba'i rgyal pos mthong nas nye bar bskor bar byas/ /rig 'dzin ma nas rje'i sras 'di'i dga' ba'i gtam 'di bsdud par 'gyur ram mi 'gyur/ /rig pa 'dzin pas 'di ni bsam gyi ste lta'i'o/ /rig 'dzin ma nas rje'i sras gang du bas par
254b4(mdo 'grel): rig pa 'dzin pa/ rgod cing 'di khyod kyi smros shig/ gang zhig ma la ya'i rtse mo/ /rgya mtsho'i dpa' rlabs 'thor ba'i mdangs can nam/ /ri rab bdag? mi rnams yang dga' zhing ya mtshan zhig gam yongs su sa brtol ri bo 'am/ /gang zhig sgeg cing
254b5(mdo 'grel): gsal la grub pa rnams ni rab dga' i ri bo gangs ldan rtse mo 'am/ /sa gzhi thams cad bris pa bzhin du nam mkha' mthil ns lta zhing 'gro bar byed dam ci/ /rig 'dzin ma nas/ shin tu phul du byung ba'i gnas bdag la yong de gtsug nor bu
254b6(mdo 'grel): mthong ba de ru de bzhin du babs par bya'o/ /rig 'dzin ma nas/ legs ldan rnams ni mthong bas kyang/ /dag 'gyur mngon par brjod pa legs zhes nas yongs su zhugs so/ /ri phug 'di ni chu bo dal gyi 'bab pa yi/ /chu 'thor zer ma bsil zhing rlung ni 'jam
254b7(mdo 'grel): pos bskyod/ /ljon shing gzhon nuAng yal ga rnams ni kha 'bus pa/ /gang de skyes bu seng ge'i nye 'khor gnas yin no/ /rig 'dzin mas rnam par bltas te/ 'di ni nges par phyag bya ba'i gnas so/ /zhes gnyis pos phyag 'tshal nas rig pa 'dzin pas nges
255a1(mdo 'grel): bar brtags nas/ 'dir ni de badwa ru ljon pa'i bsil sgrib bog? /nor bu mu tig rdo bdag gi steng na ni/ /pad+ma'i stan can mngon sum bzhin du skyil krung mdzad/ /gzhon nu gtsug na nor bu nye bar bzhugs par 'gyur/ /rig 'dzin +
255a2(mdo 'grel): ma nas/ a to de ni shin tu brtan pa zab pa brling pa'i mdzad pa can no/ /'dis gangs ri thams cad dpal gyis gang bar byas so/ /rje'i sras 'dir me tog 'di rnams gang nas byung/ /rig pa 'dzin pas steng du bltas pa na la mtshan che
255a3(mdo 'grel): ste/ mkha' las lta rnams me tog char 'bebs shing/ /sems can chen po mngon par mchod par byed/ /de ni de bzhin mchod pa'i don du ni/ /bdag cag gis me tog 'tshol du 'deng zhes nas so/ /de nas rab tu zhugs pa na 'dren pa ji lta ba
255a4(mdo 'grel): mthong ste spyan cung zad phye nas a ho nang med pa'i bsam gtan bzhi ni 'di lta ste/ rnam par rtog bcas rnam par dpyod dang g.yo ba'i brlabs/ /dang po yin te dga' bde g.yo bcas gnyis po'o/ /bde ba la chags 'jig pa'i nang can
255a5(mdo 'grel): gsum pa'o/ /rab tu zhi ba ro gcig mthar thug 'di ni bzhi bzhad gad pa nas/ kye/ na mnyam khyod rang gcig pu de bzhin du dang po dang gnyis ba dang/ gsum pa dang/ bzhi pa'i bsam gtan gyi bde ba thob nas bdag cig pu 'gengs shing thum
255a6(mdo 'grel): por bsdams nas tshong ba bzhin du rnyed pa thob nas gnas par byed dam?/ bdag bram ze la yang bsam gtan cig kyang ma byin zhes zer/ 'dren ba ni bzhad cing na mnyam pa 'di ni sgom pa'i rjes su 'jug ste/ gzhan la sbyin par mi nus so/ /phrang?
255a7(mdo 'grel): ba'i yon tan bdag nyid bzhin/ /gal te bsam gtan 'jug 'gyur na/ /'jig rten kun gyi don bsgrub phyir/ /yid kyi shing rta cis mi sgrub/ /bzhad bde ba nas/ ji ltar bsam gtan gyi bde ba thob par 'gyur ba lags/ /'dren pa nas gnyis
255b1(mdo 'grel): min rten cing 'dod lha'i mchog rnams bcom/ /bde ba 'di ni rang dbang yod byas na/ /g.yo ba rnams bsal mtsho chu shin tu dangs/ /bsil bzhin rang gi sems las rab tu ste/ /bzhad gad pa nas/ 'di ni gzhan zhig la/ yul gyi bde ba yang gzhan zhig
255b2(mdo 'grel): gram ci/ ci 'dren pa nas/ khyod ni bdud rtsi dang dug bsre bar byed dam ci/ bsam gtan bde bas yid kyi bsil bar byed/ /yum gyis slar yang dbang med sems byed cing/ /'dod chags zhe sdang me yis rnam bcings nas/ /dmyal ba'i me yis
255b3(mdo 'grel): sreg par byed pa ltar/ /bzhang gad ba ? gal te de bzhin du yin na bdag kyang bsam gtan byed do/ /rgyal bo nas/ de bzhin du mdzod cig /bzhad gdab bsam gtan byed ba na dbang? cung zad thos so/ /kye du ba bzhin du thos par byed do/ /'dren pa
255b4(mdo 'grel): nas/ bsam gtan ya mtshan che'o/ /bzhad gang ba nas khyod kyis ci yang ma thos sam/ rgyal pos kyang cung zad thos te/ 'di ni drag ba 'ba' zhig tu ma zad nges par nud med du zhing 'dug go/ bzhad gad pa nas/ ji ltar shes/ rgyal po nas/ yan
255b5(mdo 'grel): lag mchog rnams dbyangs? mnyen zhing/ /rnam par 'dren ring snyan dang 'dzim/ /bskyod pa rno zhing rnam bar gcod/ /skyes bu rnams ni rnam bar rtsub/ /na mnyam mi ring bar mnyen pa bzhin du'o/ /bzhad gad pa nas/ 'di'i dbyangs sgrogs tshul ni sngon
255b6(mdo 'grel): thos pa gcig 'dra pa snyam mo/ /rgyal bo nas/ bdag kyang de bzhin du snyam mo bo de ni dka' thub ma mnar ba zhig du ba yin nam/ der mngon par 'gro bar rigs so/ /bzhad gar bo nas/ kye na mnyam de ltas nas/ ci zhig byed zer/ yol ba'i nang du'o/ /legs
255b7(mdo 'grel): ldan 'jig rten skyong rnams yongs su skyob zhig yongs su skyob zhig zer/ rgyal po nas skye bo 'di bzhin du mnar ba ci zhig nye bar blta bor rigs so/ /bzhad gad pa nas/ kye khyod ji ltar dus thams cad du gsar bu bzhin du pha rol gyi bdag nyid
256a1(mdo 'grel): sdug bsngal bar byed dam/ rgyal po nas na mnyam/ 'khor par ring du slar yang ni/ /bdag nyid de bzhin skye zhing skyes/ /sems can 'ga' gnyen min pa/ /gang na'ang de ni gcig yod min/ /gnyis po rtab rtab por langs te yongs
256a2(mdo 'grel): su zhugs pa na bzhad gad ba nas/ kye 'di ni lha mo pad+ma can la ci zhig rjes su byed pa ma yin nam /rgyal po na re khyod ci zhig smra/ gang na lha mo pad+ma can gang la'o skol mnyes kyang phyogs tsam zhes zer/ de nas pad+ma can sha ba ri
256a3(mdo 'grel): gnyis dang rjes su 'gro zhing rab tu zhugs so/ /sha ba ri dags nas/ song mi khyod song zhes skad chen bos smra zhing khyod mi 'gro 'am zhes mad mA ta ka zhes pa nas bud med rnyed pa 'dis nga'i bu chud de'i nu ma mnun pa'i ma ma byed do zhes zer
256a4(mdo 'grel): gnyis pa nas ha kye Na Te kal lo la kA 'di ni'u cag gnyis kyi thob bo/ /ji ltar 'gro ba de ltar 'gror chug zer/ pad+ma can du zhing kye ma ji ltar 'phags pa'i bu khyod ni yongs su skyob ba'i ngang tshul de lta na skal dman bdag gi gnas
256a5(mdo 'grel): skabs 'di lta bur 'jug pa las yongs su skyob par mi byed dam zhes smra/ bzhad gang pa nas/ kye ji ltar the tshom byed/ lha mo pad+ma can no/ /rgyal pos de la bltas nas rtab rtab por lha mo ma 'jigs shig /pad+ma can ni brtags nas
256a6(mdo 'grel): 'phags pa'i bu 'am su zhig yin/ yang na bdag gis 'dir 'ba' zhig la 'phags pa'i bu'o zhes nye bar mthong ngam/ rgyal po ni bshums shing lha mo 'di nye bar mthong ba 'di ni bdag yin te/ nye bu'i skye bo sdug bsngal bar bya'o/ /
256a7(mdo 'grel): bzhad gang pa nas/ kye lha mo ji ltar thams cad gzhan yin snyam du sems shig /'di ni na mnyam dga' o/ /pad+ma can ni gnyis po la bltas te/ shin tu sdug bsngal na sa la 'gyel lo/ /sha ba ri dags nas/ shog mi? khyod? shog /bzhad gang
256b1(mdo 'grel): pa ni dbyug pa gyen du sbrengs te/ ha na de bran mo yi bu sdug pa can gyi sha ba ri dags/ dbyug pa kyog po lag 'gro khros pa 'dra ba'i dbyug pa 'dis khyed cag gi mgo gzhom par bya'o/ zhes zer/ rgyal po na re na mnyam de bzhin du ma byed cig /
256b2(mdo 'grel): ji ltar gnod pa byed pas bshes gyur pa/ /de ltar phan pa mdzad pas mi 'gyur snyam/ /gang las de'i bzod par gyur pa yis/ /'gro ba mdza' dag zlog pa'i rgyu nyid do/ /sha ba ri dags phan tshun bltas nas shin tu brtan te g.yo bar gal
256b3(mdo 'grel): 'gyur/ de ltar na bdag cag 'gro bar bya'o/ /'di ni bdag cag dbang pos sprul pa byas zer/ 'jigs pas gar byed cing nges par zhugs te song ngo/ /'dren pa nas/ a yi lha mo 'dir ci'i phyir ji ltar 'di 'dra ba'i skabs su zhugs /pad+ma can
256b4(mdo 'grel): du zhing 'phags pa'i bu bdag gi skal ba la dri bar mdzod/ /bzhad gad ba nas kye lha mo gzhon nu pad+ma skyes ji ltar/ pad+ma can phyogs rnams su bltas nas skal ba dman pa bdag la nga bzod gtam ci zhig/ rgyal po rtab rtab por bu
256b5(mdo 'grel): ci ci zhes smras/ pad+ma can nas/ bu pad+ma skyes di ring gang na zhes smra/ bzhad gad pa na re/ ci ci kye lha mo smros shig/ pad+ma can nas/ bdag gi bu pad+ma skyes kyi dus gang/ bzhad gad pa nas kye lha mo gzhon nu ji lta ji ltar pad+ma can de yang bdag
256b6(mdo 'grel): gi yang phrogs so/ /rgyal po nas/ bdag gi bu gang gis phrogs pas gang gis yang shin tu mi bzad ba 'dir gnas zhes bshums shing gnod pa shin tu mang ba dgon pa'i gnas 'dir bdag gis gzhan ci zhig sems par byed/
256b7(mdo 'grel): bzhad gad pa du zhing kye ma yongs su tshim pa med ba'i med pa'i gshin rjes di ring med par byas so/ zhes rnam bar bsams te/ kye lha mo ji ltar 'di bzhin du sdug bsngal spyod ba dang phrad/ pad+ma can nas/ bdag me tog thu ba'i phyir gnas nas 'ong ba
257a1(mdo 'grel): dang phrad do/ /rgyal po nas/ lha mo nam zhig drang srong chen pos khyod ma mthong ba dang khro bar 'gyur ro/ /de nas bzhengs la de bzhin du 'gro bar mdzod cig /bzhad gang pa nas /kye ji ltar swa ri btson ra nas lag tu 'ongs
257a2(mdo 'grel): ba la slar yang khyod kyi ji lta ba bzhin du der 'jug gam/ rgyal po nas/ na mnyam 'di ni chos kyi lugs ma yin no/ /pad+ma can rgyal po la bltas nas du zhing 'phags pa'i bu khyod kyis bdag slar yang yongs su 'dor ram rgyal po nas
257a3(mdo 'grel): ji ltar khyod kyi bdag g.yang sa chen por sgyur bar byed dam/ gzigs mdzod/ don gang bdag gis yongs su btang nas/ /slar yang len par 'dod pa na/ /dper na khyi bzhin gsal bor ni/ /slar yang skyugs pa za byed dam/ /shin tu yun
257a4(mdo 'grel): ring gnas gyur kyang/ /bdag cag nam zhig 'bral bar nges/ /de bzhin du yang gsungs te/ bsags pa thams cad mthar mdzad cing/ /mthon po rnams ni dma' mor? lhur?/ /'dus ba'i mdza' ni 'bral ba ste/ /gson po'i mdza' yang 'chi
257a5(mdo 'grel): ba yin/ /gzhan yang lha mo/ kun gyi rang bzhin yun ring gnas kyang rnam par 'bral/ /'chi bdag zhags pas 'dzin cing rnam bar kha gdags rgyu/ /gal te chos phyir 'di ni de ltar rnam bral kyang/ /yang dag 'dus pa bas kyang shin tu dga' bar 'gyur
257a6(mdo 'grel): pad+ma can nas 'phags ba'i sras gang gsungs ba der bdag 'gro'o/ /gal te bdag 'gro yang rkang ba'i sna mi 'gro'o/ /rgyal mo nas/ lha mo dang tshul 'di yis bdag gi bka' ni sgrub bar mdzod/ /na mnyam drang srong chen bo'i gnas su lha mo
257a7(mdo 'grel): bskyal bar mdzod cig /bzhad gang? pa nas/ na mnyam ji ltar gsungs pa bzhin du bya'o/ /pad+ma can ni du zhing kye /gau ta ? skad cig bzhes par mdzod cig /bdag ni re? zhig? 'phags pa'i bu lta bu'o/ /bdag ni skal ba dman te slar yang bdag gis
257b1(mdo 'grel): mthong bar bya ba ga la yin zhes chags shing nges par bltas 'phags pa'i bu bdag la'ang legs par gzigs mdzod/ slar yang bdag gis khyod mthong bar mi 'gyur ro/ /rgyal po nas lha mo nges par bstan pas ci zhig/ 'dus pa thams cad 'di
257b2(mdo 'grel): bzhin 'gro bar 'gyur te gzigs mdzod/ dper na lam la lam zhugs rnams/ /'gro zhing lam du 'dus 'gyur nas/ tshogs kyang phyogs gzhan 'gro bar byed/ /de bzhin gnyen 'dun tshogs rnams so/ /bzhang gad? ba nas/ kye na mnyam snying rje
257b3(mdo 'grel): med par ma byed/ kye lha mo'i dbugs 'byin bar mdzod cig/ rgyal po ni bshums shing ji ltar bdag gis dbugs dbyung bar bya ste/ slar yang 'byung 'gyur yang dag 'dus pa thob ce'am ni slar yang khyod ni sras po ni/ /pad+ma skyes kyis 'dir
257b4(mdo 'grel): ni blon po dang ni dpung tshogs thams cad bcas par 'gyur ce'am/ /lha mo'i gyos sgyug bdag gi yab yum dag ni rab tu dang bas di ring thob ce 'am/ /mnga' ris shin tu rgyas bar sgra 'am ji ltar bdag gis dga' bas rab tu dbugs
257b5(mdo 'grel): dbyung bya/ /yol ba'i nang nas 'di bzhin no zhes so/ /thams cad rtab rtab por gyur te/ slar yang yol ba'i phag nas 'di bzhin no zhes pa ni ci zhig/ 'di bzhin gar la rig 'dzin rnams/ /dga' bas legs 'ongs nam mkha' las/ /me tog rnams
257b6(mdo 'grel): kyi char phab ste/ 'dir ni gsal por gyur pa'o/ /rgyal po ni nge tshe? dang bcas te/ lha mo 'dir yang 'ga' zhig 'ongs nas gal te bdag la 'di lha mo dang bcas pa mthong na brdzun gyi dam bca' zhes 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /pad+ma can du zhing phyag 'tshal
257b7(mdo 'grel): te/ khyod la lha rnams kyis mthong bar 'gyur mod ces zer nas lta zhing yongs su song ngo/ /bzhad gad pa rjes su zhugs te song ngo/ /rgyal bos gzigs te/ bud med rin chen sbyin par btang/ /yid ni 'gro zhing bya ba byas/ /bdag gi gtsug gi
258a1(mdo 'grel): rin chen 'di/ /spun bzhin du ni don med nas/ da ni dam pa slong ba su zhig 'byung snyam ba na/ de nas bram ze gcig zhugs nas kye bdag slong ba bo zhes yongs su zhugs so/ /pad+ma can gyis bltas te/ gau ta ma bram ze 'di ni ci zhig
258a2(mdo 'grel): slong bar byed do snyam du bdag snying gi sems so/ /bzhad gang ba nas kya lha mo 'di yang bram ze ste/ thams cad du bdag cag bram zes gtong bar mi byed de 'di na yang slob bo/ /yang ni nags tshang tshing gi dpag tu lha mo lta zhing sdong cig
258a3(mdo 'grel): bdag gis nye bar 'gro bar bya'o/ /bram ze nges par bltas te/ 'di ni lha gtsug na nor bu/ gang yin pa 'di yin te/ gcig pu nyid kyi phun tshogs kyis/ /sa gsum rnams ni khyab par mdzad/ /bskal pa 'chags dus gnas pa yi/ /legS
258a4(mdo 'grel): ldan padmo'i skye gnas bzhin zhes zer nas/ kye rgyal po bde legs su gyur cig /rgyal bo nas/ bde bar 'ongs sam 'dir zhugs shig gsung mig g.yas pa 'phrig phar gyur nas bsams pa/ ji ltar mig gi g.yas 'gul zhing/?
258a5(mdo 'grel): gang zhig lhag bar mngon gsal byed/ /gang brgya chen bsngags 'os pa'o?/ /gsal bar slong ba por gyur nges/ /bram ze chen po ci slong bar byed gsungs shig ces so/ /bram ze ni ngo tsha bzhin du bdag ni nges par 'dod pa che'o/ /rgyal po
258a6(mdo 'grel): dga' ba dang bcas te ngo tsha ba chog go /bdag nyid kyi bzhin du 'di thams cad kyang khyod kyi'o/ /bram ze nas/ gzhan don ro gcig shar ba yis/ /'gro ba'i bshes gnyen zhi mdzad ba/ /bdag gi mngon 'dod khyod bzhin du/ /khyod kyi gtsug
258a7(mdo 'grel): gi nor bu ste/ /bzhad? gang ba rtab rtab por nye bar btud de/ kye bram ze khyod la ngo tsha ba'ang med do/ /na mnyam dga' ba'i lus kyi gnas skabs kyang 'di bzhin du sdug bsngal bar byed dam/ rgyal po nas na mnyam de bzhin dus byed/ ji ltar bdag gi
258b1(mdo 'grel): mchod pa'i gnas khyod kyis rgyud du 'phen nam/ 'di ni sbyin bdag 'dir bdag slong mo pa/ /grogs po phyin ci lag tu ci phyir byed/ /'di ni 'gro ba myang 'das rgyur 'gro ba'i/ /bdag gi kun mkhyen gzhon pa'i mchog yin no/ /gzhan yang yid bzhin nor dang
258b2(mdo 'grel): slong ba'i skye bo bdag /phun tshogs yon tan slang ba'i skye bo 'phags/ /yid bzhin nor ni nor tsam ster byed kyi/ /slong ba'i skye bo yon tan kun 'byung ngo/ /kye bram ze gtsug gi nor bu 'di ni ji ltar 'dod par bton nas khyer cig /bram ze nas /lha yi
258b3(mdo 'grel): gtshug gi nor bu ri rab kyi/ /rtse mo lta bur su yis bskyod par nus/ /rgyal po nas/ rdo? ba yis bsnun cing thon cig /gzigs mdzod/ chu shing snying po med pa ltar/ /rnam par nyams gyur bdag med ba'i/ /lus 'di gzhan don 'gro ba yi/ /dga' 'gyur
258b4(mdo 'grel): gang gis skye ba med/ /bzhang gad pa nas /yongs su skyob zhig /yongs su skyob zhig rigs? tshal gyi lha rnams gdug pa can gyi bram zes na mnyam dga' ba ni gsod par byed do/ /lha mo rtab rtab por gyur nas 'di las gzhan yang mthong bar 'gyur ram
258b5(mdo 'grel): zhes 'ongs so/ /bram ze ngo mtshar te/ ci ste nags tshal gyi lha rnams 'ongs sam snyam mo/ /pad+ma can nas 'phags pa'i sras bya ba 'dis ci zhig byed/ rgyal bo nas/ yid kyi shing 'dra'i 'bras bu dang bcas so/ /pad+ma can du zhing 'phags pa'i bu'i yid kyi
258b6(mdo 'grel): shing rta'i 'bras bu dang bcas so/ /bram ze'i 'dod pa grub bo/ /rgyal po nas/ shin tu bdag tu rmongs pas chog go /gzigs mdzod/ 'khor ba'i chu gter sems can rnams/ /las kyi dba' rlabs shugs kyis bskyob/ /mthon po dag ni dma' mor 'phangs
258b7(mdo 'grel): de la gang dang gang gis bsnyen/ /bram ze nas/ shin tu snying rje chen po la ltas nas bdag kyang yang dag par brtse bar skye na gtsug gi nor bu re zhig zhog cig /pad+ma can nas/ bram ze de bzhin du rjes su 'jug go /bzhad gad ba dga' nas legs par smras? so/ /
259a1(mdo 'grel): rgyal po shin tu mnyes nas kye bram ze khyod kyis gzhan du smras nas 'di bzhin du rigs sam/ bram ze nas rgyal po bdag cag gi yul du mA ri'i nang zhugs te/ de'i phyir blangs nas 'das spro bar byed do/ /rgyal po ni rtab
259a2(mdo 'grel): rtab bor ji ltar bram ze zhes gsung/ bram ze nas/ kye rgyal bo/ srang dang so so'i khyim rnams dur khrod mi bzang bzhin/ /yan lag brkyang zhing lus 'dzag shing gi phung bo bzhin/ /ri rab kyang ni khyi dang mkha' 'gros sgyu ma rnams/ /rab
259a3(mdo 'grel): zhugs 'di ni ku ru'i yul du phyung bar gyur/ /rgyal bo nas/ sdug bsngal lo/ /kye/ bram ze mA ri'i nang de la rab tu zhi bar byed pa'i thabs gang yang med dam/ bram ze nas/ 'chi nad rab tu zhi bar byed pa'i ched du 'di bzhin lha'i gcug gi bu slong ba
259a4(mdo 'grel): 'jig rten pa rnams kyi bdag btang ngo/ /rgyal bo shin tu mnyas nas skye bo rnams la phan pa bya ba'i phyir bdag gi gtsug gi nor bu slong bar byed do/ zhes kun nas phyung nas/ gtsug gi nor bu bkan nas rtsa bar rnam par bcings par phyung nas ni/ /'di
259a5(mdo 'grel): ni chang chen ri bong 'dzin pa chen po'i 'od zer lta bur dkar/ /'gro ba'i don rnams yang dag bsgrub mdzad gnyis skyes la byin nas/ /mi drag 'gro ba kun gyi nad rnams 'di yis sel bar shog /ces byin te brgyal nas gar byed do/ /pad+ma can
259a6(mdo 'grel): du zhing ha 'phags pa'i sras ha mthu chen bo mgon med rnams kyi gnyen khyod kyis bdag gcig pu 'dir yongs su 'dor bar byed dam zhes zer/ bzhad gang pa nas/ han mnyam dga' ba 'gro ba kun gyi gnyen brtse ba chen po yongs su skyob shig
259a7(mdo 'grel): dpag bsam gyi shing yongs su 'dor zhing chu gter yongs su skam mo zhes zer/ bram ze ni gzhan du 'dir sdad nas ci zhig byed /'di ni sems dpa' chen po de yi mngon bar 'dod pa bdag gis bsgrub bar bya'o/ snyam nas yongs su zhugs nas bltas
259b1(mdo 'grel): phan der thub pa cig 'ongs so/ /bdag ni sdig pa mi bzad ba dang ldan bas ji srid 'dis mi mthong ba de srid bdag 'bros so snyam nas zhugs so/ /de nas drang srong 'od zer can rin chen phred ba mdang bcas te rab tu zhugs so/ /ci ste sgra chen gnas skabs ma yin 'di
259b2(mdo 'grel): ltar lhung zhing ci ltas? chen g.yo bar byed/ /ci ste rlung rnams kyang ni rtsub cing ci ste phyogs rnams kyang ni skya bor 'gro bar byed/ /ci sta nyi ma yang ni mtshams min gza'i bdag pos 'dzin cing bcom nas gnas byed cing/ /ci ste nyi ma'i gung la di ring 'dir ni
259b3(mdo 'grel): yul rnams mun pas yang dag sgrib par byed/ /'di bzhin du mi'i bdag po la ji ltar sdug bsngal mi 'dod pa zhig go snyam nas bu mo rin chen phreng ba ma da ltar pad+ma bA ti gar song /rin chen phreng bam nas/ chu klung dal gyi 'bab pa'i 'gram du me tog thur
259b4(mdo 'grel): song ngo/ /drang srong nas 'di myur du ltar 'gro bar bya'o zhes yongs su zhugs pa na rna bar cung zad thos nas a ye ji ltar du ba'i sgra 'dra ba zhig go /der re zhig bdag 'gro bar bya'o zhes nas yongs su zhugs nas bltas pa na/ rin chen phreng ba ma du zhing/
259b5(mdo 'grel): legs ldan pad+ma can ni ji ltar du zhing mchis so/ /'di ltar gau ta ma'o/ /drang srong mas 'di las gzhan 'ga' zhig kyang ngo/ /rin chen phreng ba mas nges bar bltas nas/ hA? bdag gsod 'di ni lha gtsug na nor bu ste sa la 'gyel nas mchis so/ /
259b6(mdo 'grel): drang srong na/ hA bdag gsod bdag skal ba dman pa mi rtag pa ni stobs che'o/ /skye ba'i dpag bsam shing bzhin du/ /rtag tu 'tsho bar byed pa'i/ /de ni 'di na nyal zhing 'gyel/ /phun tshogs nges bar skad cig tsam/ /bu mo pad+ma bA ti 'di zhig /ji lta bde bzhin
259b7(mdo 'grel): du du bar byed do/ /bzhad gad pa nas/ legs ldan gzigs gzigs/ drang srong nas/ 'di ji ltar yin/ bzhad gad pa nas/ legs ldan gtsug na nor bu'i sbyin pa'o/ /drang srong nas /hA dbag bsam gyi shing 'gro ba'i gnyen gcig pu zhes zer/ pad+ma can
260a1(mdo 'grel): la rin chen phreng ba ma 'khyud nas grogs mo dga' ma 'dir shog /gnas skabs kyi mdza' 'di la ltos shig /hA bu pad+ma skyes yab kyis kyang yongs su 'dor bar byed do/ /de nas pad+ma skyes dang/ lag bzangs dag
260a2(mdo 'grel): yang rab tu zhugs te/ 'di ni nga'o/ /pad+ma skyes ni 'dir blangs nas/ /bzod bar dka' las rgyal bar byas/ /rje'o lta zhing 'gro bar byed/ /de las yid kyi the tshom ci/ /pad+ma skyes nas/ adzdza sna chen po yum dang bcas te yab dang mjal bar byed
260a3(mdo 'grel): do zhes zer /lag bzangs nas /gzhon nu de ji lta ba de bzhin du bya'o zhes zer/ yongs su zhugs pa na /pad+ma skyes rta babs bzhin du 'gyel bar gyur to/ /adzdze da'i rkang ba la ci nam cig gis rmugs so shes zer/ lag 'jigs nas/
260a4(mdo 'grel): myur du bltas te rang nyid bsam ba dang/ skrag pas kun nas 'gyel te/ ji ltar 'di ni sbrul yin te/ sa yi ser ga 'dir rjes su zhugs te song ngo/ /bdag gi mngon 'dod grub ba 'di nyams so snyam mo/ /yang na myur du lha'i drung du nye bar 'gro
260a5(mdo 'grel): zhing slob ma thag tu gtsug gi nor bu'i 'od zer gyis dug med bar 'gyur ro/ /snyam nas gsal bar smras pa/ gzhon nu myur du mdzod cig /yab yum dag dang mjal bar bya'o/ zhes smras pa na/ da'i rkang ba ni sprid? sil sil mchis so/ /gnyid
260a6(mdo 'grel): kyang bra lus bo yang 'dar zhing mchis so zhes zer /lag bzangs kyi rna bar cung zad thos te /ji ltar 'dir yang du ba'i sgra zhig go snyam nas brtag pa ni/ de ci ste 'di ni lha mo bshums pa yin nam/ 'di ni rin chen phreng ba ma'o/ /'di ni legs
260a7(mdo 'grel): ldan 'od zer can no/ /snyam nas/ shin tu sdongs nas 'di thams cad ci'i phyir du zhes yang bltas pa na/ de rnams ni du zhing lha ni gzims nas bzhugs so/ /a ye lha'i dbu na ci'i phyir 'di bzhin du song /nges bar lhas nas hA rgyal bo chen bo ji ltar
260b1(mdo 'grel): 'di 'dra ba'i gnas skabs su gyur zhes lha mo la lha zhing/ khyed kye spyan ni btsums shing mchis/ /de ring 'jig rten snang ba med/ /snang byed dang bral nam mkha' bzhin/ /dbu'i gtsug kyang stong par snang zhes 'dren ba'i zhabs la phyag 'tshal nas/ 'dir
260b2(mdo 'grel): ni lha 'ba' zhig gshegs par mdza? gcug gi nor bu'i 'od zer dang bral bas da ni gzhon nu yang gshegs par 'gyur ro/ /rin chen phreng ba ma pad+ma skyes la 'khyud de bu pad+ma skyes yab la gzigs mdzod cig phyi nas nam yang mthong bar mi 'gyur
260b3(mdo 'grel): ro/ /pad+ma skyes nas/ yab 'di bzhin du ci? ste/ pad+ma can nas/ bdag ni skal pa'i rang bzhin no/ /pad+ma skyes nas/ yab bzhed mdzod bdag gi yum yang bshums shing mchis so shes brgyal zhing gar byed do/ /pad+ma can dang/ rin chen breng bam?
260b4(mdo 'grel): dag kyang hA bu ha gzhan du?/ hA bu chung khyod kyis kyang bdag cag yongs su 'dor ram/ lag bzangs nas/ hA bcom mo/ /skal ba dman ba 'dir phun sum tshogs pa'i rgyal rigs stongs so/ /bzhad gang ba nas/ bu pad+ma skyes dbugs phyug?
260b5(mdo 'grel): zhig drang srong nges par bltas pas ngo mtshar bar gyur nas/ 'dir ni tsan dan chu yis thig le'i zer ma'i mkha' las yan lag mchog char 'bebs shing/ /bung ba dang bcas me tog rnams ni ring nas lding zhing rig 'dzin rnams kyis 'thor bar
260b6(mdo 'grel): byed/ /klu rnams kyang ni dal gyis 'bab cing chu klung dal gyis 'bab pa gting zab rnams kyang ni/ /bil pa'i 'od zer 'gyed cing lha yis rdza rnams 'dir ni ri bo'i phug rnams rab myos byed/ /thams cad ya mtshan cha nas bltas so/ /pad+ma can nas/ 'phagS
260b7(mdo 'grel): pa'i sras kyi sku ni lha rnams kyis mchod pa'i ched du lha'i 'jig rten du len par byed do/ /zhes zer nas drang srong gi rkang pa la phyag 'tshal nas/ legs ldan bdag bka' yis rjes su gnang bar mdzod cig zer nas/ lag bzangs la lta zhing/ bdag gi 
261a1(mdo 'grel): srog shing sta gon gyis shig bdag gi gtam gyi phyi ma yin no zhes zer/ bzhad gang pa nas/ kye/? lha mo thang cig gzhes shig/ bdag kyang na mnyam dga' ba'i rjes su lhan cig 'gro'o drang srong nas da dung yang dus nas ci
261a2(mdo 'grel): zhig byed ma mthong dam ci ste/ 'di yi thugs ka rab tu 'gul zhing spyan yang 'phrig par byed/ /'di yi zhal ni mtsho yi pad+ma bzhin du rnam par 'dzum/ /'di yi sku ni ba spu g.yo zhing phyag kyang skyob par rtsom/ /'di'i spyan ni 'jig rten rnams dang
261a3(mdo 'grel): lhan cig 'gyod ba tsom bzhad pa nas/ kye lha mo 'khrug par ma byed cig/ ne mnyam dga' bas kyang 'dzin par byed do/ /pad+ma can des bar bltas nas/ 'dir bdag gi skal bas dbugs 'byin par byed do/ /zhes pad+ma skyes kyi lag pa nas bzung
261a4(mdo 'grel): nas bu dbugs phyung zhig /bu dbugs phyung zhig /khyod kyi yab ni 'tsho bar snang ngo zhes zer/ rin chen phreng ba ma nas/ kye rgyal po chen po'i 'khor rnams dbugs phyung zhig zer/ rgyal po ni bkan nas rtsa ba'i gces pa'i tshigs su bcad ba nyid
261a5(mdo 'grel): klog cing dal bus gsal bar byed do/ /pad+ma can nas/ 'phags pa'i sras 'di ni gzhon nu pad+ma skyes te/ 'di yang 'brid bar mi byed dam/ rgyal po nas bu pad+ma skyes 'dir shog gsung/ lag bzangs nas/ bdag gi skabs 'dir ji ltar bya/ /lha
261a6(mdo 'grel): 'di ni bdag gis ngal bso nas song ba na/ sprul gyi mche bas bzung ste brgyal nas mchis so/ /rgyal po ni rtab rtab por 'di ci zhig/ pad+ma can nas/ hwa bu pad+ma skyes kyis yab ma mthong ma zer/ rin chen phreng ba ma nas/ hA grogs mo dga' ma
261a7(mdo 'grel): khyod kyi yid kyi shing rta ma rdzogs so zhes zer/ bzhad gad pa nas/ kye gshin rje tshim pa med pa zer /lag bzangs nas/ lha yi gtsug gi nor bu gang na /bzhad gang pa nas/ bram ze la byin no/ /lag pa thangs nas g.yo sgyus bcom ste bzod
261b1(mdo 'grel): par rab tu dka' ba'i g.yo thabs nges par yin no/ /lha ji ltar dgra rnams 'tsho ba'i phyir gtsug gi nor bu ster bar byed/ rgyal po nas/ bdag la phyis kyang gdung ba med do/ /drang srong nas cis shes zer/ rgyal po nas legs ldan gang gi bden ba 'di dang
261b2(mdo 'grel): snying rje'i bsams pa'i 'bras bu dang/ /de byin bdag la nam yang rjes su gdung ba med gyur na/ /de yis da ltar de bas nus mthu shin tu lhag gyur ba'i/ /'gro la phan phyir bdag la gtsug gi nor bu 'byung bar shog ces gsung ba dang/ /glog
261b3(mdo 'grel): 'khrug pa bzhin du mthong nas thams cad rtab rtab por gar byed do/ /pad+ma skyes kyang nye bar langs so/ /drang srong nas/ a ho sems dpa' chen po'i bsam pa rnam par dag gyur te/ /nyi ma 'od zer stong phrag rnams ni 'phro zhing gsal ba ltar/ /slar yang
261b4(mdo 'grel): mi'i bdag la gtsug gi nor bur 'khrungs gyur nas/ /gang gi mthu n rab rkyang dug gi mun ba mngon par bcom/ /pad+ma skyes kyang da ni pad+ma bzhin du rab tu 'dzum zhes zer nas thams cad rtab rtab por gar byed do/ /pad+ma can ni rgyal po la lta zhing pad+ma
261b5(mdo 'grel): skyes la 'khyud nas slar bdag gi mig phye bar gyur to zhes smra'o/ /bzhad gad pa nas/ na mnyam dga' i rdzu 'phrul mngon du mdzad do/ /rin chen phreng ba ma nas/ 'di 'dra ba ltar yod pa bdag cag rnam pa dga' mo yin no zhes zer ro/ /lag bzad
261b6(mdo 'grel): nas/ gzhon nu yab yum dag la phyag 'tshal cig zer/ pad+ma skyes ni thal mo sbyar nas phyag 'tshal bar byed/ rgyal po nas chos dang ldan bar gyur cig ces gsungs/ pad+ma can nas yab ji lta bar gyur cig zer/ drang srong nas/ lha mo dang gzhon
261b7(mdo 'grel): nu yang 'dir bdag gis 'bul bas rgyal po bzhes par mdzod cig zer/ rgyal po nas/ khyed ji ltar gsung ba bzhin du bya'o/ /thams cad shin tu dga' nas gar byed do/ /drang srong nas 'di bzhin du byas pa khyod kyis bzod? par? mdzod? cig zer /'dren
262a1(mdo 'grel): pa nas rjes su bzung ba la bzod pa'i yul gang la yin gsung/ yol ba'i nang nas/ khyod kyi yon tan rnams kyis skye dgu'i yid kyi shing rta rdzogs par shog /mya ngan thang la chu gter dang ni ri bo 'dzeg ba'i skabs su shog /
262a2(mdo 'grel): chu gter sgrol ba'i gzings dang mi bzad mun pa rnams kyi snang bar shog /'jigs chen skyabs gnas dang ni dbul po rnams kyi dpag bsam shing du shog ces zer ro/ /rgyal po nas 'di grang zhig /drang srong nas/ 'di yi lha yi chags
262a3(mdo 'grel): rnams mnyam du khyab 'jug /dbang phyug tshangs pa dbang po zla ba sogs/ /lha rnams kun gyis mkha' i khang bzangs gnas shing thams cad 'di bzhin nam mkha' khyab par gyur/ /chen po da rnams gang rnams kyi ni rdzu 'phrul rnam par 'phel
262a4(mdo 'grel): zhing ser bo dkar po yis /phyogs rnams rab? tu mjes? shing khyab pa rtsigs logs ri mor bris pa bzhin du mdzad gyur to/ /khyed kyi yab yum dag kyang nam mkha' i bzhon pa la gnas nas bu dang bcas shing chung mar bcas ba shis pa brjod par
262a5(mdo 'grel): bya'o/ /rgyal po 'khor dang bcas pas phyag byas so/ /legs ldan ci ci zhig bsgrub par bya ba gsungs shig /drang srong nas/ khyod ni med gyur mnga' ris sdug bsngal gnas/ /slar yang gshegs shing slar yang skyo bar mdzod/ /di ring sa ge'i
262a6(mdo 'grel): grong khyer gshegs pa'i phyir/ /mkha' bzhon 'di yang dbang pos khyod la bsrings/ /rgyal bo nas/ gong ma rnams ji ltar gsungs ba bzhin du bya'o/ /thams cad shin tu dga' zhing zhon nas gar byed do/ /yongs su zhugs pa na rgyal po
262a7(mdo 'grel): nas/ a ho mkha' i bzhon pa ni shin tu mgyogs te/ dang ba'i gshog pa rnam par bskyod bas rgyu ba'i tshogs ltar chu 'dzin rnams ni ring por gyur/ /ri bo'i dbang po rnams ni blang? chen dbang po myos bzhin mngon du phyogs nas rgyug cing 'ong//
262b1(mdo 'grel): 'di ni dbang pos dkrigs shing 'khor lo bzhin du nam mkha' mthil ni rnam par spyod bar byed/ /nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor nye ba'i 'od zer tshogs pas bskor zhing byang gi phyogs su 'gro bar byed/ /drang srong nas/ 'dir ni bzod dka' grong khyer skye bo'i gnas bcas
262b2(mdo 'grel): khyod las ni/ /bdud ris dkrugs shing 'jig rten kun 'tsho ba lta zhing phyag byed do/ /'di rnams kyang ni skye bo'i gnas bcas shin tu 'das byas nas/ /bdag nyid ji lta bzhin du grong khyer sA ke ta gnas so/ /slar yod khyod kyi dga' ba'i bya ba ci zhig /yod pa
262b3(mdo 'grel): smra bar gyis shig /rgyal bo nas/ 'di las kyang dga' bar bya ba ci zhig yod/ lha mo pad ma ba ti bu'i zhal dang/ dga' ba'i gtam/ gzhon zhing mkha' i bzhon ba la gnas yab yum lha tshogs 'khor bcas mthong/ /dga' ba'i blan po sna
262b4(mdo 'grel): chen dang ni skye bo'i sdug bsngal ma lus pa/ rab tu zhi gyur gzhan ni ci zhig bsgrub par bya zhing bya ba ci/ /'on kyang dga' bar bya ba yod de/ 'gro rnams dam chos 'byung zhing rab tu sbyor ba'i ltad mo chen por shog/ legs spyod yon tan rnams kyis
262b5(mdo 'grel): 'chi bdag yid kyi shing rta 'bras med shog /thub pa'i skye bo'i gtam gyis 'bril? 'tshogs zhi zhing bdud rtsi'i char rnams kyis/ /bsil zhing dge bas zla ba'i snang bas rab tu 'go zhing don byed shog /gang zhig snyan dngags? bden pa rnams kyis
262b6(mdo 'grel): dus ring dga' byas i? lU sha'i sres rnams kyis/ /dus ring nas ni nor gyi khur thob ring nas skye bo'i sems ni rab tu dga' bar mdzad/ /slar yang bkur gnas mthong bar gyur nas dpal ldan chags ba dang bral zhes bas mdzad gyur ba/ /'jig rten
262b7(mdo 'grel): kun tu dga' ba sna tshogs zlos gar gyis gzhir thob bar shog /ces smras nas thams cad nges par zhugs so// //yan lag lnga pa rdzogs so// //gzhon nu gtsug na nor bu'i skyes pa'i rabs zlos gar gyis bstan
263a1(mdo 'grel): bcos 'jig rten kun tu dga' ba zhes bya ba/ slob dpon chen bo tsan dra go mis rab tu sbyar ba'o// //dam pa rnams kyi tshul la brten nas ? chen bo kIrti can dra dang/ yar lungs ba grags pa rgyal mtshan gyis
263a2(mdo 'grel): bal yul yam bu'i grong khyer du legs bar bsgyur ro// // (*/ /klu kun tu dga' i zlos gar dpal dga' ba'i lhas mdzad pa bzhugs so/ //) */ /rgya gar skad du/ nA ga nanda nA ma nA Ta ka/ bod skad du/ klu kun tu dga' ba zhes bya
263a3(mdo 'grel): ba'i zlos gar/ thams cad mkhyen ba la phyag 'tshal lo/ /dga' ma dga' ba'i zol las skyes ba'i spu long dag gis bsgribs ba'i lus 'dzin cing/ /'dzum dang ldan pas rgyal ba'i byang chub dag la bkod ba me tog snying pa ni/ /gshog
263a4(mdo 'grel): rtsar ba bskyod sgra sgrogs smad rtsi? re bas sbrang rtsi re bas? bsten cing de'i/ /rkang pas bsnun pas kha zum? tshogs phye ge sar gsal par gyur pas khyed la bsrungs/ /bsam gtan zol dag nye bar bzung nas skad cig mig phye su la sems bar
263a5(mdo 'grel): byed/ /skyob pa yin yang lus med mnga' gzir skye bo 'di dag srung ba min la ltos/ /snying rje ldan pa rdzus te khyod las gzhan pa'i brtse med skyes phug? la yod/ /bdud mo rnams kyis byang chub la 'di phrag dog gis brjod rgyal bas khyed la bsrus
263a6(mdo 'grel): gzhan yang gzhu bkang 'dod ba dang ni rngags brdung zhing sgra sgrogs bdud kyi dba' bo dang/ /smin 'khyog rab 'dar glal 'dzum logs su lta ba mtho ris bu mo'i skye bo dang/ grub pa yan lag mchog bdud rnams dang mtshar bas spu langs lus
263a7(mdo 'grel): can nor lha yis/ /byang chub 'thob la bsam gtan g.yo med ces bltas thub pa'i dbang pos khyed la bsrungs/ /shin tu mangs bar 'gyur bas dga' bar byas te mdo 'dzin ba'o/ /de ring bdag po'i dga' ston la phyogs sna tshogs nas
263b1(mdo 'grel): 'ongs pa /dpal ldan dga' ba'i lha'i zhabs kyi pad+ma nye bar bsnyen pa'i rgyal bo'i tshogs rnams kyis gus pa dang ldan bar bos te/ bdag la smras ba/ ji ltar kho bo cag gi rje dpal ldan dga' ba'i lhas/ sdang med pa'i dngos po rgyan rnam par bkod ba rig
263b2(mdo 'grel): pa 'dzin pa'i skyes rabs las btsams pa/ klu kun tu dga' ba zhes bya ba'i zlos gar mdzad pa ni kho bo cag rnams kyi nyan pa po brgyud pa las thos te/ sbyor bdag ni mthong ngo/ /de'i phyir rgyal po de nyid la gus pa dang/ kho ba cig? la rjes su
263b3(mdo 'grel): bzung ba'i blos sbyor ba ji lta ba bzhin du khyod kyi zlos gar dag byos shig ces so/ /de'i phyir re zhig tshon gyi bkod pa dag byas nas ji ltar mngon par 'dod pa bzhin yongs su rdzogs par bya'o/ /'dung ba'i skye bo 'di dag gi yid ni kun tu tshim par gyur
263b4(mdo 'grel): to zhes bya bar bdag gis 'ongs te/ gang gi phyir/ dpal ldan dga' bsnyan ngag mkhan po mkhas la 'dung pa 'di dag yon tan 'dzin/ /'jig rten du ni byang chub sems dpa' i spyod pa yid 'phrog zlos gar bdag cag mkhas/ 'dir ni dngos bo re re
263b5(mdo 'grel): dag kyang 'dod ba'i 'bras bu 'thob ba'i gnas yin na/ /bdag gi skal ba rgyas bas yon tan kun gyi tshogs 'dus 'di la smos ci dgos/ /nges na re zhig khyim pa ma 'os te klu dag la gnas par bya'o?/ /yongs su bgrod cing phyir mngon par phyogs
263b6(mdo 'grel): te bltas nas 'phags ma re zhig 'dir/ /de nas gar mkhan ma du zhing zhugs so/ /mdo 'dzin pas mthong nas/ 'phags ma klu kun tu dga' ma zhes bya ba'i zlos gar bya ba yin ni ci'i don du rgyu med pa nyid du bar byed/ gar mkhan mas jo bo ji ltar mi du
263b7(mdo 'grel): lte/ gang gi phyir re zhig yab ni yum dang 'grogs nas rgan bo'i dngos pos yid byung ste/ nga ni khyod kyis gnyen mtshan gyi khur dag 'dzin par mzod? do zhes thugs la gzhag nas dka' thub kyi nags su gshegs so/ /mdo 'dzin pas bdag kyang yongs
264a1(mdo 'grel): su btang nas ji ltar yab yum nags su gshegs/ rnam par bsams nas de na nga ni ci zhig rigs par 'gyur/ yang na bdag bla ma'i zhabs kyi rim gro byed pa'i bde ba yongs su btang nas ji ltar khyim du 'dug bar byed /ji
264a2(mdo 'grel): ltar sprin gyi bzhon pa bzhin/ /dbang phyug rim pas 'ongs btang ste/ /pha ma'i sring zhu sgrub pa'i phyir/ /bdag kyang nags su 'gro bar bya song bar gyur te skabs dbye ba'o/ /de nas sprin gyi bzhon pa dang/ /bi dU Sha ka dag zhugs te/ /'dren pas/ chags
264a3(mdo 'grel): pa'i gnas zhes bya bar bdag gi rig /'jig ces bya bar bdag gis ma rtogs min/ /bya dang bya min rnam par dpyad rnams la/ /phyir phyogs gyur bar sa la sus ma rig/ ba ma'i sri zhu byed ba bdag gi ni/ /lang tsho dbang po'i dbang du gyur ba
264a4(mdo 'grel): 'di/ /gal te gus pas 'di ltar nyid gyur na/ /de ltar smad bar 'os kyang dga' byed gyur/ /bi dU Sha kas khro ba dang bcas par/ /kye gang gis tshe gson bzhin du shi pa'i rgan rgon 'di dag 'di ltar nags na 'dug pa la 'di snyed kyi dus su sdug
264a5(mdo 'grel): bsngal nyams su myong yang khyod ni yid byung bar ma gyur to/ /des na rab tu dang bas da dung yang re zhig bla ma'i zhabs kyi sri zhu la chags ba las phyir bzlog la rgyal srid kyi bde ba nyams su myong bar byos shig /'dren pas/ ji ltar yab kyi
264a6(mdo 'grel): mdun du sar 'dug mdzes ba de lta seng ge'i khril yod dam ci/ /yab kyi zhabs dag nyed? ba las byung bde ba de ni rgyal srid dag la yod dam ci/ /bla ma'i lhag ma dpyad pa'i dga' ba gang 'dis sa gsum spyang pa dag la yod dam ci/ bla mas
264a7(mdo 'grel): btang pa'i rgyal srid nges bar gdung byed dag ste des na yon tan ci zhig yod/ bi dA Sha kas /bdag nyid kyis rtogs bar e ma 'di ni skye ba bla ma'i sri zhu la chags pa zhig go snyam du bsams nas/ des ni 'dir yang re zhig brjod bar bya'o/ /gsol
264b1(mdo 'grel): bar kye grogs po nges par rgyal srid kyi bde ba 'ga' zhig gi ched du bdag gis? 'di brjod ba ma yin te/ gzhan yang khyod la bya ba dag yod ba nyid do/ /'dren bas/ 'dzum dang bcas bas bya ba bdag gis byas ba nyid ma yin nam ltos shig /rigs
264b2(mdo 'grel): par 'os pa'i lam la blon po rnams sbyar dam pa rnams ni bde la bzhag/ de bzhin gnyan gyi skye bo bdag mtshungs nyid byas rgyal srid dag kyang bsrung par byas/ /yid la reg ba las lhag 'bras ster? dpag bsam shing yang slong ba rnams la byin/
264b3(mdo 'grel): 'di las gzhan pa'i bya ba ci zhig khyod kyi sems la gang zhig gnas pa smos/ /bi dU Sha kas /kye grogs po shin tu thub chod ldan zhing nyams par byed ba'i lha/ /ma tad ga 'di mthun pa'i phyogs su nye bar gnas ba la gtso bo dang gten dag yang dag
264b4(mdo 'grel): par gnas kyang khyod med na bdag ni rgyal srid legs par gnas par mi rtog go /'dres pas ma tang ga'i rgyal srid len par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i dogs ba yod dam ci /gal te de ltar gyur na de las cir 'gyur/ bdag gi lus la sogs pa thams cad
264b5(mdo 'grel): gzhan gyi don nyid du yongs su bsrungs pa ma yin nam/ gang yang rang gis ma byin ba de ni yab kyi dor yin no/ /des na don med pa'i dam? ba 'dis ci zhig bya/ /yab kyis rjes su bstan pa nyid ltur bsgrub bar bya'o/ /bi dU Sha kas/ kye yab kyis ci zhig
264b6(mdo 'grel): bstan/ 'dren pas /ji ltar nyi ma mang por yongs su spyad pas dka' thub kyi nags 'di yam shing dang ku sha dang/ me tog dang/ nye bar mkho ba'i rtsa ba dang 'bras bu dang sdong bu dang/ rngang? mang bdag ring du byas bar gyur gyi/ de'i phyir ma la ya'i ril
264b7(mdo 'grel): song la bsti gnas 'ga' zhig rtogs shig /ces yab kyis bdag la rjes su bstan to/ /de'i phyir re zhig ma la ya nyid du 'gro'o zhes te song? bar gyur to/ /bi dU Sha kas mdun du bltas nas kye grogs po ltos shig ltos shig /brlan dang bcas shing
265a1(mdo 'grel): bstug po'i tsan dan gyi nags kyi khrod nas yongs su bskyod pa dri bzang rgya chen pos bsgos pa can ri'i ngas mi zad pa las babs pas dum bur 'gyur ba'i chu rgyun las mthong ba'i thigs pa bsil po 'dzin pa ma la ya'i? rlung
265a2(mdo 'grel): 'di ni nges par lam gyi yongs su dub pa dag sel zhing/ dang por 'grog par 'dod pa'i dga' mal mgrin pa nas bzung ba bzhin du grogs po mdza' bo la spu longs rgyas bar byed pa 'dra'o/ /'drin pas kun tu bltas nas a ye bdag
265a3(mdo 'grel): cag gis rim la yar sleb par gyur to/ /brtags nas /e ma 'di ni dga' bar bya ba zhig ste /de ltar yang/ dga' ldan phyogs kyi glang bo 'gram ba'i ngos bdar tsandan dag ni chag cing zag /chu gter brlabs rnams rab tu bsnun pas phug
265a4(mdo 'grel): dang lung pa dag ni cho nges sgrogs/ /grub pa'i bud med bgrod pa rnams kyi rkang ba'i smugs rtsis dmar ba mu tig rdo/ bsten byar bo ma la ya 'dis bdag gi sems ni ci yang sred ldan byed/ de na tshur sheg /'di la 'jegs te 'dug par
265a5(mdo 'grel): 'os pa'i bsti gnas ngag par bya'o/ /'jigs te mtshan ma bsal bar byas nas/ bdag gi mig ni g.yas pa g.yo/ /'bras bu 'dod pa 'ga' yang med/ /thub pa'i gsung brdzun ma yin/ 'di ni ci zhig 'chad 'gyur ke/ bi dU Sha kas kye grogs po
265a6(mdo 'grel): la dga' ba 'ga' zhig nye bar ston to/ /'dren pas/ nges par ji ltar khyod kyis smras pa de bzhin no/ /bi dU Sha kas/ kye grogs po ltos shig ltos shig/ khyad bar dang bcas bar sdug cing snum pa'i rkang thung gis nye bar mdzes shing/ ba'i mar gyis
265a7(mdo 'grel): dri'i snying po can gyi du ba drag tu 'gyur la/ ri dags kyi tshogs 'jigs ba med cing lam du bag phab te gnas pa 'di ni dka' thung kyi nags tshal bzhin du mtshon no/ /'dren bas/ grogs po yang dag par mtshon no/ /'di dag ni dka' thub kyi
265b1(mdo 'grel): nags chal nyid de/ gang gi phyir/ gos kyi don du shing shun rnams bcad rtse ba nyid kyis shin tu che ba min/ /ril ba snying pa chags pas mtshan ma'i chu rgyun dag ni mkha' ltar rab tu dang/ /'ga' zhig dgan mun 'dza'i ske rags khye'us bcad cing
265b2(mdo 'grel): dor par gyur ba mthong/ /rtag tu thos pas ne tsho dag kyang rig byed tshig 'di rab tu sgrog par byed/ /de nas tshur sheg rab tu zhugs te/ nye bar mtshon bar bya'o/ /rab tu zhugs te gar dag byed do/ /'dren bas/ e ma thub pa'i skye bo rab tu dga' ba rnams
265b3(mdo 'grel): ni rig byed kyi tshig rgyas ba la the tshom rnam par dpyod par byed la/ khye'u yi skye bo rnams ni ji ltar bsher ba bsher ba'i yam shing dag spyod cing/ dka' thub ba'i gzhon nu ma rnams ni ljon ba gsar pa'i kyo ra 'gyengs par byed pa'i dka' thub kyi nagS
265b4(mdo 'grel): tshal ni rab tu zhi ba dang dga' bar byed pa nyid du/ /'di nyid na bud ba'i sgra yis legs par 'ongs sam zhes ni brjod pa bzhin/ /'di dag mgo ni 'bras bu dud pas 'dus pa byed pa bzhin/ /char rtog char pa 'thor zhing bdag la mchod yon ster ba
265b5(mdo 'grel): bzhin/ /yal ga ldan pa yis kyang mgron gyi bsnyen bkur ji ltar bslabs/ /de'i phyir dka' thub kyi nags tshal 'di ni 'dug bar 'ongs pa shig ste/ 'dir gnas na bdag cag gi sems bde bar 'gyur ro snyam mo/ /pha? dU Sha kas/ kye grogs
265b6(mdo 'grel): bo 'on kyang nges bar ri dags 'di dag mgrin ba cung zad bskyogs te g.o ba med pa'i kha las cung zad zos pa'i rtsa kham nang na gnas ba zag cing rna ba gcig rab tu bslang ste btang nas mig zum pas nyan bar byed pa lta bur mtshon no/ /
265b7(mdo 'grel): 'dren bas rna gtad nas/ gnas thob rab tu gsal ba'i gros can gdangs snyan ngag gis rnam par bzhag pa 'dzin byed pa/ /bung ba'i sgra bzhin nges par yid 'phrog rgyud mang dag gi rgyud mangs sgra dang ldan pa yis/ /gsal zhing rol sgeg? 
266a1(mdo 'grel): tshig ldan blu ni kun tu 'khyog pa'i lus can ri dags 'di dag rnams/ /so'i phar na gnas brtswa'i kham ni gcod ba'i sgra dag bsdams nas nyan bar byed/ /bi dU Sha kas/ kye grogs po dka' thub kyi nags tshal 'di na su zhig
266a2(mdo 'grel): glu len par byed/ /'dren pas/ ji tar sor mo 'jam pa'i mnga' mas mngon par bsnun pa'i rgyud mangs shin tu gsal ba ma yin bar sgrogs shing glu yang snyan cing phra ba gtso bor len ba de ltar bdag rtog pa ni gnas 'di na lta dag mnyes
266a3(mdo 'grel): par byed cing lta'i bud med rgyud mangs dang ldan ba'i glu len par byed do/ /bi dU Sha kas/ kye grogs po tshur sheg /yu'u cag kyang lha'i gnas blta par bya'o/ /'dren pas legs par brjod de/ nges par lha ni phyag bya bar 'os ba'o/ /nye bar
266a4(mdo 'grel): song ste 'phral lam 'dug nas grogs bo gal te na skye bo 'di lta bar mi ngos pa srid do/ /nges na re zhig tam la'i gel pa 'di'i nang du 'dug ste lta lta ba'i skabs btsal bar bya'o/ /de ltar byas te/ de nas ma la ya can ma dang/ 'bangS
266a5(mdo 'grel): mo zhugs te la 'dug nas rgyud mangs sbreng bar byed do/ /'dren mas glu len pa/ gau ri rab rgyas pad+ma'i ge sar gyi/ /dngul ltar dkar ba'i 'od can bcom ldan ma/ /khyod kyi bka' drin dag gis bdag gi ni/ /mngon par 'dod pa rab tu grub
266a6(mdo 'grel): par 'dod/ /'dren bas sna gtad nas/ /e ma'i glu/ /e ma'o rol mo/ /'di la gsal byed kyi dbyangs rnam pa bcu po 'dis gsal ba thob cing/ myur ba dang bar ma dang ngal ba'i stobs rnam pa gsum rab tu gsal bar yongs su bcad de/ ba lang
266a7(mdo 'grel): gi rnga ma la sogs pa rnam pa gsum gyi rim bas ngal gso bar byas pa de kho na'i chogs kyi rjes su 'brang ba'i rol mo'i cho ga yang dag pa gsum bstan to/ /'bangs mos/ rje'i sras mo nges bar yun ring du glu dag blangs nas khyod kyi
266b1(mdo 'grel): lag rtse dag yongs su ming la lam/ 'dren mas/ drung mo bcom ldan mi'i mdun du rgyud mangs sgrogs par byed pa la bdag ga la ngal/ 'bangs mos smod pa dang bcas par kye brtse med ma 'di yi mdun du rgyud mangs bsgrags pas ci zhig bya zhes bdag
266b2(mdo 'grel): smra'o/ /gang zhig 'di snyed kyi dus su skye bo gzhon nu ma'i dka' thub bsnyen gnas nges pa la gnas bas bstan kyang da dung khyod la dang bar mi ston no/ /bi dU Sha kas thos nas/ kye grogs po 'di ni nges par gzhon nu ma ste ci'i phyir mi lta/ 'dren pas
266b3(mdo 'grel): skyon ci yod/ gzhon nu ma lta ba ni skyon med ba nyid do/ /'on kyang gal te na bdag ca mthong nas 'jigs te/ ngo tsha gzhon ma la rnyed sla bas 'dir yun ring du mi sdod pa srid do/ /des na re zhig 'khri shing gi dra pa 'dis bsgribs te blta bar bya'o/ /
266b4(mdo 'grel): gnyi gas bltas so/ /bi du Sha kas/ ya mtshan dang bcas par kye grogs po ltos shig ltos shig /de mtshar ro ngo mtshar ro/ /rgyud mangs kyi rna ba'i bd ba skyed bar byed 'ba' zhig tu ma zad de/ rnam par shes pa'i rjes su mthun pa'i gzugs 'dis
266b5(mdo 'grel): mig gi yang bde ba skyed bar byed do/ /de'i phyir 'di su zhig yin/ ci lha mo 'am/ klu'i bu mo 'am/ yang na rig ba 'dzin pa'i bu mo 'am/ yang na grub ba'i rigs las 'khrungs pa zhig go /'dren bas rnam bar blta zhing chags pa dang bcas bar krod?
266b6(mdo 'grel): po 'di su zhig yin zhes bdag gis pa? rtogs so/ /bdag gi 'di tsam shes te/ gal te mtho ris bu mo yin na 'phrog byed mig ltod ldan nges don byas 'gyur/ /gal te klu mo yin na'ang 'di gdong yod tshes 'og zla bas stong ma yin/ /gal te rig 'dzin ma
266b7(mdo 'grel): yin gzhan rigs las rgyal bdag cag rigs ni 'bras dang bcas/ /gal te grub rigs las skyes de phyir grub pa 'jig rten gsum du grags par 'gyur/ /bi dU Sha kas 'dren pa la bltas nas dga' ba dang bcas shing rang gis rtogs par
267a1(mdo 'grel): e ma'o/ /yun ring po zhig nas yid srub kyi spyod yul du ltung bar gyur to/ /bdag nyid la lton cing/ yang na ma yin te dam ze bdag gi'o/ /'bangs mos/ mdza' ba dang bcas par kye bdag sma'o/ /brtse med ma 'di
267a2(mdo 'grel): yi mdun du rgyud mangs bsgrags pas ci zhig bya zhes te rgyud mangs 'phangs so/ /'dren mas bu mo bcom ldan ma gau ri la ma smad cig /kye ding bcom ldan ma bka' drin mdzad pa bzhin no/ /'bangs mos /rje'i sras mo re zhig ci 'dra ba dag smros
267a3(mdo 'grel): shig 'dren mas/ bu mo nges par ding rmi lam du bdag 'di bzhin nyid du rgyud mangs bsgred ba la bcom ldan mas gsungs pa bu mo khyod kyi rgyud mangs bsgreng ba mkhas pa khyad par du 'phags pa 'di dang/ bdag la thun mong ma
267a4(mdo 'grel): yin pa'i gus pa bu mo'i dngos po la rnyed dka' ba 'dis bdag shin tu tshim par gyur to/ /de'i phyir yun ring po ma yin pa na rig pa 'dzin pa'i 'khor los sgyur bas lag pa 'dzin par 'gyur ro zhes so/ /'bangs mos dga' ba dang bcas
267a5(mdo 'grel): par rje'i sras mo/ /gal te de ltar yin na rmi lam du zhes ci'i phyir brjod lta mos 'dod pa'i mchog sbyin byin pa nyid yin no/ /bi dU Sha kas/ nges par bdag cag lha mo lta ba'i skabs su bab po/ /de'i phyir chur sheg nye bar 'gro bar
267a6(mdo 'grel): bya'o zhes te nye bar btud do/ /bi dU Sha kas/ mi 'dod bzhin du khyer nas jo mo drung mo bdag bden par smra ste/ 'di ni mchog byin pa nyid do/ /'dren mas 'jig ba dang bcas par 'dren ma la mtshon te/ bu mo 'di su zhig ces so/ /'bangs
267a7(mdo 'grel): mos/ gzhan dang thun mong ma yin pa'i rnam pa 'di yis na/ /'di nyid bcom ldan mas bka' drin mdzad pa yin nam snyam mo/ /'dren mas chags pa dang bcas shing ngo tsha ba dang bcas par bltas so/ /'dren pas g.yo zhing yangs pa'i mig
267b1(mdo 'grel): ldan dbugs 'byin cing/ 'dar zhing mkhregs sdug nu ldan 'k h+rul byed ma/ /lus 'di dka' thub nyid kyi shin tu ni/ /ngal gyur slar yang mi slar gdung bar byed/ /'dren mas/ bu mo shin tu 'jigs pas 'di la mngon du phyogs te 'dug par mi nus so
267b2(mdo 'grel): zhes te/ logs bltas nas 'khod do/ /bi dU Sha kas/ jo bo khyod kyi dka' thub kyi nags tshal 'di na gang zhig mgron po 'ongs pa la tshig tsam gyis kyang phebs par smra ba ma yin pa 'di 'dra ba'i kun tu spyod pa yod dam ci/ 'bangs mos rje'i sras
267b3(mdo 'grel): mo/ mgron po la bsnyen bkur bya ba rigs pa yin no/ /de'i phyir ji ltar mthu chen po dang ldan pa 'di dag la gus par bya ba la rmongs par gnas/ yang na khyod bzhugs shig /kho mo nyid kyis ji ltar rigs pa dag bya'o/ /'dren ma la mtshon te jo mo legs
267b4(mdo 'grel): par 'ongs sam/ jo bos stan yongs su gzung bas phyogs 'di brgyan par mdzod cig /bi dU Sha kas/ kye grogs po 'di ni legs par smra'o/ /yud tsam zhig 'dug ste ngal bso bar bya'o/ /'dren pas ? khyod ni rigs par smra'o/ /gnyi ga 'khod do/ 'dren
267b5(mdo 'grel): mas kwa ye bzhad gang gyi dang tshul can ma de ltar ma byed/ gal te dka' thub pa 'ga' zhig gis mthong na 'di las bdag dul ba ma yin pa dang ldan bar dog bar 'gyur ro/ /de nas dka' thub ba zhugs te/ rigs kyi bdag po ko shi kas bdag la
267b6(mdo 'grel): bka' bsgos pa/ mnyes bshin shA Na Dilya/ yab kyi bkas/ rgyal tshab bshes gnyen gyi dbyig gzhon nu sprin gyi zhon pa rig pa 'dzin pa'i 'khor los bsgyur bar 'gyur ba dag rim la ya 'di nyid kyi 'ga' zhig na gnas pa srid mo ma la
267b7(mdo 'grel): ya can gyi khyim thab kyi slad du blta ba'i phyir di ring 'ong ste/ gal te de blta zhing ma la ya can gyi nyi ma gung gi mchod sbyin gyi dus yol bar 'gyur srid do/ /des ni dbos la shog shig ces so /des na bdag re zhig gau ri'i khang pa nyid du 'gro'o/ /
